AMT Automag V.name: AMT Automag V
AMT Automag V.description: Very large stainless steel automatic in the mighty .50 AE.

Benelli MP-95E Kromo.name: Benelli MP-95E Kromo
Benelli MP-95E Kromo.description: This is one of the most acurate semi-automatic target pistols ever made. Not as pretty as a Luigi Franchi weapon, the edge it gives in competition is considerable.

Beretta 92FS.name: Beretta 92FS
Beretta 92FS.description: A 9 mm Parabellum pistol worldwide known and liked for its great reliability. Being the most frequent handgun in the world at the end of the 20th century, it has been adopted by a countless number of police force and armies. A little bit outdated in 2020, it can be very easily acquired for a modest sum.

Beretta 93R.name: Beretta 93R
Beretta 93R.description: An automatic version of beretta pistols. A low rate of fire and a compact size make up for a poor clip size.

Beretta M951.name: Beretta M951
Beretta M951.description: A fairly common weapon adopted by many European polices and some armed forces between the fifties and the eighties. It is still an easy pistol to get.

Beretta M1934.name: Beretta M1934
Beretta M1934.description: The Beretta Model 1934 is a compact, semi-automatic pistol which was issued as a standard service firearm to the Italian armed forces beginning in 1934.

Bul M5 Commander.name: Bul M5 Commander
Bul M5 Commander.description: Bul M5 pistols combine time-proven design and ergonomics of legendary US M1911A1 pistol with most modern materials and production techniques.

Ceska Zbrojovka CZ 75.name: Ceska Zbrojovka CZ 75
Ceska Zbrojovka CZ 75.description: The eastern block competition to the Beretta. Argued by some to be a superior handgun.

Ceska Zbrojovka CZ 97B.name: Ceska Zbrojovka CZ 97B
Ceska Zbrojovka CZ 97B.description: Ceska-Zbrojovka's .45ACP for the american market, quite similar to the Colt 1911 Commander, but with a double-stacked magazine.

Ceska Zbrojovka CZ 100.name: Ceska Zbrojovka CZ 100
Ceska Zbrojovka CZ 100.description: Polymer-framed handgun with no manual safety.

Colt .45 M1911 A7.name: Colt .45 M1911 A7
Colt .45 M1911 A7.description: US Army issue pistol in the 20's, the Colt .45 is known for having good stopping power and by its blunt look.

Colt Commander.name: Colt Commander
Colt Commander.description: More modern than the last model, this .45 pistol is reliable and common all over the world.

Coonan Pistol.name: Coonan Pistol
Coonan Pistol.description: M1911A1-based design built for firing the rimmed .357 magnum load.

Downsizer Mini Pistol.name: Downsizer Mini Pistol
Downsizer Mini Pistol.description: Just over three-inches long, easily fits into pockets undetected. The gun can be carried fully loaded with the internal hammer always down until moment of firing. Loaded through breech, and shell casing has to be removed manually.

FN Browning .25.name: FN Browning .25
FN Browning .25.description: A common pistol. It is one of the smallest in the market and usually used as a last line of defense or by ladies.

FN Browning High-Power.name: FN Browning High-Power
FN Browning High-Power.description: An excellent military and civilian sidearm still used worldwide.

Glock 17.name: Glock 17
Glock 17.description: Plastic polymer weapon of very good manufacture which is at the same time, precise and easy to use. Standard issue pistol in the Austrian army.

Glock 18C.name: Glock 18C
Glock 18C.description: The military-only version of the Glock 17, capable of full auto or selective fire.

Heckler & Koch HK-4.name: Heckler & Koch HK-4
Heckler & Koch HK-4.description: A small pistol from the 70's, designed to be quickly rechambered to .25ACP or .22LR.

Heckler & Koch P9S.name: Heckler & Koch P9S
Heckler & Koch P9S.description: A modern pistol that is compact, easy to use and precise. Common among the police forces throughout the world.

Heckler & Koch USP.name: Heckler & Koch USP
Heckler & Koch USP.description: Slide is made of steel, while frame is advanced composite material to reduce weight. Groove under barrel permits the mounting of a laser sight or illuminator.

Heckler & Koch USP Tactical.name: Heckler & Koch USP Tactical
Heckler & Koch USP Tactical.description: The USP pre-fitted for use with a silencer.

Heckler & Koch VP 70.name: Heckler & Koch VP 70
Heckler & Koch VP 70.description: A very large 9 mm pistol, the VP 70 is capable of firing three round bursts, but only with the buttstock attached, otherwise it is only capable of semi-automatic fire. Very rare and expensive.

High Standard Derringer.name: High Standard Derringer
High Standard Derringer.description: Even as a last line of defense weapon, the High Standard Derringer lacks the stopping power needed to be really intimidating. Even so, its size makes it an always helpful weapon. Some versions can be found in larger calibers but the reliability is weak.

IMI Desert Eagle.name: IMI Desert Eagle
IMI Desert Eagle.description: Brought to the world between 1980 and 1990, this weapon was used to equip among others, the american and israel armies. It was also well sold in the civilian market.

LAR Grizzly.name: LAR Grizzly
LAR Grizzly.description: With an impressive size, accuracy and power, this pistol was however, sold very little. Some conversion kits can be found, which allow to change from a caliber to another.

Luger Parabellum P-08.name: Luger Parabellum P-08
Luger Parabellum P-08.description: The first 9 mm Parabellum was this famous Wehrmacht pistol that was copied and replicated at the end of the century. It is nevertheless a little obsolete today.

Makarov PM.name: Makarov PM
Makarov PM.description: This rare weapon from the former eastern block is based on the famous Walther PPK. It's a very discrete pistol with an all around average characteristics.

Mauser C96.name: Mauser C96
Mauser C96.description: This veteran weapon of World War 1 made its 100 year birthday just a couple of years back. It is a fast and precise weapon that unfortunately, can only be found at antique shops today.

MSP.name: MSP
MSP.description: Designed from the ground up as an assasin's weapon, it has two seperate barrels, and is designed to kill a single victim at close range. The outside is unremarkable, and mechanically it is simple and straightforward. It is designed to be easily concelable and easy to draw out of a pocket or such. The greatest feature is it's special 7.62 mm silent rounds. An internal piston both drives the shot foreward, and traps the propellant gasses inside, totaly eliminating the noise, flash, and smoke associated with other weapons. The result is a truly silent shot. The case does not get ejected from the gun, keeping it's secret ammunition's technology safe. Another great feature is the fact that it uses the same size ammunition as the AK-47 assault rifle, and the barrels of the two guns are exactly the same. This leads investigators to belive that the man was killed by the AK-47 at long range, due to speed of impact, and not the close-range MSP.

Navy Arms Mamba.name: Navy Arms Mamba
Navy Arms Mamba.description: This weapon was designed in Rhodesia and produced in South Africa and in the US under license by the Navy Arms Company. It has a characteristic body of plastic polymers and a good capacity clip. Can also be found in the SMG version (rate of fire : 15), however, this is a very rare variant.

Norinco Type 77.name: Norinco Type 77
Norinco Type 77.description: The Type 77 is a smallish design for conceled carry or convience. It uses a blowback action where the triger guard itself is used to cock the weapon. The finger is hooked armound the outside of the trigger guard and pulled towards the trigger to cycle the action and ready the next round. This allows it to be carried with an empty chamber for safety, but can be rapidly drawn and cocked with one hand, with the hand already in firing position.

P96M.name: P96M
P96M.description: Attempt failed to replace the Makarov, this pistol is extremely unpopular.

PSS.name: PSS
PSS.description: Silent pistol designed for paramilitary operations, uses silent-piston driven sealed cartridges. Good for silent operations, such as hostage rescue, but unsuited for assasination because of easily identifiable round and the fact that it ejects its shell casings. Easily concelable though.

Ruger MK II.name: Ruger MK II
Ruger MK II.description: An excellent pistol that combines accuracy with an easy to use concept. It was one of the preferred weapons by assassins.

Sig Sauer P210-2.name: Sig Sauer P210-2
Sig Sauer P210-2.description: One of the most precise military pistols of the time. Adopted by the Swiss army, the Sig Sauer P210-2 is a very easy pistol to maintain.

Sig Sauer P220.name: Sig Sauer P220
Sig Sauer P220.description: Weapon used in the past by the Swiss army.

Sig Sauer P226.name: Sig Sauer P226
Sig Sauer P226.description: High-quality update of the Swiss SIG P220.

Sig Sauer P228.name: Sig Sauer P228
Sig Sauer P228.description: Being the compact version of the P226, the P228 offers the same excellent accuracy, reliability, safe functioning and exquisite workmanship. Its compact size makes carrying more comfortable.

Sig Sauer P229.name: Sig Sauer P229
Sig Sauer P229.description: The SIG P226 in .40S&W. Made of heavier stock than the other, lighter SIGs.

Sig Sauer P230.name: Sig Sauer P230
Sig Sauer P230.description: A lighter version of the P220.

Sig Sauer SP2022.name: Sig Sauer SP2022
Sig Sauer SP2022.description: Large ammo capacity make this a popular urban combat weapon.

Smith & Wesson Sigma.name: Smith & Wesson Sigma
Smith & Wesson Sigma.description: Direct rip-off of the Glock 17 (but a lot more stylish and less well built).

Smith & Wesson Sigma Compact.name: Smith & Wesson Sigma Compact
Smith & Wesson Sigma Compact.description: Improved version of Sigma, more compact and reliable.

Stechkin APS.name: Stechkin APS
Stechkin APS.description: This pistol, called APS for "Automaticheskij Pistolet Stechkina" (Automatic Pistol Stechkin), has a firing selector for automatic firing.

Steyr GB80.name: Steyr GB80
Steyr GB80.description: The Steyr GB80 was in its time the weapon of choice within NATO countries police and armed forces. Highlights are its modern concept and a large capacity clip.

SVI Infinity.name: SVI Infinity
SVI Infinity.description: The firm SVI has produced all sort of accessories for improve the Colt 1911 with modern materials.

TDE Auto-Mag .44.name: TDE Auto-Mag .44
TDE Auto-Mag .44.description: In its own time it was considered the most powerful pistol in the world. Production was abruptly stopped after a series of technical problems.

Tokarev TT-33.name: Tokarev TT-33
Tokarev TT-33.description: This pistol was used in the soviet army and police throughout the twentieth century. It can usually be found in eastern countries.

Vektor CP1.name: Vektor CP1
Vektor CP1.description: All controls are duplicated on both sides, save for magazine release, for ease of use.

Voros.name: Voros
Voros.description: This very rare weapon is equiped with an helicoidal clip and can only fire in semi-automatic mode.

Walther PPK.name: Walther PPK
Walther PPK.description: Mostly known as James Bond's favorite weapon, the Walter PPK was actually used by intelligence agencies across the world.

Yarygin MP-443 Grach.name: Yarygin MP-443 Grach
Yarygin MP-443 Grach.description: Pistol used by Russian Army in the early 21st century.

.44 Bulldog.name: .44 Bulldog
.44 Bulldog.description: A surprising weapon, when you consider its size and its stopping power. Used by US police forces.

Colt King Cobra.name: Colt King Cobra
Colt King Cobra.description: The King Cobra, made during the 80's, was considered like the successor of Colt Python.

Colt Python .357 Magnum.name: Colt Python .357 Magnum
Colt Python .357 Magnum.description: A heavy revolver, appreciated by old TV series heros, for its design (chrome-plated and re-enforded long barrel). That aside, a good weapon, accurate and powerful, but a bit cumbersone when used in its longer version.

Dan Wesson 445 SuperMag.name: Dan Wesson 445 SuperMag
Dan Wesson 445 SuperMag.description: Features stainless steel frame and nonslip rubber grip. Design is high quality, a cut above normal mass-produced firearms. Good target pistol.

Freedom Arms .454 Casull.name: Freedom Arms .454 Casull
Freedom Arms .454 Casull.description: Another weapon for Wild West nostalgic ones. The .454 is a huge caliber for a handgun, with terrible stopping power. Nobody could tell what was the use of such a deadly ammunition type when it was released on the civilian market. In 2020, its real usefulness has been found.

KBP Udar.name: KBP Udar
KBP Udar.description: Revolver developed for Russian special services.

Kovrov AEK-906 Nosorog.name: Kovrov AEK-906 Nosorog
Kovrov AEK-906 Nosorog.description: Despite its rather unusual design, the balance of this revolver is very good, making it accurate and reliable.

Llama Comanche V.44 Magnum.name: Llama Comanche V.44 Magnum
Llama Comanche V.44 Magnum.description: A long-barreled stainless steel .44 Magnum revolver.

Manurhin MR-73.name: Manurhin MR-73
Manurhin MR-73.description: Standard revolver of the French "Gendarmerie Nationale".

Mateba Model 207.name: Mateba Model 207
Mateba Model 207.description: This strange revolver, built sometime in the 1990s, is chambered for the 9 mm Parabellum cartridge and it's six round cylinder is hinged at the top of the frame rather than the bottom. The M207's hexagonal barrel is lined up with the bottom-most chamber for greater accuracy and the weapon's strange design is counter-balanced by a top mounted weight. It should be noted that the Mateba's greatest feature is its accuracy.Unfortunately, it is not as quick or as high powered as most automatics. Additionally, its design causes problems with loading, making it less than an ideal choice in situations where a lot of ammo is being expended. Features ergonomic grips and interchangeable barrels.

Mateba Model 208.name: Mateba Model 208
Mateba Model 208.description: Model 208 is virtually identical to the 207, except that it shoots 357 Magnum.

R-92KS.name: R-92KS
R-92KS.description: Revolver developed for the Russian secret service (MVD).

Ruger GP100.name: Ruger GP100
Ruger GP100.description: Fairly typical stainless steel .357 Magnum revolver.

Ruger Super Redhawk.name: Ruger Super Redhawk
Ruger Super Redhawk.description: A "must" when you are looking for a heavy revolver. it is known to have no drawbacks.

Smith & Wesson Combat Magnum Mod. 29.name: Smith & Wesson Combat Magnum Mod. 29
Smith & Wesson Combat Magnum Mod. 29.description: An impressive weapon which was one of the most powerfull in its category. Particularly efficient and accurate.

Weihrauch Arminius Vindicator.name: Weihrauch Arminius Vindicator
Weihrauch Arminius Vindicator.description: Very good quality revolver for the German police.

Yesaul.name: Yesaul
Yesaul.description: Very unusual revolver that shoots a rifle bullet.

Colt Ace.name: Colt Ace
Colt Ace.description: Truly an Ace up the sleeve beats a dead man's hand every time...

Colt ASP .38.name: Colt ASP .38
Colt ASP .38.description: A nice revolver, still if they went to all the trouble of making the front of the weapon as snag free as possible, the least they could have done was add a hammer shroud.

Defiant Derringer.name: Defiant Derringer
Defiant Derringer.description: A modernized and greatly improved version of the antique Derringer.

Defiant Pocket Lint.name: Defiant Pocket Lint
Defiant Pocket Lint.description: This backup gun looks like anything but a gun and reloads from the back. The trigger is on the side and despite the poor handling, it remains "relatively" precise.

FN OPA-38.name: FN OPA-38
FN OPA-38.description: A very small handgun, perfect for a back up piece or a woman's purse.

Geind EL-552.name: Geind EL-552
Geind EL-552.description: Geind is a new name in firearms manufacturing, but the new kid is coming out swinging and catching everyones eye with their stylish weapons. The EL-552 is no exception. This break open .38 is extremely well made and more accurate than a gun this size should be.

Luigi Franchi Gavil HVS-06.name: Luigi Franchi Gavil HVS-06
Luigi Franchi Gavil HVS-06.description: This pocket revolver does not disappoint, with all the refined style and performance one expects from a Luigi Franchi firearm.

Luigi Franchi Gavil Z11.name: Luigi Franchi Gavil Z11
Luigi Franchi Gavil Z11.description: A more traditional, but still extremely stylish pocket revolver from Luigi Franchi, the second in their Gavil line.

Mustang Arms Whisper.name: Mustang Arms Whisper
Mustang Arms Whisper.description: Billed as the quietest handgun ever made, the whisper certainly lives up to its reputation. It is possibly the perfect handgun for close quarters assassination. The revolver is fully enclosed and features a built in silencer. Hammerless and sporting a built in laser sight along with a digital display on the rear of the gun which counts the number of rounds fired. This gun is so silent that even with audio enhancement you cannot hear it from more than twenty feet away, without audio boost you would have to be standing next to it in a silent room to hear it. It fires cased .22 caliber subsonic rounds which must be individually loaded.

Nova Arms Midget.name: Nova Arms Midget
Nova Arms Midget.description: A small derringer, perfect for your pocket, purse or up your sleeve.

Nova Arms Sphex .38.name: Nova Arms Sphex .38
Nova Arms Sphex .38.description: A self -defense weapon, made mainly for women. Probably one of the biggest commercial success in year 2019, for the Nova company.

SCI Corsair .22.name: SCI Corsair .22
SCI Corsair .22.description: The corsair can be put in ugly polymer weapons museum at a good place. It's a gun with a retro style design, with a beautiful bronzed shape and a imitation wood grip which could nearly looks real. It shots (after a fashion) a 6mm bullet, taken from the clip inserted in the grip. It's a single-action weapon (you must re-arm with the hand), so it's quite long to shoot again.

SCI Little Joe.name: SCI Little Joe
SCI Little Joe.description: In spite of its name, this pistol is primarily intended for women who also want to play pirates.

Streetline Special.name: Streetline Special
Streetline Special.description: This is a common hold-out pistol found among the lowest level of society. Made of composite materials it is small, lightweight, and extremely concealable. As the weapon's magazine is integral, it cannot use larger magazines, nor can most pistol accessories be mounted on it.

Towa HB-10.name: Towa HB-10
Towa HB-10.description: Gun with an elegant design, ideal as emergency weapon.

Zip Gun.name: Zip Gun
Zip Gun.description: Generic gun made by the first came, it can be made in many calibers. One thing is constant, either exploses (one chance on six) or works but in any case it's a weapon for desperates.

Arasaka 253.name: Arasaka 253
Arasaka 253.description: The barrel shroud of this weapon doesn't move, and instead is specially vented and baffled to act as a limited supressor, reducing report considerably. The slide is the small protrusion on the rear of the weapon.

Ares Light Fire 70.name: Ares Light Fire 70
Ares Light Fire 70.description: The Ares Light Fire 70 is your choice for self-defense and light security work. Weighing in at only 1 kilogram, this pistol is perfect for times when firepower is necessary, but excess baggage is not. The patended clip design gives you more bullets in the same space as reduced-capacity magazines. The specially constructed silencer is 50 percent lighter than any other model on the market, but is only designed for use on the Light Fire.

Ares Light Fire GZ.name: Ares Light Fire GZ
Ares Light Fire GZ.description: Improvement of the Light Fire 70, the GZ is slightly longer for better accuracy. It can be equipped with the same silencer as its predecessor.

Armalite Knuckgun.name: Armalite Knuckgun
Armalite Knuckgun.description: The only gun manufactured today that serves as both fire-arm and brass knuckles, rumor has it that it was designed by and for gun-fu practitioners. By flicking a switch, you lock the trigger in place, and the barrel extension becomes the new trigger, firing the round upon impact, very nasty stuff, just don't forget which setting its on and accidently drop your piece.

Beretta Model 101-T.name: Beretta Model 101-T
Beretta Model 101-T.description: This slim-line light personal weapon is favored by corporate personnel worldwide. A wondernine that fits in your pocket.

Beretta Model 110-T.name: Beretta Model 110-T
Beretta Model 110-T.description: The big brother of the 101, the 110-T is a full-frame automatic wondernine with integral laser sighting. A popular choice in higher-end wondernines.

Beretta Model 357S.name: Beretta Model 357S
Beretta Model 357S.description: Military purpose gun, the 357S has already been bougth by several european armies, and also by the mexican police. It's surely worth its 400 eb.

Beretta TDX.name: Beretta TDX
Beretta TDX.description: Pistol adopted by the Italian army, the TDX is no exception to the firm's rule of excellence.

Ceska Zbrojovka Pengu.name: Ceska Zbrojovka Pengu
Ceska Zbrojovka Pengu.description: Popular with European military and police forces.

Ceska Zbrojovka VZ-120.name: Ceska Zbrojovka VZ-120
Ceska Zbrojovka VZ-120.description: This Czech pistol, manufactured by Ceska Zbojovkain Prague, is the premier East European light service pistol. Imported by Ares America, it has been rated by several experts as the best pistol of its class in the world. The sidearm of choice of the Czech Mechanized Command.

Colt-Seburo DNP-5.name: Colt-Seburo DNP-5
Colt-Seburo DNP-5.description: This beautiful redesign of the 1911 combat pistol is the brainchild of a joint venture between Seburo and Colt. This is what happens when the masters of old work with the masters of new.

Colt American L36.name: Colt American L36
Colt American L36.description: This light American design is very popular amongst the style conscious because of its sleek profile and unique appearance.

Colt Defender.name: Colt Defender
Colt Defender.description: This gun is the worthy successor of the Alpha-Omega.

Constitutional Arms Mygal.name: Constitutional Arms Mygal
Constitutional Arms Mygal.description: The Mygal is the service weapon of the American police, but unfortunately, it is too light to effectively protect the average beat cop ! It is best fitted for police detectives as well has private ones. Very attractive low price.

Dai Lung Bala.name: Dai Lung Bala
Dai Lung Bala.description: It would be a decent weapon if it didn't jam so much.

Dai Lung CRP-22.name: Dai Lung CRP-22
Dai Lung CRP-22.description: A typical Dai Lung disposable, it is true garbage, it jams frequently, it has no sights whatsoever, maintenance on it is a bitch, and its ugly as sin. Still it sells well in the third world due to its extremely low price.

Dai Lung Han.name: Dai Lung Han
Dai Lung Han.description: This Mauser inspired handgun is a popular weapon amongst asian smugglers, pirates, and bandits.

Dai Lung Magnum.name: Dai Lung Magnum
Dai Lung Magnum.description: This plastic polymer is an imitation of the old Automag 44.

Fabrica de Armas AVP-11.name: Fabrica de Armas AVP-11
Fabrica de Armas AVP-11.description: A common handgun, found worldwide. Extremely popular due to its low price.

FN Browning Archos.name: FN Browning Archos
FN Browning Archos.description: A classicly designed semi-auto very reminiscent of the old Browning Hi-Power.

Glock G33 AV.name: Glock G33 AV
Glock G33 AV.description: The successor to the G26 AV is in line with its illustrious ancestors, a model of design and manufacture.

Hammerli Model 610S.name: Hammerli Model 610S
Hammerli Model 610S.description: Designed as a match-target weapon, the Hammerli Model 610S makes a powerful and effective personal sidearm. A stylish weapon, the Model 610S is the first choice of a marksman and a rue soldier. First class all the way !Designed to minimize muzzle jump and vibration, customizable grip pads and weights allow the individual user to configure his weapon for maximum comfort and balance. The simple quick-lock system is fully compatible witha variety of top-mounted accessories, and the Hammerli also boasts a patented gas-escape system.While reliable in range conditions, field conditions are hard on matche weapons, reducing reliability by 1 class per day of regular use. But it makes a striking "dress duty" sidearm.

Heckler & Koch C823.name: Heckler & Koch C823
Heckler & Koch C823.description: A very well made compact from H&K, the built in laser sight definitely helps with the accuracy problems inherent to such a short barrel.

Heckler & Koch DEF-3.name: Heckler & Koch DEF-3
Heckler & Koch DEF-3.description: This is the standard handgun for all Argentinean military and police forces.

Heckler & Koch Ikarus 432J.name: Heckler & Koch Ikarus 432J
Heckler & Koch Ikarus 432J.description: Police and federal agencies are fast becoming enamored with this masterfully crafted and elegant firearm.

Heckler & Koch MP-505.name: Heckler & Koch MP-505
Heckler & Koch MP-505.description: Heckler and Koch are always expanding on their MP series of weapons. This time they are taking it in a new direction. The action remains virtually the same, the clip however has been placed inside the grip, and the weapon chambered for 10 mm caseless. This makes the gun a bit smaller and more conceilable.

Heckler & Koch NS-7.name: Heckler & Koch NS-7
Heckler & Koch NS-7.description: H&K once again proves they are on top of their game. In addition to the unique styling and ergonomic feel that makes this weapon more like an extension of your arm than a hunk of metal, it is also capable of 3 round burst.

Heckler & Koch S350 Sturmer.name: Heckler & Koch S350 Sturmer
Heckler & Koch S350 Sturmer.description: Another extremely stylish pistol from H&K.

IMI Gamad It. Pistol Dwarf.name: IMI Gamad It. Pistol Dwarf
IMI Gamad It. Pistol Dwarf.description: Laser sight included, +1 accuracy. Exists in smartlink version for 850 eb. Sold with two magazines, according to the desired discretion (concealability : jacket, magazine : 15).

Kamaha Khali.name: Kamaha Khali
Kamaha Khali.description: Standard hangun of Indian army officers, this polymer whith fair characteristics has encountered an average sucess Indochina and middle Europe. It remains unknown in european countries.

Kang Tao Type 108.name: Kang Tao Type 108
Kang Tao Type 108.description: Cheap polymer, with medium stats. Very popular in oriental countries for self-defense.

Leroi Maxi 10.name: Leroi Maxi 10
Leroi Maxi 10.description: Bad quality polymer, sold at an excessive price and a not-so professionnel look.

Luigi Franchi Gentleman's Duo.name: Luigi Franchi Gentleman's Duo
Luigi Franchi Gentleman's Duo.description: Always designing their weapons for the upper class, Luigi Franchi does it again with The Gentleman's Duo. A pair of ornate matched dueling revolvers, with a very finely crafted plush case and cleaning kit to complete the set. The weapons are plated in gold, silver or platinum and the engravings on each set is different, and for an additional 300 eb will be customized to the owner. Even the cleaning tools are engraved and the entire set is perfect for display. The weapons are single action and work beautifully, just so they know your serious. Among the upper crust dueling has come back into vogue, and these are some of the premiere pieces available. Though most prefer the more traditional single shot flintlocks.

Malorian Arms PPM-721.name: Malorian Arms PPM-721
Malorian Arms PPM-721.description: A Malorian pistol with built in suppressor. A bit shiny for wet work, but it's a Malorian, so who's gonna complain.

Militech P-343.name: Militech P-343
Militech P-343.description: A very nice, very comfortable sidearm from Militech. Popular among it's security officers as well as police and military. A professionals handgun through and through.

Militech Two-Step.name: Militech Two-Step
Militech Two-Step.description: A fine handgun by itself, the Two-Step also features a single shot underbarrel shotgun for emergency situations.

Mustang Arms Oshi-592.name: Mustang Arms Oshi-592
Mustang Arms Oshi-592.description: The Oshi is yet another gun made for security in orbital installations but has also found popularity as a light handgun for women and children. Its state of the art ceramic polymer construction keeps its recoil low. While this handgun is an excellent choice for its role, it is quite susceptible to jamming when not kept properly cleaned.

Norinco Eduardo.name: Norinco Eduardo
Norinco Eduardo.description: An inexpensive pistol, reminiscent of the Luger. It looks a bit odd, but has found a following with many of the youth gangs, especially since it comes standard in gold and chrome.

Nova Arms Otto.name: Nova Arms Otto
Nova Arms Otto.description: Nova Arms released this sidearm in late 2014, its only remarkable feature is that it can be set to eject spent shells to both the right and the left side of the weapon with the flick of a switch. Ideal for left-handed or ambidextrous professionals.

Ruger Colonial.name: Ruger Colonial
Ruger Colonial.description: A nice fairly compact piece that serves well as either a backup or as a main sidearm.

Seburo 6X6.name: Seburo 6X6
Seburo 6X6.description: This is a tiny backup semi-auto. Perfect for a purse or pocket.

Seburo Bobsons.name: Seburo Bobsons
Seburo Bobsons.description: The Bobsons is a fairly typical small size polymer gun designed to be highly concealable for military and security forces and other "demanding" customers. Seburo is renowned worldwide for its extremely reliable weaponry and the Bobsons is no exception !

Seco LD-120.name: Seco LD-120
Seco LD-120.description: Count on Seco to take the fantastic, but aging, Isreali LD-100 design and rework it for modern times. The sturdy flat-black macroplastic casing gives it that lethal look in such demand.

Smith & Wesson Duno.name: Smith & Wesson Duno
Smith & Wesson Duno.description: Another fine snub nosed revolver from the people who know them better than anyone else.

Smith & Wesson LP4.name: Smith & Wesson LP4
Smith & Wesson LP4.description: Smith & Wesson's latest showcase piece for their .40 S&W round, a caliber of ammunition that has never really struck the public fancy.

Smith & Wesson PS-3.name: Smith & Wesson PS-3
Smith & Wesson PS-3.description: A fine combat pistol designed with comfortable and acurate shoting in mind. Features built in underlug to reduce recoil and pachmayer grips.

Sternmeyer Luxus-45.name: Sternmeyer Luxus-45
Sternmeyer Luxus-45.description: The german company has commercialized for its 20th birthday this luxuary weapon, available with a golden, silver or platinum finition. Its technical stats are at the same level as more "professional" guns.

Sternmeyer Type 82.name: Sternmeyer Type 82
Sternmeyer Type 82.description: While a bit larger than it needs to be, the Type 82 is a very good weapon with a reliable record. It also boasts a very high magazine capacity and rarely needs maintenance.

Texas Arms Grinder.name: Texas Arms Grinder
Texas Arms Grinder.description: A well-made weapon, for far-west nostalgic ones. Its oversized ammo provides it a very good stopping power.

Texhofforhov Rush .10.name: Texhofforhov Rush .10
Texhofforhov Rush .10.description: Even if it remains rare in western countries, the rush .10 is the prefered weapon of russian solos.

Tohiatsu Silencer.name: Tohiatsu Silencer
Tohiatsu Silencer.description: This japanese pistol is equiped with an integrated supressor, that must be changed after 40 shots, and a recoil compensator that makes it very accurate. First built for japanese secret services, the silencer is now used by mafiosi and assassins in the whole world.

Tsunami Arms CRP-22.name: Tsunami Arms CRP-22
Tsunami Arms CRP-22.description: This respectable release from Tsunami Arms is a born contender. The weapon's barrel is a bit long, but it is extremely well balanced.

Tsunami Arms Express Racegun.name: Tsunami Arms Express Racegun
Tsunami Arms Express Racegun.description: The battery of this weapon costs 50 eb, and allows 50 shots.

Tsunami Arms Lexman.name: Tsunami Arms Lexman
Tsunami Arms Lexman.description: Originally designed as a target pistol, the Lexman has gained popularity among professionals recently due to its high accuracy.

Walther PB-120.name: Walther PB-120
Walther PB-120.description: In the field, reliability means everything. The Walther PB-120 offers total reliability in a low-profile, easy-to-hide, back-up pistol. Constructed primarily of composite materials, the light (1.5 pounds) but rugged PB-120 works like a charm even in the most hostile environment. A merc couldn't ask for a better piece. Despite it's small size, the weapon can still mount standard barrel and top-mounted accessories made by most manufacturers.

Walther TEP-94.name: Walther TEP-94
Walther TEP-94.description: Weapon intended for professionals, this pistol is a jewel of accuracy.

Beretta 97P.name: Beretta 97P
Beretta 97P.description: The Beretta 97P is an evolution from the Beretta 92FS.

Beretta PLAS 9 Fashion Gun.name: Beretta PLAS 9 Fashion Gun
Beretta PLAS 9 Fashion Gun.description: This small pistol is considered a good "last stand" weapon prized by the Europeans in their self-defence. Fairly unknown in the American market it is a must see when passing through Europe.

Constitutional Arms Bronco.name: Constitutional Arms Bronco
Constitutional Arms Bronco.description: Service weapon for bodyguards and police officers, the Bronco is a good 9 mm known by its accuracy and reliability. Its commercialisation abroad has met with a great success.

Daewoo DP-17.name: Daewoo DP-17
Daewoo DP-17.description: Although the DP17 is a "Wondernine" like many others, it enjoys a good popularity among the triads and the yakuza thanks to its large capacity clip.

Heckler & Koch P-18.name: Heckler & Koch P-18
Heckler & Koch P-18.description: A huge success on the european market for this modern weapon. Perfect for those who fear being out of ammo.

IMI Gideon.name: IMI Gideon
IMI Gideon.description: A great success for the Israeli company, that combines a stunning accuracy at an even more stunning price !

Kang Tao Type 97.name: Kang Tao Type 97
Kang Tao Type 97.description: This pastic polymer gun is just a (bad) copy of the Beretta 92FS.

Militech A226 Shooter.name: Militech A226 Shooter
Militech A226 Shooter.description: Recent fast trigger weapon that offers a better investment than the Militech Avenger and similar ones. That is even if you consider that it has dilation problems on high rates of fire and a clip that tends to get empty too fast.

SCI Starrior 4.name: SCI Starrior 4
SCI Starrior 4.description: On those masquerade nights that you wear your captain Kirk outfit, don't forget your SCI Starrior 4.

Stein & Wasserman M2009.name: Stein & Wasserman M2009
Stein & Wasserman M2009.description: Very professional look, great accuracy, full proof reliability, waterproof, and immune to corrosion.

Surprising Stranger.name: Surprising Stranger
Surprising Stranger.description: The only thing going for this polymer is that it has four "pepper pot-like" barrels and an electric firing mechanism.

Walther 915.name: Walther 915
Walther 915.description: After its commercialisation in 2011, the Walter 915 became the best-sold pistol in Europe. It is very appreciated by it's futuristic and a little aggressive look as well as by its accuracy.

Walther Charon M2.name: Walther Charon M2
Walther Charon M2.description: Walther continues to impress us with this elegant handgun.

Arasaka Guardian.name: Arasaka Guardian
Arasaka Guardian.description: Arasaka ups the stakes with another heavy combat pistol. Sturdy and extremely reliable, reasonably accurate and best of all affordable. A little large for most, but at least no one will be asking if you "brought enough gun".

Arasaka Marson.name: Arasaka Marson
Arasaka Marson.description: One of the high selling points of this weapon are the molded grips, available in either wood or rubber.

Arasaka P-237.name: Arasaka P-237
Arasaka P-237.description: A nice handgun, comfortable in the hand with very negligible recoil and a nice ammo capacity. Arasaka has begun arming its forces in explosive locales with this firearm due to its large caliber.It has also gained a following in the professional community for its out of the box accuracy and reliability.

Arasaka Urban.name: Arasaka Urban
Arasaka Urban.description: This is Quite possibly Arasaka's most popular handgun line in years. Favored by professionals and amatuers alike. With molded grips, this gun perfectly captures the look and feel of the street. Winner of "Solo Of Fortune's Gun of the Year Award" for 2020.

Arasaka Zenith.name: Arasaka Zenith
Arasaka Zenith.description: Arasaka is the leading developer in 12 mm handguns, and as the threat of cybernetic crimes and augmented militaries becomes more prevalent its not hard to see why. The Zenith is a beautiful gun, and does not disappoint in it's performance.

Ares Predator.name: Ares Predator
Ares Predator.description: How can the best heavy pistol in the world work even better ? That's the question Ares Arms asked their R&D Department, and the Predator is their answer. Designed to fire state-of-the-art firepower 12 mm heavy pistol ammunition, the Predator packs a mighty punch. Combine it with the new 15-shot clip and optional Ares Smartgun Link (not included), and you've got a new contender for man's best friend.

Ares Predator GZ.name: Ares Predator GZ
Ares Predator GZ.description: Determined to keep a name with good reputation, Ares has released this GZ version which is in fact nothing like its predecessor. The whole design of the weapon has been reviewed and greatly improved, as well as the price...

Armalite CCPP-48.name: Armalite CCPP-48
Armalite CCPP-48.description: Solid and heavy hitting, this weapon is increasingly popular among mercenaries and C-SWAT officers.

Armalite Poly .41.name: Armalite Poly .41
Armalite Poly .41.description: The pistol of those that don't make a habit out of wasting ammo. The Poly .41 is 90% plastic polymer but has a remarkable accuracy not usually found on this price range. However, due a weak barrel, this accuracy will fall to 0 after about 50 shots.

Beretta-Luigi Franchi M-93V Lynx.name: Beretta-Luigi Franchi M-93V Lynx
Beretta-Luigi Franchi M-93V Lynx.description: The most respected weapon manufacturers in Italy got together to release a custom anniversary limited run of the M-93. Chambered in 11 mm, this gun is maximized for accuracy and elegance. A true talking piece for wealthy executives. The solid gold accenting and custom barrel porting make this weapon one of the most prized in the world.

Beretta DI-57 Ferro.name: Beretta DI-57 Ferro
Beretta DI-57 Ferro.description: A very good quality pistol with a classy design. The extended magazine holds 25 cartridges.

Beretta M2015-A.name: Beretta M2015-A
Beretta M2015-A.description: From a "human" point of view, the M2015 is the most powerful pistol in the world, which means, that when fired, the recoil won't break your thumb, but it won't be far from that result. If for some people, even the .454 isn't enough, there is always 14 mm.

Budget Arms Auto-3.name: Budget Arms Auto-3
Budget Arms Auto-3.description: Special : on a fumble followed by a 6 or more, it explodes inflicting 1D6 damage on the users arm.

Ceska Zbrojovka CZ 105.name: Ceska Zbrojovka CZ 105
Ceska Zbrojovka CZ 105.description: With it's its heavy barrel shroud acting as a counterweight against recoil, this is weapon is very accurate at driving it's 11 mm ammunition home.

Colt M36.name: Colt M36
Colt M36.description: Not about to be left in the cold to replace the H&K Socom 2020, Colt introduces the M36. The US Army is discreetly looking for a new special forces sidearm, preferably American made, though they are talking to Arasaka as well. This weapon is the running favorite so far.

Colt Manhunter.name: Colt Manhunter
Colt Manhunter.description: Colt explodes back into the heavy handgun market with the vicious ManHunter ! Sleek and deadly, this heavy pistol is designed for ultimate reliability under the most adverse of conditions. The weapon was designed by famous Bounty Hunter Andrea McBaine, and underwent more than a year of field testing before she pronounced it ready for the market.The heavy body of the gun contains a laser sight (+1 WA included in above stats).

Colt Renaissance.name: Colt Renaissance
Colt Renaissance.description: These magnificent handguns were released as a limited edition celebration of the 1911's combat service. Only 2000 were made and each includes the pinnacle of modifications to the 1911. Chambered in 12 mm, these weapons are both extremely combat effective and a collectors item.

Constitutional Arms Stub.name: Constitutional Arms Stub
Constitutional Arms Stub.description: It might be small, ugly and unreliable, but it packs a wallop.

Cop .44 Derringer.name: Cop .44 Derringer
Cop .44 Derringer.description: An upgrade of the popular pepperbox style Derringer.

Cyberdyn M238.name: Cyberdyn M238
Cyberdyn M238.description: Again this gun came from an US Army commission. Truly little pocket sub-machine gun, it can be hide in a jacket if one retire the high capacity magazine and the extension barrel device (accuracy : +1, magazine : 14, rate of fire : 2/3).

Dai Lung Gangmaster.name: Dai Lung Gangmaster
Dai Lung Gangmaster.description: High caliber pistol that enjoys a certain popularity amongst street gangs. Retractable "bayonet" blade, damage : 1D6. The blade breaks or folds in result of a melee fumble.

Dutch Arms Longfellow.name: Dutch Arms Longfellow
Dutch Arms Longfellow.description: An oddly designed hunting pistol from Dutch Arms. Mounting a scope is almost required, in fact the handgun was built for it. The rear sights line up perfect with a mounted sope for dead on acuracy. Odd that it doesn't come with one.

Espinoza One Shot.name: Espinoza One Shot
Espinoza One Shot.description: When a result of 1 to 6, test the reliability (roll 1D10 and withdraw). -2 or more : the gun is jammed, -3 or more : explosion, 2D6+1 damage to the gunner arm.

Fabrica de Armas GP-80.name: Fabrica de Armas GP-80
Fabrica de Armas GP-80.description: 3-round burst capability and deliscious styling make this a popular weapon, especially in the private security world where corporates want to make an impression with their visible security guards carrying it. The integral laser sight, switchable between standard red beam, and UV beam visible only with cyberoptics, is another nice addition.

Federated Arms CS 831A.name: Federated Arms CS 831A
Federated Arms CS 831A.description: The magazine has a large lip for easier grasping, especially in the case of cybernetic hands which sometimes slip.

FN Browning Ultra-Power.name: FN Browning Ultra-Power
FN Browning Ultra-Power.description: The new and improved version of the popular Browning Max-Power contains a revolutionary new chamber cycling system that moves a new round into the chamber faster than any previous model. This cuts down delay time between shots, allowing you to empty the entire magazine in seconds. The integral laser sight (+1 WA included above) is the battle-proven LasSys XMS design that is manufacturer-guaranteed not to fail.

Geind D-640.name: Geind D-640
Geind D-640.description: Geind proving that even though it's a new company, it can run with the pack with this monster handgun.

Glock 25.name: Glock 25
Glock 25.description: On the same line has other Glock pistols, the 25 has a modern and imposing look with a reliablility to match it. Used in Austria and certain African countries to equip the army and police.

Goncz-Taurus Micro 12.name: Goncz-Taurus Micro 12
Goncz-Taurus Micro 12.description: The Micro 12, makes an artwork of maximum power/minimum size concept. It is and outstanding achievement by the engineers of Goncz. Nothing is perfect however, the weapon has a bad habit of cracking across all its size (chances : 3 out of 10 in case of a fumble). There is no danger for the shooter, but if that happens, you can drop it on the nearest trashcan.

Heckler & Koch Majestic-12.name: Heckler & Koch Majestic-12
Heckler & Koch Majestic-12.description: A very smooth and clean looking weapon, uncommon in a caliber this size. Absolutely gorgeous and fires like a dream.

Heckler & Koch SX-45.name: Heckler & Koch SX-45
Heckler & Koch SX-45.description: With the SX-45, H&K is delivering an upgraded version of the excellent Mk.23. Like its predecessor, it is a command of the US Army.

Heckler & Koch VP-101.name: Heckler & Koch VP-101
Heckler & Koch VP-101.description: Heckler and Koch make some of the finest handguns in the world, and this is no excpetion. The handle is a bit large, but otherwise the weapon is well balenced and smooth firing.

IMI Jericho 942FS.name: IMI Jericho 942FS
IMI Jericho 942FS.description: The Jericho 942FS is an Israeli manufactured handgun. It may, in fact, be a direct descendant of the Desert Eagle. This weapon is chambered to .50AE, so it packs one hell of a punch. The Jericho 942FS seems to be a popular large frame handgun, and it is used in several organizations throughout Japan. This autoloader also sports hexagonal shaped rifling for greater control.

Kalashnikov AK12 Oktober.name: Kalashnikov AK12 Oktober
Kalashnikov AK12 Oktober.description: Heavy caliber pistol of Russian production, impressive by its size, reliable and durable as only the Russians can do. Used by the Russian army during rough campaigns. We can also add that it comes from factory with corrosion protection. All things considered, it's the perfect weapon if you go camping on a warzone.

Lucznik Radom LRP-234.name: Lucznik Radom LRP-234
Lucznik Radom LRP-234.description: A bit oversized, but still combat worthy. And its intimidating styling is plain for all to see.

Luigi Franchi Princess.name: Luigi Franchi Princess
Luigi Franchi Princess.description: Very high-tech look for this futuristic weapon that combines ceramics, synthetic resins and extra-resistant polymers. It is bound to become a classic in Europe on years to come.

Malorian Arms MX Pocket.name: Malorian Arms MX Pocket
Malorian Arms MX Pocket.description: The first Malorian pocket gun lives up to their reputation. This weapon is a miniature work of art. A bit pricey, but the malorian name alone makes it worth it.

MAS 12 Sniper Gun.name: MAS 12 Sniper Gun
MAS 12 Sniper Gun.description: Heavy caliber military pistol for long range shots. Bipod available for 25 eb.

Mauser Cthugha.name: Mauser Cthugha
Mauser Cthugha.description: This revamping of the antique Mauser C96 is accompanied by a clear increase in caliber. Extended magazines with 14 cartridges are also available.

Militech Boomer Buster .477.name: Militech Boomer Buster .477
Militech Boomer Buster .477.description: Accuracy and concealability drop unless firer has the brace deployed, or a cyberarm (concealability : long coat, accuracy : +1).

Militech Naja .50.name: Militech Naja .50
Militech Naja .50.description: A powerful pistol for military purpose. It is equipped with a laser sight (+1 up to 100 m). This device can be turned into a torch (range : 25 meters) for night shot. A high-power battery can sustain this device for 10 hours. Commercialized in 2021, the Naja is mainly used in the army and in security militias. It's also available in 12 mm (4D6+1, magazine : 10), or in .357 magnum (3D6+2, magazine : 12, accuracy : +1).

Militech RNA-12.name: Militech RNA-12
Militech RNA-12.description: Designed specifically for their own special forces division, this weapon is incredibly reliable, nail driving accurate right out of the box and sturdy. The hammerless design and high ammo capacity are just icing on the cake for this combat beast. Militech is hoping once again to win military contracts, and with the US on the brink of war in South America, they may get their chance.

Mustang Arms Mark II.name: Mustang Arms Mark II
Mustang Arms Mark II.description: The Mark II works like clockwork, that is if you don't use it in damp or dusty environments. Also, it doesn't react well to shock. On those cases, it usually jams and needs a full disassemble to fix.There is also available a version with a larger clip of 20 bullets (conceleabily : longcoat).

Ruger Lawmaster.name: Ruger Lawmaster
Ruger Lawmaster.description: Rugers "little brother" to the Lawgiver, chambered in 12 mm, and lacking the integral laser sight and tac light, but still packing more than enough punch for the job.

Savalette Guardian.name: Savalette Guardian
Savalette Guardian.description: The Savalette Guardian's chrome-steel finish shows off the taste of the true professional, and its high-powered, full-load slug packs professional power. This second-to-nonepistol fires the heaviest round in its class. The Guardian's brilliant finish, integral computer enchanced targeting system, micro-gyro recoil absorption system, and burst-mode firing system make this weapon the unquestioned leader of the pack. Whither field or dress weapon, the Savalette Guardian is the heavy sidearm of choice for professioals worldwide. Why pick any other gun ?

SCI Black Skull.name: SCI Black Skull
SCI Black Skull.description: SCI continues in its "pirate" range with the Black Skull even if the weapon looks more like a toy with its genuine plastic finish, the ammunition used can cause damage. The weapon has a one in three chance of exploding when fired.

Seburo C-X.name: Seburo C-X
Seburo C-X.description: This gun is one of the best available on the market. Seburo quickly proved that he was the most talented gunsmith on the planet. The magazine of this weapon is unique and gives him an amazing capacity for such a caliber. Moreover, the bullpup configuration makes it even more accurate. And if the general shape of the weapon can be a problem with a holster, Seburo sells special ones for 80 eb.

Seburo Mandrake.name: Seburo Mandrake
Seburo Mandrake.description: A very nice heavy combat pistol from Seburo. This weapon delivers all you would expect from Japan's finest gunsmiths.

Seburo S-30.name: Seburo S-30
Seburo S-30.description: Smooth design and exacting quality make this a truly beautiful handgun.

Seburo Yoshino.name: Seburo Yoshino
Seburo Yoshino.description: Smooth design and exacting quality make this a truly beautiful handgun. Seburo style is in full effect and the weapon comes with a standard 12 round clip and an extended 16 round magazine as well.

Smith & Wesson 6040C.name: Smith & Wesson 6040C
Smith & Wesson 6040C.description: A premiere handgun from Smith and Wesson with an integral laser sight and optional smartlink.

Smith & Wesson Bully.name: Smith & Wesson Bully
Smith & Wesson Bully.description: This is a nice weapon, very impressive accuracy, although the recoil is a bit much. Also its barrel is a bit long, which hampers its conceilability, but its a fair trade for accuracy.

Spitfire Battle Pistol 12 mm.name: Spitfire Battle Pistol 12 mm
Spitfire Battle Pistol 12 mm.description: British army pistol. Also exists in semi-automatic version (rate of fire : 2) for $700.

Texhofforhov Tzar.name: Texhofforhov Tzar
Texhofforhov Tzar.description: The Tzar is a rare weapon in the west because the 11 mm S ammo it uses cannot be found easily. In Russia however, it is frequently used by surveillance militias and unfortunately by mobsters.

Tohiatsu Intruder 11 mm.name: Tohiatsu Intruder 11 mm
Tohiatsu Intruder 11 mm.description: The Intruder is an expensive weapon. Very impressive (see Cyberpunk cover) and terribly precise, it comes from factory with smarlink, recoil compensators and a simple scope. Its also one of the few pistols around with 100 meters effective range. Tohiatsu had a market in mind when it developed such a technological pistol. Very simply to make it the first choice of assassins of all breeds.

Arasaka LEH-451.name: Arasaka LEH-451
Arasaka LEH-451.description: A common police issue sidearm, this revolver was made to compete with the Constitutional Arms police revolver and accepts the same variety of ammunition. This weapon is more well received by the Police of Night City due to its more comfortable feel and lighter construction.

Armalite Thoroughbred.name: Armalite Thoroughbred
Armalite Thoroughbred.description: This is a short, sturdy revolver, popular with detectives and professionals the world over, makes a fine backup weapon, comes with barrel mounted counterweight, with built in laser sight.

Colt Dragoon Deluxe.name: Colt Dragoon Deluxe
Colt Dragoon Deluxe.description: This particularly elegant, accurate and therefore inevitably expensive revolver is a limited edition created to celebrate the 200th anniversary of the birth of the founder, Samuel Colt. It can be equipped with a scope for precision shooting.

Colt Gecko.name: Colt Gecko
Colt Gecko.description: A fashionable revolver on the West Coast. Exists in black, chrome or camouflaged designs.

Colt Pittbull.name: Colt Pittbull
Colt Pittbull.description: This revolver is designed on the same principle as the Mateba and is particularly compact for a weapon of this category.

Colt Urban Guerilla.name: Colt Urban Guerilla
Colt Urban Guerilla.description: This revolver can be equipped with a scope for precision shooting.

Constitutional Arms Revo.name: Constitutional Arms Revo
Constitutional Arms Revo.description: Constitutional Arms, a company not especially known for making precision weapons, has decided to make its "Revolution" with a revolver that is next to the best, in addition to being of an imposing caliber (and price).

Geind EL-528.name: Geind EL-528
Geind EL-528.description: Genetically grown ivory grips, gold accent and absolute precision. This weapon is the flagship of the Geind catalog, watch out Luigi Franchi !

Geind EL-631.name: Geind EL-631
Geind EL-631.description: It only holds four shots, but it's incredibly accurate and reliable right out of the box.

Geind EL-645.name: Geind EL-645
Geind EL-645.description: The EL-645 is a workhorse of a weapon and makes the perfect back up for just about anyone. Comfortable grips, accurate and hard hitting chambered in .357.

Luigi Franchi Nobleman.name: Luigi Franchi Nobleman
Luigi Franchi Nobleman.description: This gun leaves us breathless in its elegance and beauty. It harkens back to a time of honor and chivalry. Of course using it in combat is not recommended, though it is fully capable. It is one of the most highly sought after collectors pieces being produced today. Each one is hand made from scratch and uniquely engraved. Real ivory grips, solid 24 karat gold adornments and more style than should be possible in a weapon.

Luigi Franchi Tigre.name: Luigi Franchi Tigre
Luigi Franchi Tigre.description: Old world style, modern age function, Luigi Franchi shows once again why they are the most respected firearms manufacturer in the world. Its guns aren't just works of art, they are meticulously accurate. There is a reason why Luigi Franchi weapons are status symbols sought after by the wealthy and influential, this is an example of that reason.

Mateba Ithaqua.name: Mateba Ithaqua
Mateba Ithaqua.description: The heavy and much newer version of the Model 207. The barrel had to be lengthened in order to keep the same accuracy.

Mateba Model 720.name: Mateba Model 720
Mateba Model 720.description: Modernized version of the Model 208, except for a much more aggressive look, its features are the same.

Mustang Arms Whisper II.name: Mustang Arms Whisper II
Mustang Arms Whisper II.description: Sitting on either side of this weapon are clamps, which seal the firing chamber, venting the gasses through the bottom of the weapons handle. The shrouded barrel is heavily insulated and serves as an effective sound baffle, creating a very suppressed weapon that cannot be heard from more than 15 meters away without augmentation.

Norse Technologies Hoggspjot.name: Norse Technologies Hoggspjot
Norse Technologies Hoggspjot.description: A new revolver design from the leading name in anti-cyborg handguns. A particularly intimidating one at that. This weapon, while more powerful than most weapons out there, is one of the tamer models to come from Norse Technologies.

Nova Arms Model 757 Cityhunter.name: Nova Arms Model 757 Cityhunter
Nova Arms Model 757 Cityhunter.description: Feeding of a cylinder with a 2x6 bullets clip. Laser sigth included. Must stop to shoot every six shots to reload the internal cylinder.

Nova Arms Pocket.name: Nova Arms Pocket
Nova Arms Pocket.description: This is a very small revolver, especially for the round it fires. Streetgangs and women are especially fond of this weapon. To reload it, you must remove the cylinder, and hand reload it, although for 10 eb, additional cylinders can be purchased. For some reason, the weapon comes with a detachable stock.

Nova Arms Stallone.name: Nova Arms Stallone
Nova Arms Stallone.description: The smaller model in the Nova Plasmatic Pistols Collection. The battery, which provides the energy for 100 shots costs 200$.

Ruger Bison.name: Ruger Bison
Ruger Bison.description: The Bison is making a name for itself among the law enforcement and hunting communities.

Ruger Ranger.name: Ruger Ranger
Ruger Ranger.description: An extremely reliable wheelgun from Ruger, popular with nomads, law enforcement, survivalists, hunters and anyone who never wants their weapon to fail at the wrong time. Pack enough of a punch to get you out of near anything.

Smith & Wesson Beefeater.name: Smith & Wesson Beefeater
Smith & Wesson Beefeater.description: An intimidating and ugly wheelgun, big enough to get the job done, without breaking your wrist.

Smith & Wesson Coldsnap.name: Smith & Wesson Coldsnap
Smith & Wesson Coldsnap.description: Another fine revolver from Smith and Wesson, very stylish with clean lines and hard hitting enough to serve all your needs.

Smith & Wesson Mod. 286.name: Smith & Wesson Mod. 286
Smith & Wesson Mod. 286.description: A weapon popular with professionals as a holdout weapon.

Stein & Wasserman Bi-Power Handcannon.name: Stein & Wasserman Bi-Power Handcannon
Stein & Wasserman Bi-Power Handcannon.description: A firing switch allows to choose one gaunge or the other, depending on the firepower wanted. Values between brackets are those for the revolver (ammo : .44 (4D6)).

Texas Arms .44 Enforcer.name: Texas Arms .44 Enforcer
Texas Arms .44 Enforcer.description: The heir to heavy revolvers of the last century. This type of model is still very popular among nomads and truck drivers in the southern states.

Colt Larr Ted.name: Colt Larr Ted
Colt Larr Ted.description: The buying of the Larr company by Colt lead to the releaseof this really compact weapon, with a decent power for self-defense. If you want to pack a bit more punch and range, a conversion kit allow you to convert it to 10 mm by changing the barrell and cylinder (-1 10 mm 2d6+3 25m).

Eagletech 20-Pipe.name: Eagletech 20-Pipe
Eagletech 20-Pipe.description: It's often the simplest ideas that works best. Designers at Eagletech probably had this in mind when they created this sel-defense weapon, which is little more than a plastic pipe loaded with a single 20-gauge shell. It can be loaded with non-lethal rounds. The most serious drawback is the short life of the weapon, the barrel breaking definitively approximatively 1 in 5 shots...

Federated Arms Cheesemaker.name: Federated Arms Cheesemaker
Federated Arms Cheesemaker.description: A nice little pistol sized .20ga shotgun, built to compete with Militech's Crusher. Actually the sales of this weapon have surpassed those of the Crusher, due to this weapons lower price tag.

Remington Handcannon.name: Remington Handcannon
Remington Handcannon.description: Remington sells what strongly resembles a sawed-off shotgun. However, instead of being made by hand, with a very random precision, this weapon has benefited from the firm's know-how.

Stein & Wasserman Tri-Star.name: Stein & Wasserman Tri-Star
Stein & Wasserman Tri-Star.description: Laser sight "cone-like" for shot ammo, cost : 100 eb. The .41B ammunition can't be bought on the civilian market.

UrbanTech Cal-20 Pistol.name: UrbanTech Cal-20 Pistol
UrbanTech Cal-20 Pistol.description: A shot handgun of respectable power. Legally rated as a shotgun.

9A-91.name: 9A-91
9A-91.description: The A-91 is designed for special operations close combat roles. Its action is derived from the AK-74U, but the rest of the weapon resembles the Vikhr SR-3. Accepts the GP-30 and screw on supressors.

AN-94 Abakan.name: AN-94 Abakan
AN-94 Abakan.description: The AN is more accurate than earlier russian designs, using the smaller cartridge and a system called "blowback shifted pulse", where the bolt and receiver reciprocate independantly during firing. This permits extremely fast 2 round bursts to be fired.

Armalite AR-18.name: Armalite AR-18
Armalite AR-18.description: M16 competitor at his time, his high price is caused by his high rarity.

AS Val.name: AS Val
AS Val.description: Silenced assault rifle designed for special operations units.

Beretta AR70-90.name: Beretta AR70-90
Beretta AR70-90.description: The AR70/90 is a very rugged weapon. It includes a three-round burst setting. The barrel can be quickly replaced if it is required. May attach a standard sight instead of its carrying handle. Operates the M203 grenade launcher.

Bushmaster M-17S.name: Bushmaster M-17S
Bushmaster M-17S.description: The Bushmaster is a compact, rugged and accurate weapon. The large carrying handle in the top also serves as to cock the weapon, and includes iron sights although it can attach a variety of scopes. Can use M16 pattern magazines.

Colt Commando.name: Colt Commando
Colt Commando.description: A shortened version of the M-16, the Colt Commando is not as accurate as the original model. It has been used in jungle combat, and by police forces. The civilian, semi-auto version goes under the name of AR-15.

Colt M4.name: Colt M4
Colt M4.description: Essentially a compact M16, the M4 is large enough to fit an M203 grenade launcher. The accessory rail system also permit the use of scopes, illuminators, bipods and other such things on the weapon.

Colt M16A4.name: Colt M16A4
Colt M16A4.description: Essentially a M16A2 modernized with, for example, the add of a laser targeting and a handle under the barrel.

FAMAS F1.name: FAMAS F1
FAMAS F1.description: This French assault rifle made out of plastic material with a modern design. It has been made very accurate by the use of a foldable bipod. This rifle remains rare outside Europe.

FAMAS G2.name: FAMAS G2
FAMAS G2.description: Slightly upgraded version that accepts STANAG magazines (M16, M4, etc).

FN F2000.name: FN F2000
FN F2000.description: This assault rifle is equipped with a fire control computer and a 40 mm grenade launcher (accuracy : +2, magazine : 1, rate of fire : 1, range : 200 meters).

FN SCAR-L.name: FN SCAR-L
FN SCAR-L.description: It's possible to change the caliber of the weapon thanks to a kit (200 eb) allowing to replace the adequate parts (barrel, extractor, etc).

Heckler & Koch G11.name: Heckler & Koch G11
Heckler & Koch G11.description: This rifle has been in circulation for a long time. It has always been appreciated for its good design features and its accuracy.

Heckler & Koch G36.name: Heckler & Koch G36
Heckler & Koch G36.description: The G36 was the new German military rifle developed by HK in and adopted by the German military in 1997. It has folding stocks (that do nothing for their concealability), carrying handles, 3x optical sight and electronic red dot sight.

Heckler & Koch G36C.name: Heckler & Koch G36C
Heckler & Koch G36C.description: The G36C is the compact version of the G36, it's lighter, has a folding stock and design for close quarter combat.

Heckler & Koch G36K.name: Heckler & Koch G36K
Heckler & Koch G36K.description: The G36K is a shortened carbine version of the standard G36, it is lighter and has a folding stock.

Heckler & Koch G41.name: Heckler & Koch G41
Heckler & Koch G41.description: The G41 was designed to compete directly with the M16A2. This model used standard M-16 magazines (not interchangeable with the model 33 magazines) and had a fold-down carrying handle.

Heckler & Koch HK 33.name: Heckler & Koch HK 33
Heckler & Koch HK 33.description: The HK33 is the 5.56 mm caliber rifle that has anchored the NATO caliber line. Weighing in at 3.8 kg, this style of weapon is rapidly becoming a thing of the past as the world looks for ways to lighten an infantryman's load.

Heckler & Koch HK 33K.name: Heckler & Koch HK 33K
Heckler & Koch HK 33K.description: The HK33K is the shortened variant of the HK33 with a shorter barrel and a folding stock instead of a fixed one. The "K" means "Kurz" in German (short). With the stock unfolded the accuracy increases to +2.

Heckler & Koch HK 53.name: Heckler & Koch HK 53
Heckler & Koch HK 53.description: Designed for entry team work in today's tactical environment, the HK53 is typically seen in the A3 variation with retractable stock. The forend length has been shortened drastically to that of the MP5 series, affording the operator with a submachine gun-sized weapon with 5.56N power.

Heckler & Koch HK 416.name: Heckler & Koch HK 416
Heckler & Koch HK 416.description: The assault rifle HK 416 is a greatly improved version of the venerable M4A1.

Heckler & Koch SL8.name: Heckler & Koch SL8
Heckler & Koch SL8.description: The SL8 is ugly as a point of comparison to the G36. This gun as designed by ill-conceived laws that legislate guns by appearance.

Heckler & Koch XM8.name: Heckler & Koch XM8
Heckler & Koch XM8.description: Assault rifle close to the G36 which was originally intended to replace the M4 and M16 in the U.S. Army. This one abruptly stopped the project in 2005 because of its too high price, among other reasons.

Howa Type 89.name: Howa Type 89
Howa Type 89.description: Type 89 rifle was developed by Howa Machinery Company Ltd, for Japan Self-Defense Forces.

Imbel MD-2.name: Imbel MD-2
Imbel MD-2.description: MD-2 started as a simply scaled down FN FAL rifle (manufactured in Brasil under license as IMBEL LAR), but during the design time the FAL locking system (tilting block) was replaced by M16-type rotating bolt. The receiver design is, however, still very similar to FAL.

Imbel Model LC.name: Imbel Model LC
Imbel Model LC.description: Imbel Model LC compact version, here shown with the stock folded and a grip under the barrel. Note the FAMAS-like gripping and the plastic magazine useful to note remaining rounds.

IMI Galil SAR.name: IMI Galil SAR
IMI Galil SAR.description: The action and construction are similar to the AR, just more compact. The stock is folding and the barrel is shorter.

IMI TAR-21.name: IMI TAR-21
IMI TAR-21.description: The TAR-21 (Tavor Assault Rifle for 21st century) is a very modern design for its time and has inspired many assault rifles thereafter.

Kalashnikov AK74.name: Kalashnikov AK74
Kalashnikov AK74.description: This rifle is used by the Russian army since the beginning of the nineties. The AK-74 has a lost some of its fire power compared to the original AK-47, but has gained in accuracy, range, and in rate of fire. It remains hard to find, as currently few of these weapons have left Russia.

Kalashnikov AKS-74U.name: Kalashnikov AKS-74U
Kalashnikov AKS-74U.description: Assault rifle cocked the tanks infantry and Beta Spetnaz special forces, paratroopers. By his low recoil and his very small volume, it is a great weapon.

Magpul Masada.name: Magpul Masada
Magpul Masada.description: The Masada represents an amalgamation of several rifle designs, incorporating what is considered by its designers to be the best features of each in a single, lightweight, modular rifle platform.

Norinco QBZ Type 95 Rifle.name: Norinco QBZ Type 95 Rifle
Norinco QBZ Type 95 Rifle.description: The bullpup action of the Type 95 is housed entirely inside its plastic casing. It has iron sights and can mount scopes on the carrying handle.

Norinco QBZ Type 95B Carbine.name: Norinco QBZ Type 95B Carbine
Norinco QBZ Type 95B Carbine.description: Essentially a miniature Type 95 Rifle, the Carbine cannot support a 40 mm grenade launcher like its counterpart and cannot mount scopes. It is suited for close-in fighting, with a shortened barrel and an enlarged trigger guard to use as a grip for the free hand.

OTs-14 Groza.name: OTs-14 Groza
OTs-14 Groza.description: A firing selector allows to choice to fire with the assault rifle or the 40 mm grenade-launcher (accuracy : 0, magazine : 1, rate of fire : 1, range : 150 meters). This version is less accuracy (accuracy : 0) because of the disappearance of the handle that allows better stabilize the weapon. A conversion kit lets you go on with one another.

Royal Enfield L85A1 IW.name: Royal Enfield L85A1 IW
Royal Enfield L85A1 IW.description: This weapon, advanced for its time was adopted by the british army during the eighties. It's also rare outside the UK borders.

Sig Sauer SG-552.name: Sig Sauer SG-552
Sig Sauer SG-552.description: The SIG 552 is the standard assault weapon of NATO special forces. It uses standard 5.56 mm rounds, and features a shorter length than most full size assault rifles. The SIG 552 also features a selector switch that allows you to choose between single shot, three round bursts and full-auto. This is a common weapon the world over and can be found in most major countries.

SR-3 Vikhr.name: SR-3 Vikhr
SR-3 Vikhr.description: A compact version of the AS-Val, again a special operations designed rifle.

Steyr Aug.name: Steyr Aug
Steyr Aug.description: The magazine is made of translucent plastic allowing to see the remaining rounds.

Vektor CR-21.name: Vektor CR-21
Vektor CR-21.description: The CR-21 is housed in an ergonomic plastic shell and arranged in a bullpup configuration. The center of gravity for the weapon is over the pistol grip, making the weapon usable accuratly with one hand. The gun can mount scopes, illuminators and other accessories.

ZM LR 300.name: ZM LR 300
ZM LR 300.description: The RS 300 is a conversion of the Colt M4 and is characterized by a new system of borrowing for gas, more efficient than the original system and allows to free themselves of this mechanism inside of conventional telescopic or fixed butts. This modification therefore allows the use of butts folding.The weapon has the advantage of being extremely flexible, practical both in CQB (Close Combat Battle) over distances of engagement important. It is also rewarded with a reliability and easy to control by using automatic continuous firing.

AMD-65.name: AMD-65
AMD-65.description: Hungarian variant of the famous AK47, more accurate thanks to its front grip. Also accepts standard 30 rounds magazines.

Beretta BM59.name: Beretta BM59
Beretta BM59.description: Italian rifle put into service in the 50s to replace the aging M1 Garand.

DSA SA58 OSW.name: DSA SA58 OSW
DSA SA58 OSW.description: A complete overhaul of the aging FN FAL with multiple options. A must !

FN FAL.name: FN FAL
FN FAL.description: The extremely popular FAL uses extensively composite materials, bringing the weight down. Its automatic fire is not very accurate, so semiautomatic is preferred by most.

Heckler & Koch G3 A3.name: Heckler & Koch G3 A3
Heckler & Koch G3 A3.description: G3 is a heavy assault rifle. It is reliable, accurate and powerful. Used by NATO forces throughout the world, it can be found especialy in Australia, Mexico, Bangladesh, in Central Africa and in Norway.

Howa Type 64.name: Howa Type 64
Howa Type 64.description: The Type 64 was the standard assault rifle of the Japanese army from 1965 to 1988. It was never exported out of Japan.

IMI Galil AR.name: IMI Galil AR
IMI Galil AR.description: Technicaly close to the AK-47, this Israelian rifle has proved its efficiency during several conflicts in the Middle-East. There exists a 5,56 version, which has an accuracy of +1, and a 30 round magazine. Extended 35 round magazines for 7,62 and 5,56 can be found.

Kalashnikov AK47.name: Kalashnikov AK47
Kalashnikov AK47.description: Versions that have a foldable stock can be concealed under a long coat (accuracy : -2). Numerous versions exist : shortened, fires in 3-round bursts...

L1A1 SLR.name: L1A1 SLR
L1A1 SLR.description: The L1A1 semi-automatic rifle is the British version of the FN FAL. It differs essentially by the impossibility of firing in auto. Built in England, Australia and India, it armed most of the Commonwealth countries.

M14.name: M14
M14.description: Legacy of the Garand M1 rifle, the M14 has been the American standard rifle from the fifties to the seventies, and has been still used in the eighties. Though it can fire in full-automatic mode, it has a tendancy to overheat during such use.

M14V.name: M14V
M14V.description: One of the many modernized variants of the M14.

OTs-14 Groza 7.62.name: OTs-14 Groza 7.62
OTs-14 Groza 7.62.description: This assault rifle, closest to the precision rifle, is a modified version of OTs-14 of Russian special forces. It uses AK47 magazines and comes with a silencer.

SA vz.58.name: SA vz.58
SA vz.58.description: This assault rifle, despite a certain resemblance with AK47 is designed differently but it has a poor accuracy like the AK47.

Sig Sauer SG-510-4.name: Sig Sauer SG-510-4
Sig Sauer SG-510-4.description: Standard rifle of the Swiss army, the SG-510 is rare outside of Switzerland. A few models have been sold to South-American states though. This weapon in part caused the defeat of US forces in 2010.

Valmet Rk. 95.name: Valmet Rk. 95
Valmet Rk. 95.description: This weapon comes with a silencer.

Arasaka BAR-54.name: Arasaka BAR-54
Arasaka BAR-54.description: This bullpup assault rifle is a favorite among police and SDF forces in Japan, and with its built in 40 mm grenade launcher you can go in prepared for anything.

Arasaka BOX-4.name: Arasaka BOX-4
Arasaka BOX-4.description: These weapons are highly illegal outside of military and governemtn use almost everywhere in the world due to their high concealability. Fully loaded the weapon folds up into an easy to store shape, that most people would never assume to be a weapon.

Arasaka WAA Bullpup.name: Arasaka WAA Bullpup
Arasaka WAA Bullpup.description: Optional : survival bayonet (damage : 3D6 AP, 30 eb), bipod (accuracy : +2, 20 eb), and a standard grenade launcher.

Armalite URM-7.name: Armalite URM-7
Armalite URM-7.description: Designed for urban warfare, this is a competent and reliable weapon. The adjustable stock is a nice touch.

Budget Arms Leslie.name: Budget Arms Leslie
Budget Arms Leslie.description: A good way of getting rid of old cased 5,56 ammunition. The Leslie rifle is in the line of medium power rifles with good accuracy. Like the M-16, but more reliable.

CCMMC KS-32.name: CCMMC KS-32
CCMMC KS-32.description: This is a chinese heavy assault rifle, used by chinese troops and their allies worldwide.

Chadran Arms RR-504.name: Chadran Arms RR-504
Chadran Arms RR-504.description: A standard assault rifle with a nicely adjustable stock. Strictly no frills, but seen everywhere.

Colt-Seburo Type-0 Raisen.name: Colt-Seburo Type-0 Raisen
Colt-Seburo Type-0 Raisen.description: Colt and Seburo once again cooperated to design this (very) shortened version of the M4 assault rifle. They needed all their know-how to make it as accurate as it is short, which explains its consequent price.

Colt M-18.name: Colt M-18
Colt M-18.description: Sold with a scope. Versions with camouflage (850 eb), personalized camouflage (900 eb) and smartlink (up to 200 meters) (750 eb) are available.

Cyberdyn M22.name: Cyberdyn M22
Cyberdyn M22.description: US Army's command, the M22 is an extremely short assault rifle intended for vehicles crews. It's equiped with an integrated laser sight, tactical light, aimpoint and silencer.

Cybertronic CAW2000.name: Cybertronic CAW2000
Cybertronic CAW2000.description: The CAW2000, built for CyberTronic by Cybersecurity Inc., is a close assault rifle with integral grenade launcher. The only drawback to this weapon design is that the grenade launcher cannot be used when the bayonet (normally hidden inside the stock) is attached to the barrel.

Dai Lung DR-40.name: Dai Lung DR-40
Dai Lung DR-40.description: An inexpensive, but not poorly designed rifle, popular with many thrid world militaries, police forces, and civilians worldwide.

Darra-Polytechnic M-9.name: Darra-Polytechnic M-9
Darra-Polytechnic M-9.description: Caliber 5,5DH version is available : hollow tipped ammunition. 4D6+2, armor SP x 2, damage that penetrates x 1,5.

Darra-Polytechnic WA-30.name: Darra-Polytechnic WA-30
Darra-Polytechnic WA-30.description: One of the simplest, most straighforward weapon designs we have seen in a long time. No extras, and the slim compact design makes it easy to carry under a long coat. A favorite among undercover police and criminals alike.

Fabrica de Armas Malachai.name: Fabrica de Armas Malachai
Fabrica de Armas Malachai.description: A very sleek, highly maneuverable assault rifle with a removable stock for close quarters work.

FAMAS G4C.name: FAMAS G4C
FAMAS G4C.description: This new FAMAS is the resumption of concept of H&K G11, with the magazine on top of the weapon.

FN Grunter.name: FN Grunter
FN Grunter.description: A new rifle from FN, comes complete with underbarrel grenade launcher. A true workhorse for the battlefield.

FN HAR.name: FN HAR
FN HAR.description: Popular with special forces and vehicle crews alike, this assault rifle featured a single shot 25 mm GL. It's rail system allows for a variety of scopes, laser sights, bayonets or other attachments, and the weapons bullpup configuration make it ideal for close quarters.

Heckler & Koch FAR-4.name: Heckler & Koch FAR-4
Heckler & Koch FAR-4.description: A very nice, if somewhat large assault rifle. Smartchipping is available, and the weapon features a digital shot counter, letting you know exactly how many shots you have left in your weapon. For night misisons where steath is required you can turn the counter off.

Heckler & Koch G12A3Z.name: Heckler & Koch G12A3Z
Heckler & Koch G12A3Z.description: Precursor to the G6 MG, The G12A3Z was the next logical step from the G11. Improving on the best characteristics of the G11, the G12 is lighter, less bulky, and equipped with integral laser sight (+1 WA included above), gas venting (+1 WA full auto) and telescoping shoulder-stock. It fires the same 6 mm rounds as the G6.

Heckler & Koch G38.name: Heckler & Koch G38
Heckler & Koch G38.description: Tight and compact, the G38 is an assault system geared to fit in your budget without sacrificing quality or reliability.

Heckler & Koch Goblin.name: Heckler & Koch Goblin
Heckler & Koch Goblin.description: An odd bullpup design, this is a fairly accurate certainly cost effective assault rifle. Unfortunately it is a high maintenance weapon, not recommended for anything other than urban environments. Because of this the weapon has yet to make a single contract with any military or government. Its ammo magazine serves as a shoulder stock as well.

Heckler & Koch GR-56.name: Heckler & Koch GR-56
Heckler & Koch GR-56.description: H&K is always trying new things, and this new assault rifle is the most accurate fully automatic weapon we have ever seen.

Heckler & Koch MPXS1.name: Heckler & Koch MPXS1
Heckler & Koch MPXS1.description: Loosely designed around the GS series of weapons, the MPXS1 from Heckler and Koch is a full sniper/assault system.
