The bullpup design makes for a more stable trajectory due to longer barrel allowance. It is also capable of 3 round burst and full auto fire for suppression. It comes complete with scope and barrel shroud is fully insulated to act as a suppressor.

Kalashnikov AK-18.name: Kalashnikov AK-18
Kalashnikov AK-18.description: A Neo-Soviet replacement for the old AK variants. It can be equipped with a variety of attachments : the GP-43 Grenade launcher (which fires standard 40 mm grenades), a larger trigger guard can be equipped for use by full-borgs, ACPA and troops wearing heavy gloves, a folding stock and a bayonet. A shorter barrel model is used for close combat operations. The weapon system has become the weapon of choice for South American revolutionaries.

Kalashnikov AK77 Supergun.name: Kalashnikov AK77 Supergun
Kalashnikov AK77 Supergun.description: Having exceptional accuracy, the AK77 is unfortunately made only for the Russian police, and isn't sold in western countries. It's a fragile rifle, sensitive to shocks and moisture. However, a version used by Russian army commandos (very rare, 2000 eb), has a waterproof polymer body.

Kalashnikov AK127.name: Kalashnikov AK127
Kalashnikov AK127.description: A modernized version of the legendary AK47, the AK127 combines all the advantages of a modern weapon while retaining the design that made the success of its illustrious ancestor.

Kalashnikov AKR20 Medium Assault.name: Kalashnikov AKR20 Medium Assault
Kalashnikov AKR20 Medium Assault.description: A design directly inspired from the British Company, Enfield's creations during the last century.

Kalashnikov AKSU91.name: Kalashnikov AKSU91
Kalashnikov AKSU91.description: Shortened version of the AK74. It is still used by paratroopers and corporate militias. Ideal for jungles and narrow urban environments.

Kamaha Kalch.name: Kamaha Kalch
Kamaha Kalch.description: This weapon is used by the Indian army. It is also sold in foreign countries cheaply. The "Kalch" is an identical copy of the russian AKM and uses the same type of ammunition.

MAS AAR.name: MAS AAR
MAS AAR.description: This rifle is used by elite European commandos, and also by special operation forces of the gendarmes and police. It's very rare among civilians and outside of France.

Metacorp AUR-333.name: Metacorp AUR-333
Metacorp AUR-333.description: Simple, easy to use, highly reliable, and the bullpup configuration creates a lower profile for the user.

Metacorp BR-55 A2.name: Metacorp BR-55 A2
Metacorp BR-55 A2.description: Stylish assault rifle, the BR-55 included an aimpoint as standard.

Metacorp SE-23.name: Metacorp SE-23
Metacorp SE-23.description: Although this assault rifle is a shameless copy of Seburo's design, it is an honourable one. It is equipped with a 40 mm grenade launcher (accuracy : 0, magazine : 1).

Militech M31-A1.name: Militech M31-A1
Militech M31-A1.description: 25 mm Militech Mini Grenade launcher included. It's in the equipment chapter.

Militech Ronin Light Assault.name: Militech Ronin Light Assault
Militech Ronin Light Assault.description: The Militech Ronin standard edition is the classic light assault rifle of the modern battlefield. It only weighs 3 kilograms loaded.

Okusa Light Assault.name: Okusa Light Assault
Okusa Light Assault.description: A very short automatic rifle which fires old 5.56 Armalite Ammunition. It's reliable, accurate and can be concealed under a long coat. Only its price is a bit higher than what can be expected for this type of weapon. Still almost unknown in USA, this weapon may have a good success there in the future.

Royal Enfield L87.name: Royal Enfield L87
Royal Enfield L87.description: Assault rifle coming from the UK, inspired by H&K weapons. Bipod included for long and extreme range firing.

Royal Enfield L92.name: Royal Enfield L92
Royal Enfield L92.description: Bullpup assault rifle with a grenade launcher as standard (accuracy : 0, magazine : 1).

Royal Enfield SA-90.name: Royal Enfield SA-90
Royal Enfield SA-90.description: Assault rifle with a modern design, shockproof, water-proof and corrosion-proof. It's the assault rifle for extreme conditions. Commonly used in Europe.

SCI TTA.name: SCI TTA
SCI TTA.description: Rather accustomed to (very) poor quality weapons, SCI improves his reputation a little by bringing out a modern-looking assault rifle that is not without reminding a certain Steyr Aug.

SCI Volga M15.name: SCI Volga M15
SCI Volga M15.description: SCI still delivers us a copy of a famous weapon, among others the P90. Nevertheless it was transformed to shoot the 5.56, which is reflected in its accuracy and reliability. Moreover, even if the Volga M15 is the size of its ancestor, it cannot be hidden because of its magazine. But at this price you can't have everything.

Seburo ACR-556.name: Seburo ACR-556
Seburo ACR-556.description: Feeding from a large, top mounted, helical clip, this bullpup assault rifle is making serious waves in the police and military communities. While generally too expensive for mass issue in the military, special forces and SWAT teams drool over them. Its high ammo count, relatively compact size and Seburo quality and accuracy make it a highly sought after weapon.

Seburo CZN-M22.name: Seburo CZN-M22
Seburo CZN-M22.description: The CZN-M22 appears to be a direct descendent of the FN P90. It features a selector switch that allows you to choose between single shot, three round bursts and full-auto. It also comes with a field kit which includes interchangeable barrels for firing HV loads without adverse effects.

Seburo MN-23.name: Seburo MN-23
Seburo MN-23.description: The standard version of the Seburo MN series.

Seburo MN-23C.name: Seburo MN-23C
Seburo MN-23C.description: Compact version of the famous MN-23.

Seburo MN-40.name: Seburo MN-40
Seburo MN-40.description: The MN-40, a commando version of the MN-23, has essentially the same features except for its more compact design and a charger reminiscent of the C-X. The stock can easily be removed (accuracy : 0) to hide it under a coat.

Seburo MN-41.name: Seburo MN-41
Seburo MN-41.description: The MN-41 is in fact an MN-40 to which a longer barrel, a grenade launcher (accuracy : +1, magazine : 1, rate : 1) and a scope have been added. If it did not have this grenade launcher and a larger caliber it could almost be used as a precision rifle.

Seburo PDW-17.name: Seburo PDW-17
Seburo PDW-17.description: Version calibrated in 4,7 mm of the PDW-16, this weapon never known the same success that its big sister and the sales remained confidential. One of the rare Seburo's failure. The scope is not sold in standard.

Seburo PDW-18.name: Seburo PDW-18
Seburo PDW-18.description: The PDW-18 was the first step to the reference design of Seburo.

Seburo PDW-19.name: Seburo PDW-19
Seburo PDW-19.description: Second step to the reference design of Seburo, the PDW-19 had even a lot of assets to please.

Steyr Aug ST-97.name: Steyr Aug ST-97
Steyr Aug ST-97.description: Steyr once again moving the next step in radical design and sleek sensibility with the ST-97. A very pretty, and very effective, weapon at home in the jungles or on the street.

Steyr KR-27.name: Steyr KR-27
Steyr KR-27.description: The KR-27, another damn fine assault rifle from Steyr, with elegant style and a rugged expression of functionality and form.

Stolvoboy DROZ-6.name: Stolvoboy DROZ-6
Stolvoboy DROZ-6.description: Another Russian equivalent of the Heckler and Koch M-52AR and the Arasaka Morita. A rather unique innovation is the fact that the assault rifles magazine loads into the rear of the stock. It also features a magazine fed 6 shot 25 mm grenade launcher.

Stolvoboy ST-5.name: Stolvoboy ST-5
Stolvoboy ST-5.description: A Russian rifle made for all weather conditions and rugged treatment. Smartlink version for 1800 eb.

Tsunami Arms BR-404.name: Tsunami Arms BR-404
Tsunami Arms BR-404.description: This Japanese battle rifle features a suppressed barrel and built in grenade launcher and integral laser sight. Smartchipping is available.

Arasaka AR-629.name: Arasaka AR-629
Arasaka AR-629.description: Lightweight, reliable and acurate, a commonly seen weapon worldwide from Arasaka.

Arasaka JDF-AR.name: Arasaka JDF-AR
Arasaka JDF-AR.description: This strange assault rifle was created especially for the Japan Self-Defense Forces (JSDF). It is standard equipped with a bayonet (damage : 2D6) and, quite rare, with electrothermal ammunition. By removing the bayonet the accuracy increases to +2, because it makes the front of the gun heavier.

Arasaka LBR-84.name: Arasaka LBR-84
Arasaka LBR-84.description: Made for the battlefield this assault rifle grenade launcher combo is has become a staple in many militaries around the world. It features a retracting stock, pump action grenade launcher (0 25mm 1 1 ST 150m) and an integral laser site.

Arasaka SA-456.name: Arasaka SA-456
Arasaka SA-456.description: Arasaka's newest assault rifle, with built in 40 mm underbarrel grenade launcher. The 60 round drum magazine almost makes this a light squad assault weapon, but the weight, size, and versatility keep in nicely in the assault rifle realm.

Arasaka SA-460.name: Arasaka SA-460
Arasaka SA-460.description: The big brother of the SA-456. Chambered in 7,62 mm Caseless. A bit more accurate due to the longer barrel.

Arasaka Storm.name: Arasaka Storm
Arasaka Storm.description: Similar to the LBR in appearance this weapon features a butt loading magazine for the 7.62 barrel and regualr clip feed for the shotgun. It is part of Arasaka's new line of assault weapons and is highly recommended. Also included is an integral laser sight. Barrel selection is a switch at the butt of the weapon on the magazine shroud.

Australian Ammo Glarr.name: Australian Ammo Glarr
Australian Ammo Glarr.description: An australian assault rifle with an well-made integrated grenade launcher (0 40 mm 2 1 VR 200m).

CCMMC Jinhua M-7.name: CCMMC Jinhua M-7
CCMMC Jinhua M-7.description: A good copy of the FN-RAL rifle, made in China.

CCMMC KS-36.name: CCMMC KS-36
CCMMC KS-36.description: A Chinese copy of the H&K G36, this assault rifle turned out to be much less disappointing than expected.

Colt AR-55.name: Colt AR-55
Colt AR-55.description: A standard assault rifle manufactured by Colt.

Colt Mantora.name: Colt Mantora
Colt Mantora.description: Very heavy, very hard hitting, and very durable. The Colt Mantora is an excellent example of Colt craftsmanship and high standards. The weapon comes with a cleaning kit stored in the butt of the rifle.

Cyberdyn CGW-06.name: Cyberdyn CGW-06
Cyberdyn CGW-06.description: Designed to stand up to any abuse, the harshest conditions, and the worst climates, the Cyberdyn CGW-06 is a workhorse. The built in grenade launcher (0 40mm 5 1 VR 200m) and high capacity double thick magazine keep this weapon on the forefront of the battleground.

Cybertronic AR3000 Assault Rifle.name: Cybertronic AR3000 Assault Rifle
Cybertronic AR3000 Assault Rifle.description: The AR3000 has an integrated pump-action 40 mm grenade launcher below the barrel. A very expensive state of the art assault weapon, the AR3000 is also made of orbital steels sealed in an impact-proof polymer shell.

Dai Lung AR-20C.name: Dai Lung AR-20C
Dai Lung AR-20C.description: Assault rifle designed by stealing ideas from other firms, it is like its look, bad. Grenade launcher (accuracy : -1, magazine : 1) as standard. By putting it on its bipod, the accuracy goes to 0.

Fabrica de Armas M-2012.name: Fabrica de Armas M-2012
Fabrica de Armas M-2012.description: Can be adapted to 7,62S (5D6), 7,62N (5D6+2), 7,62C (6D6+2). Fully automatic version (rate of fire 4/25) for 1600 eb.

Federated Arms BR-328.name: Federated Arms BR-328
Federated Arms BR-328.description: A decent assault rifle from Federated arms, although it falls short in the accuracy department. A retracting stock is standard.

Federated Arms SK19.name: Federated Arms SK19
Federated Arms SK19.description: A nice design from FA, but too way heavy for extended use in the field. Grenade launcher (-1 40mm 1 1 ST 150m).

Heckler & Koch HK81.name: Heckler & Koch HK81
Heckler & Koch HK81.description: A recent assault rifle, which challenges the FN-RAL and Kalashnikov heavy rifles. An 50 bullets oversized clip is available, but it can cause some problems of overheating in automatic mode (reliability : standard).

Heckler & Koch VGR-13.name: Heckler & Koch VGR-13
Heckler & Koch VGR-13.description: A perbly designed assault rifle from Heckler and Koch, chambered in 7.62 and featuring a built in 25 mm grenade launcher. Truly a premiere weapon able to make itself perfectly at home on any battlefield.

IMI Galil Patriot.name: IMI Galil Patriot
IMI Galil Patriot.description: An update of the old assault rifle Galil, with a plastic cased ammo, ceramic mechanisms, bipod and polymer plastic body, which making it an excellent weapon.

Kalashnikov AKZ-103.name: Kalashnikov AKZ-103
Kalashnikov AKZ-103.description: The last weapon in the Kalishnikov line, upholding tradition and reliability on the battlefield.

Malorian Arms EAW-09.name: Malorian Arms EAW-09
Malorian Arms EAW-09.description: The best name in firearms brings us another fine example of their craftsmanship. The EAW-09 assault rifle is constructed from the latest in composite polymers and ceramics, and is as acurate as a sniper rifle while maintaining the durability and rate of fire of a world class battle rifle. Comes standard smartchipped.

MAS Urban Assault.name: MAS Urban Assault
MAS Urban Assault.description: Successor of the MAS AAR, this impressive assault rifle is used, among others, by elite European units.

Metacorp SSR.name: Metacorp SSR
Metacorp SSR.description: Incorporating all possible modern improvements (drum magazine, accessory rail, etc), this assault rifle, closer to light support, is a great success from Metacorp. Too bad that the grenade launcher (accuracy : -1, magazine : 1) is not up to the rest.

Mexican Metals ACR-461.name: Mexican Metals ACR-461
Mexican Metals ACR-461.description: A sturdy and reliable weapon, well respected and capable of holding its own against all threats.

Militech AG-17.name: Militech AG-17
Militech AG-17.description: A good assault rifle with a very high rate of fire thanks to its very light bolt carrier. It is equipped as standard with a grenade launcher (accuracy : +1, magazine : 4, rate of fire : 1).

Militech AR-68.name: Militech AR-68
Militech AR-68.description: A workhorse one the field and a trusted friend off. This weapon is perfect for security and police forces, as well as a light battle rifle with troops.

Militech Dragon.name: Militech Dragon
Militech Dragon.description: Shortened version of the MK IV rifle.

Militech GNG-H01.name: Militech GNG-H01
Militech GNG-H01.description: An assault rifle for general infantry, sturdy and rugged. Comes with scope mounting (scope not provided).

Militech M-52.name: Militech M-52
Militech M-52.description: An assault weapon built for the urban environment with a grenade launcher slide cocked. The rifle features digital ammo counter and high ammo capacity by triple stacking the ammunition in the magazine.

Militech MAR-26.name: Militech MAR-26
Militech MAR-26.description: Yet another assault rifle from Militech, their R&D boys must get paid by the hour.

Norinco Type 121.name: Norinco Type 121
Norinco Type 121.description: This is basically the Chinese version of the Militech M-52, and other than a few cosmetic changes, the weapons are virtually identical. The high ammo count, just as in the M-52, is achieved by triple stacking the ammunition in the magazine.

Nova Arms RMG-23.name: Nova Arms RMG-23
Nova Arms RMG-23.description: Just shy of being a full fledged support weapon, the RMG-23 is a rather large rifle built for sustained fire and supportive use. A barrel extension comes with the weapon and fits snugly alongside the barrel for distance shots. The weapon is very versatile, and accepts a 40 round magazine or belt fed ammunition.

Royal Enfield Ordnance 7,5 mm LPA1.name: Royal Enfield Ordnance 7,5 mm LPA1
Royal Enfield Ordnance 7,5 mm LPA1.description: Liquid propellant weapon. Damage varies with the setting of the gun : 6D6, 4D6 or 2D6+1. Multi-dart shell 7,5W : several darts hit the target : SR: 1D6, MR: 1D3, LR: 1D6-3. Each dart causes between 2D6 and 4D6 AP, depending on the power chosen. 20 eb for 10 shells.

Ruger Stecker.name: Ruger Stecker
Ruger Stecker.description: A finely crafted assault rifle with bullpup frame and easy action. The rate of fire on full auto is kept low so as not to waste ammunition and the weapon is commonly seen serving in many military and police forces.

Seburo CZN-M27.name: Seburo CZN-M27
Seburo CZN-M27.description: Seburo has reworked the CZN-M22, augmented the caliber and brought out an assault rifle with unmatched firepower.

Seburo M487.name: Seburo M487
Seburo M487.description: A strange design for this weapon designed by Seburo on a special order from the US Army. The latter wanted an assault rifle with large capacity. This wish was concretized thanks to a drum magazine and a loading system derived from the FN P90. However, the magazine tends to affect the balance of the weapon, which is detrimental to its accuracy.

Seburo PDW-16.name: Seburo PDW-16
Seburo PDW-16.description: One of the first weapon made by Seburo. It was commanded by Japanese Defence Forces to equipe non fighting personnel. Compact, using powerful ammo and with a simple and cheap design, it was able to seduce far away the japanese borders. It is equiped with a tactical light and magazines of 25 bullets are available.

Stein & Wasserman Z-212.name: Stein & Wasserman Z-212
Stein & Wasserman Z-212.description: This compact assault rifle from S&W is a popular choice among mercenaries and terrorists, as well as more legitimate consumers.

Steyr Super Aug.name: Steyr Super Aug
Steyr Super Aug.description: Perhaps the best rifle available on the european market, the Super-Aug have both the accuracy and a big-capacity clip, and of course an exemplary sturdiness. Commonly used by european militias.

Traveller Assault Rifle.name: Traveller Assault Rifle
Traveller Assault Rifle.description: By making various adjustments (accuracy : 0), the weapon can be hidden under a long coat.

Tsunami Arms AR-41.name: Tsunami Arms AR-41
Tsunami Arms AR-41.description: An uninspired but nevertheless reliable and robust assault rifle.

Tsunami Arms CR-25.name: Tsunami Arms CR-25
Tsunami Arms CR-25.description: A heavier version of the CR-21 chambered in 7.62 mm. They also fixed most of the flaws for this version. A 35 round magazine is available.

Armsel Protecta.name: Armsel Protecta
Armsel Protecta.description: This is a newer South African shotgun, similar to the Striker. It uses a revolving drum and a folding metal stock. Construction is of corrosion-resistant aluminum alloys. Cleaning may be infrequent unless non-lethal rounds are used.

Benelli M3 Super 90.name: Benelli M3 Super 90
Benelli M3 Super 90.description: The M3 Super 90 is a version of the Benelli M1 modified to use either pump action or semiautomatic as the press of a button. The M3 is used by military and police roles, especially SRT teams and antiterrorist units.

Benelli M4 Super 90.name: Benelli M4 Super 90
Benelli M4 Super 90.description: The M4 is a dual-action semiautomatic design, but can be switched over to a pump-action weapon as needed for special munitions. It uses a gas-operated firing system, improving its reliability. Recoil is low and the weapon performs excelently under field conditions.

Benelli Nova.name: Benelli Nova
Benelli Nova.description: With a extended magazine, the number of ammunitions can be changed to 6.

Beretta M3P.name: Beretta M3P
Beretta M3P.description: The M3P has also a manually operated pump-action mode for ammo that need it.

Daewoo USAS-12.name: Daewoo USAS-12
Daewoo USAS-12.description: Originally a joint design between Daewoo and the American company of Atchisson, the USAS-12 was classified as a Class III destructive device in the US and Atchisson dropped out of the partnership, feeling there would be little or no US sales. The original design was the Daewoo/Atchisson AA-12 Assault Shotgun, a selective fire shotgun designed to fire standard as well as exotic ammunition. This was later modified by Daewoo in the hopes of US sales and renamed the USAS-12, but the large ammunition capacity of the magazines dashed hopes of this too. Both weapons can be fed by large capacity box or drum magazines. The weapon is designed like an assault rifle, and bears a superficial resemblance to the M-16. The low rate of fire helps keep recoil low, especially during automatic fire.

Franchi PA3-215.name: Franchi PA3-215
Franchi PA3-215.description: Based on the SPAS-12, the PA3-215 is a tiny weapon similar in thought to the Ithaca Stakeout. The pump-action grip on the 215 has a pistol grip on it. The stock can be totally removed for maximum concealment.

Franchi SPAS-12.name: Franchi SPAS-12
Franchi SPAS-12.description: The SPAS 12 is one of the first dual-action shotguns, facilitating its use as either a semi-automatic or pump action design as needed. Both fixed and folding stocks are available.

Franchi SPAS-15.name: Franchi SPAS-15
Franchi SPAS-15.description: With the choice either standard pump or semiauto fire that is fast becoming standard to all Franchi shotguns, this is Scott Harada's fullsized shotgun of choice. Resembling an AR-15 and complete with folding stock, this shotgun is definately an intimidator and serves very well in an urban environment.

Heckler & Koch HK 512.name: Heckler & Koch HK 512
Heckler & Koch HK 512.description: The HK 512 features a gas-operated semi-automatic design. The weapon is covered in a non-reflective black finish. A special shot converter is available for the muzzle, ensuring the shot spreads evenly in a rectangular pattern, this would limit its use as a slug gun.

Ithaca M37.name: Ithaca M37
Ithaca M37.description: The archetype of the self-defense rifle in vogue in the last century. By lengthening the tubular magazine, the gun can hold 6 cartridges, even 8 by lengthening the barrel as well.

Ithaca Stakeout.name: Ithaca Stakeout
Ithaca Stakeout.description: Archetype of the self-defense rifle. Was fashionable during the last century.

Izhmash IZH-81.name: Izhmash IZH-81
Izhmash IZH-81.description: The IZH-81 uses a typical pump action arrangement, save for the detachable rifle-style box magazine.

Izhmash Saiga 12S.name: Izhmash Saiga 12S
Izhmash Saiga 12S.description: The Saiga 12S is essentially the Kalashkinov rifle action redesigned to fire shotgun rounds. Most everything from the AK has been kept, including control placement and appearance.

KS-23.name: KS-23
KS-23.description: The 23 mm KS-23 is the largest pump-action shotgun ever made. It fires shells so large and powerfull the recoil is noticable dangerous to the user, just imagine what it does to those its used on !

Mossberg Model 500.name: Mossberg Model 500
Mossberg Model 500.description: An American-made pump shotgun, it is available with folding stocks, Magna-Porting to reduce muzzle climb, pistol grips, sight mounts, and stockless versions, as desired. It's probably the shotgun with the widest amount of options available without having to make a special order.

Mossberg Model 500 Bullpup.name: Mossberg Model 500 Bullpup
Mossberg Model 500 Bullpup.description: A not so successful attempt to make the Mossberg 500 into a more effective combat weapon. While allowing the shotgun to retain a full length barrel while being as short as legally possible it has trouble with the extended action and trigger mechanism.

Mossberg Model 590.name: Mossberg Model 590
Mossberg Model 590.description: The 590 is the tactical follow-up to the Mossburg 500 sporting line. It includes a new 9 round magazine and can be fitted with a heat shield to protect the user from a hot barrel. It features a speed loader, a hollow space in the stock holding four slugs for rapid reloading.

Norinco M98.name: Norinco M98
Norinco M98.description: The chinese M98 is very similar to the american Remington 870. It features a composite stock and grips and a matte black finish. The M98 can be equipped with either ghost ring sights or a conventional bead-type foresight. Also modifiable is the existance of a pistol grip and stock, both of which are modular.

Pancor Jackhammer Mark 3-A2.name: Pancor Jackhammer Mark 3-A2
Pancor Jackhammer Mark 3-A2.description: A unique shotgun design that was years ahead of its time. Developed in the late 80's the Mark 3-A2 has a ten round ammo cassette which acts as both magazine and firing chamber. It accepts any standard 12 ga. load and when fully or partially loaded the ammo cassette can be mated with a special detonator base (an extra 50 eb) and plunger to become a lethal and reusable anti-personnel mine (AP mine damage is the damage of the ammunition used x the number of live rounds in the cassette... use maximum damage if device is stepped on or otherwise point blank).

Remington 11-87.name: Remington 11-87
Remington 11-87.description: This is the Remington 11-87 (a development of the 1100) modified for military use, used in those times when a pump-action weapon simply does throw out lead fast enough for your purposes. It differs from the standard 1100 in having rifle-type sights, better chrome inside the barrel, extended magazine, and a recoil pad on the butt that is almost a full inch thick.

Remington 870.name: Remington 870
Remington 870.description: This was originally a USMC development of the Remington 870 that was designed in the mid-1960s, and saw long service with that organization until officially replaced by the Mossberg M590 in the early 1990s. However, large numbers of these shotguns were still in service at the time of the Twilight War, both with all branches of the regular US Military and reserve forces (particularly with the Army National Guard).

RMB-93.name: RMB-93
RMB-93.description: This weapon is designed for use by Russian KGB and police forces. It is an unusual weapon, with the tubular magazine above the barrel, and the slide action being raked forward to eject a spent round and back to chamber a new round. When the slide is moved, the entire barrel moves as well. The weapon loads from the top and ejects from the bottom. This weapon has also been sold on the civilian market.

Sawn-off Shotgun.name: Sawn-off Shotgun
Sawn-off Shotgun.description: Shotguns are always popular weapons, and sawing off the barrel for a greater spread at close range is nothing new. This weapon takes it to the extreme. Most shotguns are shaved to the choke, this shotgun has actually had the choke shortened, dropping its ammo capacity to 2, but also enabling faster reloads and more concealability, and to further the conceivability factor, the stock has also been removed.

Steinkamp SW1.name: Steinkamp SW1
Steinkamp SW1.description: A greatly modernized version of the venerable double-barrel shotgun, this weapon is loaded by the stock by pressing the lever located under the trigger. It is also available in a wide range of hunting calibers.

Techno Arms MAG-7.name: Techno Arms MAG-7
Techno Arms MAG-7.description: In the terms of stopping power and short range firepower in general the 12 gauge shotguns are hard to beat, but most shotguns of conventional design are too long or has too small magazines for confined spaces operations, so designers of the Techno Arms developed a new concept of the shotgun, mixing the concept of the compact submachine gun and the concept of the pump shotgun.

Truvelo Neostead.name: Truvelo Neostead
Truvelo Neostead.description: This is a South African shotgun featuring twin tubular over-barrel magazines. A switch selects which magazine is feeding the weapon on a given shot; therefore, the user may have two types of ammunition ready at a time. The pump action is revered, in that the slide is pushed forwards to eject a spent round and back to feed a new round. Ejection of spent rounds is downwards. The surface of the weapon is shrouded in plastic to prevent catching on clothing and equipment during use.

Viking Arms SOS.name: Viking Arms SOS
Viking Arms SOS.description: The SOS operates on a conventional pump action design, with a tubular magazine below the barrel. The straight back stock reduces muzzle climb after it is fired.

Arasaka 77TA-20.name: Arasaka 77TA-20
Arasaka 77TA-20.description: This semi-automatic magazine fed 10 gauge is just what the doctor ordered when it comes to clearing rooms.

Blunderbuss.name: Blunderbuss
Blunderbuss.description: This weapon is a sawn off shotgun, with barrel reinforcement and CO2 cooled barrels so it may fire thermite rounds without damaging the barrels.

Budget Arms FF20.name: Budget Arms FF20
Budget Arms FF20.description: This shotgun use 20 gauge ammo, making it less effective against armored target. But it's light, easy to conceal and highly reliable. It's a good weapon for law-enforcement in moderate threat areas.

Budget Arms S-40.name: Budget Arms S-40
Budget Arms S-40.description: This pump action 12ga. shotgun holds 8 rounds and accepts a variety of shells. It is usually stowed in the vehicle, either across the front of the seat, or in the trunk. It features a removable stock, and whippet style handle.

Constitutional Arms M516D.name: Constitutional Arms M516D
Constitutional Arms M516D.description: The M516D, Double Model, is an over-and-under double-barreled variant of the 516S shotgun, restricted to military and in-house use. One of the few autoloading double-barreled shotguns on the market, it is much sought after, even with it's weight of over 14 pounds fully loaded. It can be fired with both barrels simultaneously (ROF 4) or in sequence (ROF 2).

Cybertronic SA-SG72001.name: Cybertronic SA-SG72001
Cybertronic SA-SG72001.description: Based on the now-extinct CyberSecurity SG7000 Shotgun, the SG72001 has been redesigned for semi-automatic fire only. The reasons for this were mainly that too many jams occured with the full automatic version, and with this weapon, which was developed for use in urban areas by Corporate Military Police officers, they couldn't afford such failures.

Enfield-Ubishi Last Chance.name: Enfield-Ubishi Last Chance
Enfield-Ubishi Last Chance.description: This last chance weapon is not much more than a plastictube loaded with a single 12 gauge cartridge. If a 1 is rolled when firing,roll again, on 1-3 the thing will blow, and is likely to tear your hand appart...

Federated Arms SG-10.name: Federated Arms SG-10
Federated Arms SG-10.description: An impressive weapon, likely to fill you with holes before you realize what's happening.

Franchi Gendarme.name: Franchi Gendarme
Franchi Gendarme.description: A clean, streamlined shotgun, designed for use with police officer's. There are virtually no "snag points" on this weapon, and with its 10 ga. load you are more than able to deal with most threats quickly and finally.

Franchi SPAS-12S.name: Franchi SPAS-12S
Franchi SPAS-12S.description: Shortened version of the SPAS-12, this shotgun is, rare for a weapon of this category, delivered with an impressive 45 cm long silencer. When the silencer is in place the accuracy goes to -1, as it makes the front of the barrel heavier.

Goncz-Taurus 20-Gauge Rifle.name: Goncz-Taurus 20-Gauge Rifle
Goncz-Taurus 20-Gauge Rifle.description: This relatively small shotgun, sold worldwide, is surprisingly accurate.

Heckler & Koch Ardvark.name: Heckler & Koch Ardvark
Heckler & Koch Ardvark.description: Slim, streamlined, and effective, the Ardvark is a very well designed shotgun from the innovators of Heckler and Koch.

Militech CSH-45.name: Militech CSH-45
Militech CSH-45.description: Big, mean, intimidating. The whippet grip and folding stock are nice touches as well.

Militech ERW-14.name: Militech ERW-14
Militech ERW-14.description: This no frills semi-auto shotgun was developed as a survival weapon, allowing downed pilots or boat crews to hunt for food and defend themselves. The design seemed better than Militech originally thought however, and the weapon has become quite popular in 3rd world countries.

Militech M6 Combat.name: Militech M6 Combat
Militech M6 Combat.description: Very classic shotgun but nevertheless of good quality.

Militech M12 Shotgun.name: Militech M12 Shotgun
Militech M12 Shotgun.description: If sawn-off, accuracy : -1, concealability : long coat, length : 60 cm.

Mossberg ATA-5.name: Mossberg ATA-5
Mossberg ATA-5.description: A 12-gauge pump action shotgun, ideal for police and security work.

Mossberg ATA-10.name: Mossberg ATA-10
Mossberg ATA-10.description: It fires 7 rounds of 10 gauge shells, what more could you want out of a shotgun ?

Mustang Arms Raider.name: Mustang Arms Raider
Mustang Arms Raider.description: The Raider can be hidden under a long coat if the stock is removed, or the optional folding stock is folded. It feed from a 5 round tube magazine, which can be removed and replaced by a new one, allowing faster reloading (extra 5-rounds tube are sold 25 eb each). Alternatively the weapon can be fitted with a fixed, extended à rounds magazine(50 eb). The barrel can also be changed for a lengthened one (50 eb), giving +1 to accuracy but rising the concealability to NA, even without stock. The Raider can also be bought smartchipped for an extra 400 eb.

Remington Dillon.name: Remington Dillon
Remington Dillon.description: A large semi-auto assault shotgun, a bit unweildy, but very powerful. Intimidation factor alone should stop anyone from opposing you, however if they do the damage created by this will surely make them regret it.

Remington HG-14.name: Remington HG-14
Remington HG-14.description: This rather conventional shotgun has been widesly spread among freelancing security companies.

Ronin Shotgun Revolver.name: Ronin Shotgun Revolver
Ronin Shotgun Revolver.description: This "revolver" shotgun has indeed a cylinder able to hold four cartridges. It can fire with the two barrels at same time.

Rossi Squire.name: Rossi Squire
Rossi Squire.description: This shotgun is very compact, and easily used single-handed. It is an effective backup weapon easily hidden under a long coat or a car's seat.

Seburo PAS-14.name: Seburo PAS-14
Seburo PAS-14.description: Seburo is making a play for the market, and while their weapons may be in some opinions superior to the Gong, the Seburo's higher price tag will ensure that the only people who can afford it are true professionals. The PAS-14 features a removable stock, which allows the weapon to be more easily concealed.

Seburo PAS-16.name: Seburo PAS-16
Seburo PAS-16.description: A truly compact shotgun, the second in Seburo's PAS line. Easily concealed and barely larger than a normal semi automatic handgun.

Seburo PAS-18.name: Seburo PAS-18
Seburo PAS-18.description: The same size as a large submachine gun, the PAS-18 is extremely popular with police and special forces units. The FN-90 inspired foregrip is a really nice touch and allows for a smaler profil of the weapon.

Smith & Wesson SAS-911.name: Smith & Wesson SAS-911
Smith & Wesson SAS-911.description: A favorite in police and security circles, this 9 shot semiauto shotgun packs a wallop, and is stylish enough so that you don't have to be embarrassed by your guards carrying it.

Sungan Hob-12.name: Sungan Hob-12
Sungan Hob-12.description: This weapon, designed for close-combat is one of the few original designs from Sungan, the prime Korean weapon producer. They are better known for their licensed copies of Arasaka, Militech or Remington products. Those copies are less expensive than the orignal products, and are almost as good.

Tambu 501 AirBrush.name: Tambu 501 AirBrush
Tambu 501 AirBrush.description: This semi-automatic shotgun is favored for its light weight, large ammo capacity and extra barrel length from the bullpup design.

Winchester Nevada 10.name: Winchester Nevada 10
Winchester Nevada 10.description: Sold worldwide by the well-known subsidiary of Militech, this weapon is often found behind a bar or hotel desk because of the psychological effect of his massive look and damage potential. The heavy weight of the design greatly help in managing the recoil of his powerful ammo. The "Otario" version use the 7,62mm caseless cartridge, giving the weapon a better range and armor penetration. Accuracy : +1, cartridge : 7,62mm C (6D6+2), magazine : 8, rate of fire : 1, range : 350 meters.

Arasaka Kai.name: Arasaka Kai
Arasaka Kai.description: Arasaka's latest combat shotgun, excellent for house to house combat.

Arasaka XS-40.name: Arasaka XS-40
Arasaka XS-40.description: Capable of either single shot of rully automatic fire, this shotgun is a true weapon to beware. Its biggest problem is that you have to hand load each shell individually, but supposedly with the release of the finished product it will be bagazine fed. Grab em now while you can, these might end up as collectors items very quickly.

Budget Arms Claws.name: Budget Arms Claws
Budget Arms Claws.description: The Claws is the polymer one shot version of the H&K CAWS weapon system. The weapon jams frequently and has a reputation for explosively misfiring during full auto fire.

Franchi SPAS-102.name: Franchi SPAS-102
Franchi SPAS-102.description: Able to fire in either pump or semi-auto, the SPAS-102 is fast becoming a favorite to professionals in all fields, from mercenaries to corporate security.

Heckler & Koch CAWS-62.name: Heckler & Koch CAWS-62
Heckler & Koch CAWS-62.description: A new model in the aging CAWS line of weapons, this is a 5.56mm assault rifle with underbarrel pump action grenade launcher.

Luigi Franchi P.16.name: Luigi Franchi P.16
Luigi Franchi P.16.description: A short and stumpy gun, equally capable of firing buckshot and incapacitant or gas rounds. Used exclusively by European police forces.

Metacorp MAS-12 Exploder.name: Metacorp MAS-12 Exploder
Metacorp MAS-12 Exploder.description: A real pocket automatic shotgun, a strong grip is needed to hold it in automatic fire what do not arrange its accuracy.

Metacorp Warhammer Assault Shotgun.name: Metacorp Warhammer Assault Shotgun
Metacorp Warhammer Assault Shotgun.description: Also designed to fire double-purpose rounds (3$ each) : 4D6+2 AP or 6D6 against unarmored targets.

Militech Bulldog Compact Assault Shotgun.name: Militech Bulldog Compact Assault Shotgun
Militech Bulldog Compact Assault Shotgun.description: Spread-patterned laser sight included, adding +1 accuracy when active. Smartgun version available for 1300 eb.

Militech Crusher.name: Militech Crusher
Militech Crusher.description: Big brother of the SSG Crusher, it is a weapon particularly appreciated by the C-SWAT. However, it requires a strong grip to control the recoil since it has no stock.

Militech Sasquatch.name: Militech Sasquatch
Militech Sasquatch.description: An assault shotgun similar to the Arasaka AS-20. Bullpup design and fully automatic fire make this weapon a true battlefield monster.

Mossberg CMDT Combat Gun.name: Mossberg CMDT Combat Gun
Mossberg CMDT Combat Gun.description: Rated best new shotgun at Desert Wars 7 ! Maybe the best combat shotgun on the market today. The Mossberg CMDT Combat Gun is a proven winner in every climate, in nearly every situation.Comes with integral laser sight (+1 WA included above), and the model SM variant has integral smartlinking (1,300eb). Equipped with a folding stock, concealability increases to L and WA drops by 1 when folded.

Remington Mk XIV Mandible.name: Remington Mk XIV Mandible
Remington Mk XIV Mandible.description: This monstrous automatic shotgun was produced to meet a request from the army concerning this type of weapon.

Remington Sodom.name: Remington Sodom
Remington Sodom.description: This bullpup shotgun is perfect for assault and black ops work. Its high magazine capacity and 3-round burst capability are its biggest selling points.

Sternmeyer SH-8.name: Sternmeyer SH-8
Sternmeyer SH-8.description: The SH-8 is a helical drum fed 12 ga shotgun that features a hinged front handle allowing it to either extend downward or to the side.

Stolvoboy 12 MAG CAW.name: Stolvoboy 12 MAG CAW
Stolvoboy 12 MAG CAW.description: A well made soviet weapon with a high capacity magazine.

Texas Arms R-Shot .477.name: Texas Arms R-Shot .477
Texas Arms R-Shot .477.description: This riot gun fires bursts of three .477 cal rounds who can reduce any opponent.

Tsunami Arms Ragnarok CAWS.name: Tsunami Arms Ragnarok CAWS
Tsunami Arms Ragnarok CAWS.description: Five batteries of 50 shots can be loaded at a time (90 eb each).

Kel-Tec SU-16C.name: Kel-Tec SU-16C
Kel-Tec SU-16C.description: Foldable in two parts, it can hide under a long coat and takes a turn to fold or unfold.

M1 Carbine.name: M1 Carbine
M1 Carbine.description: Medium rifle, fires light ammunition, accurate and reliable. It has been used since WWII. It's the most widespread weapon of all those manufactured in the United States. Several versions can be found : the M1A1 with foldable stock, for parachutists use, (concealability : long coat, length : 62 cm, cost : 250 eb), a version (M2) firing in automatic mode (rate of fire : 25) and one version (M3) equipped with a night vision scope. Many were owned by police in the United States in the twentieth century.

MAS 49-56.name: MAS 49-56
MAS 49-56.description: The modifications made by MAS 49/56 mainly concern the exterior design. The need for a more maneuverable weapon led the MAS engineers to considerably shorten the handguard, leaving an important part of the barrel exposed.

Mosin-Nagant 1891-30.name: Mosin-Nagant 1891-30
Mosin-Nagant 1891-30.description: The Mosin-Nagant is a bolt-action, magazine fed, military rifle that was used by the armed forces of Imperial Russia and later the Soviet Union and various Eastern bloc nations.

Weatherby Mark V.name: Weatherby Mark V
Weatherby Mark V.description: A very rare rifle. Originally designed to hunt elephant and rhinoceros. Now, its inventors have found a new use for it : to make undesirable members of a gang flee from the neighborhood, or make sure a cop is not tempted to nose around.

Weatherby Mark V Compact.name: Weatherby Mark V Compact
Weatherby Mark V Compact.description: Hunting rifle short-barreled in factory, the Compact is nonetheless precise.

AI Arctic Warfare.name: AI Arctic Warfare
AI Arctic Warfare.description: The Arctic Warfare is specially designed to function in -40C° degree weather. Features a folding stock and a surpressed barrel it is designed to be easily taken apart and re-assembled, and comes with a special briefcase sized carrier in which it easily fits, including extra ammunition. Has iron sights and scope mountings.

Armalite AR10.name: Armalite AR10
Armalite AR10.description: This weapon comes with a silencer.

Armalon PR.name: Armalon PR
Armalon PR.description: Based on the Remington 700, the PR is a version improve for the competition. Accept also 20 bullets clip.

Beretta Sniper.name: Beretta Sniper
Beretta Sniper.description: This rifle uses the familiar Mauser action chambered to fire the 7.62 NATO cartridge. It features a heavy barrel and a ambidexterous wodden thumbhole grip. The forestock contains a harmonic balancer that dampens the barrels vibration when fired.

Colt M16 SDM.name: Colt M16 SDM
Colt M16 SDM.description: The M16 SDM (Squad Designated Marksman) is simply a M16 rifle modified for improved accuracy. It also includes a heavy sniper barrel, a bipod, and a basic scope. The forward grip was replaced with a fixation rail. Includes an adjustable stock.

Heckler & Koch G3-SG1.name: Heckler & Koch G3-SG1
Heckler & Koch G3-SG1.description: The SG1 is simply an accurized G3 rifle with a specialized barrel, bipod, stock with cheekpiece, standard scope, and a target trigger.

Heckler & Koch MSG-90.name: Heckler & Koch MSG-90
Heckler & Koch MSG-90.description: The MSG 90 features a heavy barrel, adjustable stock, target trigger, and a bipod. There is a standard scope fitted to the weapons sight rail. The gun will accept the 20 round magazines of the G3, but the 5 round box is more common.

Heckler & Koch PSG1.name: Heckler & Koch PSG1
Heckler & Koch PSG1.description: PSG is the police version of the MSG-90, so there is the same characteristics.

IMI Galil Marksman.name: IMI Galil Marksman
IMI Galil Marksman.description: The Marksman is simply an accurized Galil ARM. Featuring a specialized barrel, an adjustable bipod and a special scope mount that may feature any sort of scope, be it infrared, night vision or anything else. The automatic setting remains on this rifle for emergency use, it is obviously not accurate.

IMI Galil Sniper.name: IMI Galil Sniper
IMI Galil Sniper.description: The Sniper is an even more heavily modified Galil AR rifle. It features a heavier barrel, a bipod that attaches to the front end of the receiver, and a wooden shoulder stock with adjustable cheekpeice that folds forward for compact storage of the weapon. There are many scopes available for the Sniper, including standard, night vision, and infared. Also available is a screw-on surpressor.

M24.name: M24
M24.description: The stock of the M24 is composite, barrel has special muzzle break to break up the blast created by firing to mask the shooters location. System includes carrying case, scope mount, standard scope, bipod, and cleaning kit. Has no iron sights, popular with special operations units.

Milcam Sniper.name: Milcam Sniper
Milcam Sniper.description: Accept also M16 standard cartridges clip (30 bullets).

Norinco QBU Type 88.name: Norinco QBU Type 88
Norinco QBU Type 88.description: This weapon is based on the Type 95 assault rifle action, modified with a heaviey accurized barrel, standard scope, fold-up iron sights, and a bipod. This bipod attatches directly to the barrel, however and may affect precision shooting.

Sako TRG-22.name: Sako TRG-22
Sako TRG-22.description: This weapon comes with a silencer and a night vision glasses.

SV-98.name: SV-98
SV-98.description: Unlike other russian sniper designs, the SV-98 was designed for long range sniping. Its stock is available in either wood or composite materials and is fully adjustable. Two vents help cool the barrel. A bipod can be fitted and the barrel is free-floating, improving accuracy.

SV-99.name: SV-99
SV-99.description: Sniper rifle with very short range, used by police forces in silent operations. Silence obtained by a very short caliber and by the integrated silencer.

SVD.name: SVD
SVD.description: This semi-automatic action rifle fires the heavy 7.62x54R round which is very effective at great range. Includes bayonet lug, iron sights and scope mountings.

SVU-A.name: SVU-A
SVU-A.description: The SVU-A is equipped with a integrated flash suppressor and a bipod.

VS-94 PS.name: VS-94 PS
VS-94 PS.description: This weapon was essentially used by the norvegian police and based on the modified Mauser 98.

VSK-94.name: VSK-94
VSK-94.description: Precision version of the 9A-91, designed to compete with the VSS Vintorez at a lower price. Without the silencer, it is possible to conceal the weapon under a long coat.

VSS Vintorez.name: VSS Vintorez
VSS Vintorez.description: The VSS is a sniping varient to the AS Val assault rifle, and is intended for use by covert special operations soldiers.

Arasaka WSSA Sniper System.name: Arasaka WSSA Sniper System
Arasaka WSSA Sniper System.description: Smartlink, suppressor, flame-cover and computer-assisted aim are included.

Ceska Zbrojovka SR-449.name: Ceska Zbrojovka SR-449
Ceska Zbrojovka SR-449.description: No it's not much to look at, but this eastern European sniper rifle definitely gets the job done.

Cyberdyn M7A3.name: Cyberdyn M7A3
Cyberdyn M7A3.description: This sniper rifle, a commission from US Army, is derivated from the M22 assault rifle. It is equiped with an integrated laser aiming device and silencer, a tactical flashlight and a scope.

Dai Lung Ice Thrower.name: Dai Lung Ice Thrower
Dai Lung Ice Thrower.description: The Ice Thrower is halfway between a sniper rifle and a assault rifle, and fails miserably in both cases. It must be said that with such a name, it was not helped from the beginning.

Federated Arms Cruseras.name: Federated Arms Cruseras
Federated Arms Cruseras.description: A rugged sniper rifle for use in the most harsh of terrains. Comes standard with a bipod.

FR-F6.name: FR-F6
FR-F6.description: Smartlink (+2 to shot, effective below 200 meters range), aiming computer (+2 to medium range and +3 at longue range and extreme range) and a supressor system are included.

Heckler & Koch Archer.name: Heckler & Koch Archer
Heckler & Koch Archer.description: The archer is a simple, but very accurate, bolt action rifle ideal for both hunting and sniper work.

Heckler & Koch G38SK.name: Heckler & Koch G38SK
Heckler & Koch G38SK.description: A complete sniper system that fits in a large briefcase, complete with scope, suppressor, bipod and 2 magazines. The case it comes in is the same type of attaché used by diplomats, and as such is lead shielded against X-ray. This weapon is the perfect choice for covert work.

Heckler & Koch MP11-SG1.name: Heckler & Koch MP11-SG1
Heckler & Koch MP11-SG1.description: A SMG turned into a quite accurate sniper rifle. Bipod, smartlink, suppressor / flame cover (or recoil compensator) are included. It can handle any aiming system, but under-barrel options are impossible to put on because of the bipod.

Heckler & Koch PSG2.name: Heckler & Koch PSG2
Heckler & Koch PSG2.description: H&K fights on Walther's field with this high quality rifle. Based on the famous PSG1, it is equipped with all the modern improvements one is entitled to expect from such a rifle.

Kendachi Aurora.name: Kendachi Aurora
Kendachi Aurora.description: A very odd, but finely tuned instrument from Kendachi. At first glance one will notice the odd magazine placement and feed design of the weapon, but don't let it fool you. Created primarily as a sniper weapon, a job at which it good at, the weapon is also fully capable of acting as an assault rifle. The barrel is shrouded and insulated, and acts as an effective suppressor.

Metacorp LS-35 A1.name: Metacorp LS-35 A1
Metacorp LS-35 A1.description: Silent sniper rifle based on an under calibrated BR-55 assault rifle, the LS-35 is almost more useful for rabbit-hunt than assassinations. It' a shame because except this defect the LS-35 was well designed. Note that it is equiped with an integrated laser sight.

Militech Arbus.name: Militech Arbus
Militech Arbus.description: This sniper rifle utilizes state of the art materials in its construction and comes smartchipped as standard. A bit heavy, but very acurate and reliable.

Militech PASR-42.name: Militech PASR-42
Militech PASR-42.description: The PASR-42 is a very well respected combat sniper rifle, capable of pinpoint precision even under the most adverse conditions and circumstances. It is very popular among Militech marksmen, as well as professionals around the world.

Ranger Arms PST-99.name: Ranger Arms PST-99
Ranger Arms PST-99.description: The PST-99 has a critically angled clip design used for caseless munition feeding. A master-piece among weapons, the PST is favored even within competing corporation's special forces. Comes with detacheable nightvision sight and adjusteable stock and cheekrest.

Ranger Arms SM3.name: Ranger Arms SM3
Ranger Arms SM3.description: The SM3 is a must for those jobs when the first shot has to count. Silencer and a variable-mag imaging scope (1.5 to 6 times) with thermographic or low-light (buyers choice) are factory-standard. Like most of its breed, it disasembles completely for fit in a standard briefcase. Ideal for the assassin on the go.

Remington 950.name: Remington 950
Remington 950.description: One of many varieties of different hunting rifles which are commonly used by rebel forces.

Remington M713.name: Remington M713
Remington M713.description: The M713 is a popular rifle for hunters, marksmen and outdoorsmen alike. It got a modest price and it's not over done or complicated... just a simple and accurate weapon.

Seburo PSR-21.name: Seburo PSR-21
Seburo PSR-21.description: This sniper rifle is the perfect weapon for all renowned assasin. Compact, equiped with an integrated silencer and a night-vision scope in standard, it can be easily dismantle to handle in a case.

Sternmeyer ASW-68.name: Sternmeyer ASW-68
Sternmeyer ASW-68.description: A very nice sniper rifle from Sternmeyer.

Sternmeyer Mison.name: Sternmeyer Mison
Sternmeyer Mison.description: Pinpoint acuracy out to 1000 yards and an ammo capacity of 20 rounds make this sniper rifle the weapon of choice among many marksmen.

Stokovitch & Bolotnikov Pro-Sniper.name: Stokovitch & Bolotnikov Pro-Sniper
Stokovitch & Bolotnikov Pro-Sniper.description: Can be dismantle. This weapon is excellent for the elite assassin. This weapon, sold with a 55 x 25 x 10 cm case is a complete sniper system : bipod, night vision scope, and supressor. A great success in the underworld. Unfortunately, it's not allowed to be sold in any part of the United States.

Stolvoboy Oktober.name: Stolvoboy Oktober
Stolvoboy Oktober.description: This Russian sniper rifle is the replacement for the Dragunov in the Russian military. Every bit as acurate, and manufactured to exacting standards.

Stolvoboy SR5.name: Stolvoboy SR5
Stolvoboy SR5.description: Classic sniper rifle but well made. It is sold without optic system.

SVD-2.name: SVD-2
SVD-2.description: An updated version of the soviet Dragunov sniper rifle, it can be smartlinked and even equipped to a remote rig to provide a sniper remote operation of his/her weapon.

Towa Toshoni.name: Towa Toshoni
Towa Toshoni.description: A world class target rifle, the Toshoni also makes an excellent sniper weapon.

Tsunami Arms ISS.name: Tsunami Arms ISS
Tsunami Arms ISS.description: Tsunami continues to garner attention for their precision weapons with the ISS. This bullpup chambered in 7.62 mm is one of the smoothest firing weapons in its class and has a proven track record of accuracy and reliability.

Tsunami Arms King-Snip.name: Tsunami Arms King-Snip
Tsunami Arms King-Snip.description: Excellent sniper rifle, King-Snip is delivered with a laser sight, and a night vision Scope. Bipod optional for 80 eb, and smartlink for 950 eb (range : 200 meters max.).

Tsunami Arms RS-73.name: Tsunami Arms RS-73
Tsunami Arms RS-73.description: This is a very acruate weapon, with a suppressed barrel and a second suppresor for extra quiet work.

Walther SPR-96.name: Walther SPR-96
Walther SPR-96.description: Originally designed for decathlon shooters in the Olympics, this sport/target rifle has become world renowned for its performance and accuracy. The weapon is also popular as a sniper rifle, though the ammo choice of 9 mm is a bit underpowered for some work.

Walther WA-2021.name: Walther WA-2021
Walther WA-2021.description: Bipod and scope included. Sold without more options.

Walther WA-2022.name: Walther WA-2022
Walther WA-2022.description: One of the most accurate sniper rifles ever built. Walther's rifle division continues to show us why they are so highly respected.

Chadran Arms City Reaper.name: Chadran Arms City Reaper
Chadran Arms City Reaper.description: A very good mixed weapon, used by urban security militias. Values after "/" are used for shotgun (CAL12 (4D6/2D6/1D6+1), range : 50 meters).

Federated Arms Tech-Assault.name: Federated Arms Tech-Assault
Federated Arms Tech-Assault.description: In automatic mode, with a dice result of 1, roll the dice again : if 3 or more, the gun melts.

Heckler & Koch SL1.name: Heckler & Koch SL1
Heckler & Koch SL1.description: A rifle sold worldwide on the civilian market, has an 5 bullet integrated clip. Excellent in view of price.

Luigi Franchi Gavil M386.name: Luigi Franchi Gavil M386
Luigi Franchi Gavil M386.description: Elegant, exquisite, unique... Words do not do Gavil's first long arm justice.

Militech Ninja.name: Militech Ninja
Militech Ninja.description: Suppressor has to be changed every fourth clip to keep up its efficiency.

Militech SPW-32.name: Militech SPW-32
Militech SPW-32.description: Like all survival rifles, this weapon breaks down and is stored in a regular sized briefcase. It was developed for pilots as survival/hunting weapon in case they were downed and on their own.

Nomad .44 Magnum Lever-Action Rifle.name: Nomad .44 Magnum Lever-Action Rifle
Nomad .44 Magnum Lever-Action Rifle.description: Between brackets : 44 Magnum version. Available in .357 Magnum (3D6+1). A lengthened version is also available (accuracy +1, non concealable, range : 250 meters).

Remington 6-Pump.name: Remington 6-Pump
Remington 6-Pump.description: This rifle encountered huge success on the civilian market due to the American company marketing it for hunting big game. In order to hunt what ?

Remington Survivor.name: Remington Survivor
Remington Survivor.description: A simple yet effective weapon, primarily designed for extended hunting trips. It easily and quickly breaks down into five separate sections for convenient transportation.

Ruger 100 Sport Rifle.name: Ruger 100 Sport Rifle
Ruger 100 Sport Rifle.description: A precision bullpup hunting weapon perfect for all environments. Its sturdy wood and high-impact plastic casing ensures dependability, even in the foulest of weather. Comes with an integral 2-6x variable imaging scope.

Seburo HSR-1.name: Seburo HSR-1
Seburo HSR-1.description: Seburo's first sporting rifle, this bolt action weapon was originally conceived at the request of a prominent japanese film icon who was planning a safari to Africa. The requests from people who had seen it during photo ops and video journals poured in, and soon Seburo began to manufacture these weapons, feeling them at a hefty price to anyone who could afford them.

Seburo J11.name: Seburo J11
Seburo J11.description: Based on J9's technologies, the J11 allows Seburo to penetrate the civil market keeping that what made the firm's reputation, even if the design is quite basic.

Sternmeyer M97S.name: Sternmeyer M97S
Sternmeyer M97S.description: Middle class rifle, found on the civilian market and in military conflicts as well. Its concealment and accuracy are appreciated.

Texhofforhov AVA Carbine.name: Texhofforhov AVA Carbine
Texhofforhov AVA Carbine.description: This rifle intended for the civil market looks like the famous Tokarev SVT40. Moreover a military version exists (cartridge : 7,62N (5D6+2), range : 400m).

Valmet Special.name: Valmet Special
Valmet Special.description: 10 mm rounds (2D6+3), range : 300 meters for the second barrel.

Van Pattan.name: Van Pattan
Van Pattan.description: The Van Pattan is a shotgun with four impressive barrels. Unfortunately it isn't easy to use cause reducing is accuracy in spite of an aimpoint. Nevertheless it remain an high quality weapon. It can hold 5 cartridges in his butt.

Winchester M-22.name: Winchester M-22
Winchester M-22.description: A wonderfully acurate hunting rifle from Winchester, the M-22 makes the perfect addition to any sportsmans arsenal.

Winchester MN12.name: Winchester MN12
Winchester MN12.description: A classic and elegant hunting rifle.

Agram 2000.name: Agram 2000
Agram 2000.description: Made by small Croatian company, this SMG earn its "honour" mostly as a criminal weapon in some ex-Eastern Block countries.

Beretta Model 12.name: Beretta Model 12
Beretta Model 12.description: Esthetic, accurate and reliable. Model 12 has been chosen buy many african or south american countries to equip their army, and also by the italian police itself. It's a weapon that is still common in 2020.

Calico M100.name: Calico M100
Calico M100.description: By using a 50 bullets magazine, it is possible to hide this gun in a jacket.

FN P90.name: FN P90
FN P90.description: The FN P90 is a lightweight and practical weapon designed for supporting and logistics personnel, although some special forces units have chosen to adopt it as well. It fires a unique 5.7mm round designed for extreme high-velocity preformance. It has excellent armour-piercing capability, but its recoil is surprisingly very minimal. Controlls are designed to be easily accesable by the soldier, either right or left handed users, as the the spent rounds are ejected out the bottom. The magazine runs along the top and is tranparent, allowing the remaining bullets to be easily checked. Screw-on surpressors are available.

GG-95 PDW.name: GG-95 PDW
GG-95 PDW.description: Formerly known as the Jati-Matic, the GG-95 is designed for reliable operation in cold weather.

Heckler & Koch MP5A3.name: Heckler & Koch MP5A3
Heckler & Koch MP5A3.description: The main difference between the A2 and A3 models is the retractable butt.

Heckler & Koch MP5K.name: Heckler & Koch MP5K
Heckler & Koch MP5K.description: Shortened version of the MP5, often used by special police forces and terrorists.

Heckler & Koch MP5SD3.name: Heckler & Koch MP5SD3
Heckler & Koch MP5SD3.description: The MP5 SD3 is a version equiped with a sound suppressor.

Heckler & Koch UMP-45.name: Heckler & Koch UMP-45
Heckler & Koch UMP-45.description: Essentially the UMP is a simplified MP5 designed to use a heavier round. This features the less-complex blowback action. It is a durable metal and plastic design, but is surprisingly light weight. The magazine has a tranparent strip to allow remaining ammo to be easily checked. The low-velocity of the .45 makes it a very effective silenced round, and screw-on surpressors and sights are available.

Heckler & Koch USC.name: Heckler & Koch USC
Heckler & Koch USC.description: Civil and sporting version of the UMP.

HM-3.name: HM-3
HM-3.description: This sub-machine gun should have become the standard weapon of the Mexican Army but cause to its bad conception was never adopted.

IMI Micro Uzi.name: IMI Micro Uzi
IMI Micro Uzi.description: The smaller version of the Uzi, not bigger than a pistol of the same caliber. Very popular among terrorists.

IMI Mini Uzi.name: IMI Mini Uzi
IMI Mini Uzi.description: A medium version of the popular Uzi, which can be easely concealed under wide clothes.

IMI Tavor-2.name: IMI Tavor-2
IMI Tavor-2.description: An updated version of the Micro-Tavor MTAR-21.

IMI Uzi.name: IMI Uzi
IMI Uzi.description: A longer version, for a more accurate shot. Used by SWATs and infantry men.

Ingram MAC-11.name: Ingram MAC-11
Ingram MAC-11.description: Shortened version of the Mac 10, which shots ligther bullets, at a higher rate of fire. Two clips are available, depending on the concelament wanted (concealability : long coat, magazine : 32). Civilian versions have been sold, weren't equiped with automatic fire. Like the Mac 10, the Mac 11 can be fitted with a sound suppressor (about 20 cm, 50 eb).

Intratec TEC DC-9.name: Intratec TEC DC-9
Intratec TEC DC-9.description: One of the sub-machines gun most used by criminals in USA. Can be equiped with laser aim (accuracy : 0) and a magazine of 32 or 50 bullets (dissimulation : long coat).

Izhmash PP-19 Bizon.name: Izhmash PP-19 Bizon
Izhmash PP-19 Bizon.description: The Bizon-2-01 and Bizon-2-07 versions have a effective range of 200 meters.

KBP PP-90.name: KBP PP-90
KBP PP-90.description: Initially issued to some police and security forces in Russia, this gun now destined to collect dust in farthest corners of the armory rooms, due its terrible ergonomics and poor handling characteristics.

KBP PP-90M1.name: KBP PP-90M1
KBP PP-90M1.description: Intended to compete with the Bizon, this weapon is hardly a success. Few precise, very difficult to maintain, more was expected of a famous manufacturer as KBP. And his name can be confusing because of its great similarity with the model PP-90.

KBP PP-93.name: KBP PP-93
KBP PP-93.description: The PP-93 submachine gun had been developed as a non-folding version of earlier PP-90 clandestine submachine gun. Due to improved ergonomics, the PP-93 became slightly more popular.

Klin.name: Klin
Klin.description: This weapon comes with a silencer.

M3 A1 Grease Gun.name: M3 A1 Grease Gun
M3 A1 Grease Gun.description: Standard weapon of the us army, since WWII. its nick name is the result of its design.

Madsen Model 50.name: Madsen Model 50
Madsen Model 50.description: Accurate and easy to look after submachine gun, which was used by the british army. the security trigger behind the clip prevents from firing with a single hand. (although a good sticky band can fix the problem).

MGV-176.name: MGV-176
MGV-176.description: It is a specialist weapon, which can be used at relatively short ranges, because of weak ammunition. However, when fired in full automatic mode, the very high rate of fire combined with low recoil will result in a significant lethality through multiple hits to target.

MP 40.name: MP 40
MP 40.description: One of the most famous weapon of WWII, used by the german army. More than a million were built, and some were still in use at the end of the century by police or armies throughout the world.

Norinco Type 79 SMG.name: Norinco Type 79 SMG
Norinco Type 79 SMG.description: The Type 79's gas-powered action functions more like an assault rifle than a conventional SMG. The design is complex, but is simple to use, as it functions almost exactly like an assault rifle. This action gives it excelent longer range accuracy, especialy for a submachine gun. Even on top of this the weapon is quite lightweight.

PM-84P.name: PM-84P
PM-84P.description: 25 bullets magazines can also used by this weapon.

PPSh 41.name: PPSh 41
PPSh 41.description: Standard weapon of the Red Army during WWII. more than five millions were made, often copied, in China for instance, where it is called "Model 50".

Socimi Type 821.name: Socimi Type 821
Socimi Type 821.description: At a first glance the Socimi Type 821-SMG appears to be an outright Italian copy of the Israeli Uzi, although the design sports many differences and improvements over the original project.

Spectre M4.name: Spectre M4
Spectre M4.description: Compact machine pistol, designed for anti-terrorist operations. It uses specific four columns magazines for greater capacity.

Sterling L2A3.name: Sterling L2A3
Sterling L2A3.description: British weapon used by the army and british police. It has also been sold in the United States where it was used by police force. It's a reliable and compact weapon, wich fires a classical 9 mm ammo, from a side clip.

Steyr Aug Para.name: Steyr Aug Para
Steyr Aug Para.description: This weapon comes with a silencer.

Steyr TMP.name: Steyr TMP
Steyr TMP.description: A common SMG used the world over. It is rugged 9 mm SMG with many features, such as ambidextrous cocking.

TDI Kriss Super V.name: TDI Kriss Super V
TDI Kriss Super V.description: This SMG has a radically different conception from its predecessors. Thanks to technical innovations, it is endowed with a formidable accuracy.

Thompson M1A1.name: Thompson M1A1
Thompson M1A1.description: This SMG replaced the 1928 Model during WWII.

Thompson M1928 A1.name: Thompson M1928 A1
Thompson M1928 A1.description: Used by gangster and police between the two world wars in the united states.

Australian Ammo Spitter.name: Australian Ammo Spitter
Australian Ammo Spitter.description: This recent company has launched some pretty good weapons, like this ligth SMG, fitted for personal protection or unfortunately, terrorism. Nethertheless, a personal armor, even thin, is very efficient against it.

Federated Arms Mini 8.name: Federated Arms Mini 8
Federated Arms Mini 8.description: A ligth SMG, which fires ligth bullet from a small clip, and built with a small budget. In a word, a weapon designed for amateurs.

Heckler & Koch P2M-13S.name: Heckler & Koch P2M-13S
Heckler & Koch P2M-13S.description: Light SMG fashionable on the european market, but still rare in the USA, where its small caliber, which provides to it a good accuracy, doesn't satisfy customers confronted to personal armors.

Ingram MAC-15.name: Ingram MAC-15
Ingram MAC-15.description: With its 15 cm long, the Mac 15 is the smallest SMG in the world. It's naturally design for secret service agents, policemen during infiltration missions, and terrorists throughout the world. A 10 cm suppressor can be added (concealability : jacket, 50 eb) for maximum discretion.

Kalashnikov PPsh 14.name: Kalashnikov PPsh 14
Kalashnikov PPsh 14.description: A small SMG used by civilians, which fire an old bullet of the last century. The quality/price ratio is acceptable, if nether the accuracy, or the stopping power are important.

Militech Ronin American Suranam.name: Militech Ronin American Suranam
Militech Ronin American Suranam.description: The single smallest Ronin conversion. Integrally silenced and converted to fire the .177 Explosive round (1D6+4 damage) of the Suranam Machine Pistol, the American Suranam is light and easy to handle while still loading a deadly and light ammo load.

Mustang Arms Mouse.name: Mustang Arms Mouse
Mustang Arms Mouse.description: Using the same priciples as the Whisper, Mustang Arms developed this incredibly silent SMG. Comes with a retractable wirestock and has the same noise reduction offered by the Whisper.

Okusa FDG.name: Okusa FDG
Okusa FDG.description: Despite his futuristic look and an imposing silencer, this sub-machine gun is more a plastic toy than a real weapon.

Setsuko-Arasaka PMS.name: Setsuko-Arasaka PMS
Setsuko-Arasaka PMS.description: Smartgun version available for an additional 950 eb.

Suranam Machine Pistol.name: Suranam Machine Pistol
Suranam Machine Pistol.description: When you roll 1 followed by a 10, the clip explodes, causing 2D6/3D6 (depending on the clip capacity) hit points to the gunner arm. Some say that the worst thing to do to your ennemies is to airdrop some cases filled with these polymer guns behind their lines.

Arasaka AASW-9F.name: Arasaka AASW-9F
Arasaka AASW-9F.description: A simple submachine gun, common to security forces all over the world, both private and federal. Sleek clean lines are all that distinguish this weapon from the vast multitude of other 9 mm subs around the globe.

Arasaka Tempest.name: Arasaka Tempest
Arasaka Tempest.description: An original design for this weapon hardly larger than a pistol.

Ares Crusader Machine Pistol.name: Ares Crusader Machine Pistol
Ares Crusader Machine Pistol.description: Someone at Ares has no idea what a machine pistol is...The Ares Crusader represents the pinnacle in machine pistol technology. Only slightly larger than a conventional pistol, the Crusader is capable of full-automatic fire and carries an extended clip that should make some assault-rifle owners jealous ! Comes with an integral Wagner gas-vent recoil system.The gas vent system provides +1 WA in full-auto fire only.

Ares GZ-MP.name: Ares GZ-MP
Ares GZ-MP.description: Completing with brio the GZ range, this machine pistol is endowed with a good design but with a rather average ammo capacity.

Armalite BM-57.name: Armalite BM-57
Armalite BM-57.description: Armalite's latest submachine gun is a sturdy and reliable workhorse, perhaps a bit heavy but the weight is more than worth it for the accuracy and ammo capacity of this excellent weapon. The adjustable stock is nice, though the apparatus is a bit overly done.

Armalite M20-45.name: Armalite M20-45
Armalite M20-45.description: A polymer gun which is equivalent to the best metalic weapons. A worthy successor of a dynasty of medium caliber automatic weapons.

Beretta 93A Ronin.name: Beretta 93A Ronin
Beretta 93A Ronin.description: Modernised and automatic version of the famous 93R.

Beretta 102-SR.name: Beretta 102-SR
Beretta 102-SR.description: Beautifully crafted and the additional weight provided by the oversized, but ergonomic, foregrip makes recoil almost imperceptible, even when firing one handed. An extended 35 round capacity (10 eb) magazine is available, as is a 50 round drum magazine (25 eb). Other available options include an integral laser sight built into the foregrip.

Beretta Model 200ST.name: Beretta Model 200ST
Beretta Model 200ST.description: The pistol that all the military data-faxes are screaming about. The Beretta Model 200ST is everything you've heard and more. Capable fo full-automatic fire, this pistol jams as much firepower into a small frame as any other light service pistol currently available. Plus, the 24-shot magazine reduces the chance of being caught short at those critical moments.

Beretta Modele 48.name: Beretta Modele 48
Beretta Modele 48.description: Innovation in the shape and in the style for this model 48, which passes unseen in most of metal sensors and X-rays systems. Its secret : a body made of synthesisun resin and mehanism elements made of extra-strong ceramics. The 10 mm caseless ammo is also great for discretion. Last innovation : a clip with two juxtaposed lines of bullets which makes it compact and enables him to be contained in a holster. Note that this weapon is forbidden in many US states.

Budget Arms Laser MK9.name: Budget Arms Laser MK9
Budget Arms Laser MK9.description: This sub-machine gun includes a standard laser sight and is sold with two magazines, according to the desired discretion (concealability : long coat, magazine : 35).

Budget Arms RX-79.name: Budget Arms RX-79
Budget Arms RX-79.description: Unfortunately due to the extremely low cost, high rate of fire and large ammo capacity this weapon has become very popular among street gangs. While the rest of the weapon is crap, the unique magazine and loading design are noteworthy.

Ceska Zbrojovka CZSM-477.name: Ceska Zbrojovka CZSM-477
Ceska Zbrojovka CZSM-477.description: This bullpup style 10 mm SMG from our friends in Czechoslavakia serves with most eastern european militaries faithfully.

Darra-Polytechnic M-7.name: Darra-Polytechnic M-7
Darra-Polytechnic M-7.description: The Indo-chinese firm has always sold cheap weapons for third world countries. It is without surprise that the M-7 has flooded the market. It's a submachine gun made of 70% polymer, with the general shape of early last century weapons, which has very average characteristics, and a significant rate of jamming. But for that price who can ask for more ?

Fabrica de Armas Gurps.name: Fabrica de Armas Gurps
Fabrica de Armas Gurps.description: With a side loading magazine and high rate of fire, the Gurps bears a fond resemblance to the classic Sten. However with state of the art construction and firing the hard hitting 10 mm ammunition this weapon exceeds the standard.

Federated Arms F3K.name: Federated Arms F3K
Federated Arms F3K.description: SMG strongly inspired by the famous MP5K. It sells well in nomad communities thanks to its mean look.

Federated Arms P-18.name: Federated Arms P-18
Federated Arms P-18.description: Very tiny for an smg, made to be fired with one hand. The magazine, available in either 15 or 30 rounds, of this bullpup weapon acts as an armbrace for helping to steady aim. Oddly enough, this weapon has almost no muzzle climb.

Federated Arms P-19.name: Federated Arms P-19
Federated Arms P-19.description: Just a tad larger than the P-18, this weapon adds a bit longer of a barrel, plus a front grip and retracting stock for even greater accuracy.

Geind SMS-65.name: Geind SMS-65
Geind SMS-65.description: An excellent submachine gun from Geind, another in a line of fantastic products from a name that is making an immediate impact in the community for style, innovation and quality.

Glock 30 Machine Pistol.name: Glock 30 Machine Pistol
Glock 30 Machine Pistol.description: Sold with two magazines, according to the desired discretion (concealability : long coat, magazine : 30).

Goncz-Taurus MP.name: Goncz-Taurus MP
Goncz-Taurus MP.description: Sold with two magazine, depending to the discretion wanted (concealability : long coat, magazine : 30).

Heckler & Koch 77UK Assault Carabine.name: Heckler & Koch 77UK Assault Carabine
Heckler & Koch 77UK Assault Carabine.description: Attachments : SmartLink 600 eb, integral supressor system (accuracy : -1) 200 eb, 45 rounds clip 60 eb and Militech mini-grenade launcher (-1 grenade 25 mm 4 2 STD 250m).

Heckler & Koch MP5 TX.name: Heckler & Koch MP5 TX
Heckler & Koch MP5 TX.description: Adapting the MP5K series models to the 10 mm CL round, Heckler & Koch has come up with another winner with the MP5 TX. Voted favorite new weapon at the Paris Arms Show last year, the MP5 TX is a sure winner by any standards Comes equipped with an integral laser sight (+1 WA included above).

Heckler & Koch MP7S.name: Heckler & Koch MP7S
Heckler & Koch MP7S.description: Newer version of the H&K MP7. A 35-cartridge magazine is also available.

Heckler & Koch SR-678.name: Heckler & Koch SR-678
Heckler & Koch SR-678.description: A standard H&K submachine gun, chambered in 10 mm. This weapon is popular among law enforcement and anti-terrorist circles for its smooth action and high ammo capacity.

IMI H-Uzi.name: IMI H-Uzi
IMI H-Uzi.description: The forward mounted clip is a radical departure from previous Uzi incarnations, but it works wonders for reducing the overall profile of the weapon.

Ingram Warrior 10.name: Ingram Warrior 10
Ingram Warrior 10.description: More Ingram Warrior-10's have sold in the past three years than some of it's majro competitors have sold in their entire product lives. Durable and reliable, the Warrior-10 is the weapon to choose when the elements are you enemy. Rain, sand, mud, humidity - under any conditions, the Warrior-10 keeps firing. No bells and whistles on this tough gun, but who cares about chrome when the rock-and-roll goes down ?

Malorian Arms RGM-179.name: Malorian Arms RGM-179
Malorian Arms RGM-179.description: An extremely acurate submachine gun, but what else would you expect from Malorian. This weapon looks like something out of a sci-fi movie and shoots like a dream. There is almost no muzzle climb whatsoever and the built in laser sight ensures you hit what you are aiming at every time.

Militech Winner.name: Militech Winner
Militech Winner.description: The Winner is about to become one of the best SMG sales in the world, due to its modern look which confers it a reputation of a "serious" weapon.

Nomad Nuzi.name: Nomad Nuzi
Nomad Nuzi.description: This Micro Uzi has been modified to the point it is no longer recognizable.

Okusa SMG .45 Auto.name: Okusa SMG .45 Auto
Okusa SMG .45 Auto.description: The discrete Korean firm Okusa sells weapons of variable quality. Inded the SMG 45, which profits from a great fire power, with its ovoid 50 bullets clip suffers from troobleshoots which often cause to jam. Moreover, it lacks accuracy. In a word, a too much expensive weapon comparate to its drawbacks, which isn't promised to become a big hit.

Seburo FS-12.name: Seburo FS-12
Seburo FS-12.description: A nice, and extremely comfortable bullpup weapon, with almost no felt recoil and good durability. A weapon equally at home on the streets and in the bush.

Setzuko-Arasaka Tiny-Shot.name: Setzuko-Arasaka Tiny-Shot
Setzuko-Arasaka Tiny-Shot.description: A stealthy and efficient SMG, which compete with the classical weapon of this category, the Uzi Miniauto.

Stolvoboy STS-45.name: Stolvoboy STS-45
Stolvoboy STS-45.description: Reminiscent of Ingrams Mac-10, this weapon is insanely popular due to its low price and simple firing mechanism.The sliding stock is cheap, but works as well as it has too. The only downside is lack of forward grip, don't blow off your fingertips.

Suranam Booster Gun.name: Suranam Booster Gun
