Suranam Booster Gun.description: The Suranam Booster Gun is a proof that with Korean know-how and a few grams of plastic, one can make an automatic weapon which, without beeing in the best on the market, has attracted many purchasers all over the world.

Teen Dreem.name: Teen Dreem
Teen Dreem.description: Cheap polymer gun. While firing in automatic mode, on a roll dice from 1 to 6, roll the dice again and withdraw : if the result is negative, the gun melts.

Towa CPOS-1120.name: Towa CPOS-1120
Towa CPOS-1120.description: This weapon. although poorly made, sells very well due to its very low cost. Its only real feature is its built in suppresser. This is a very common weapon found in the hands of pirates, gangs, and other groups whose priorities value low expense over quality.

Tsunami Arms RPNC-607.name: Tsunami Arms RPNC-607
Tsunami Arms RPNC-607.description: Another innovative design from the people who revolutionized the way a submachine gun should feel and perform. Security specialists, vehicle crews and police agencies around the world are taking notice of this weapon, and to offset the low ammunition capacity, a 50 round drum magazine is available.

Tsunami Arms Shu-1.name: Tsunami Arms Shu-1
Tsunami Arms Shu-1.description: This automatic pistol from TA reaches near Seburo levels of customization options, some merely aesthetic, others quite useful, such as the stock which can be interchanged with the grips in less than 30 seconds. As an added feature, their are two varieties of stock, (both add a +2 to accuracy) one which stores 1 extra magazine, and the other which stores 2. A 32 round magazine is available and the storage spaces on both stocks will accept them.

Arasaka Barrage.name: Arasaka Barrage
Arasaka Barrage.description: A man portable enclosed minigun capable of firing at 6000 rpm. It is quite heavy, and we recommend using a gyro-stabilization torso harness, or at the very least a shoulder sling when using this weapon.

Arasaka DE-Mag.name: Arasaka DE-Mag
Arasaka DE-Mag.description: A very compact but controllable submachine gun.

Arasaka Drummer-Boy.name: Arasaka Drummer-Boy
Arasaka Drummer-Boy.description: A compact SMG with a staggering ammo capacity.

Arasaka Honshushot 11.name: Arasaka Honshushot 11
Arasaka Honshushot 11.description: Arasaka chose a design close to the concept of the heavy pistol, easily concealable under a jacket, and a clip ejecting the bullets by the middle. The weapon itself lacks of balancing, and so, accuracy, but has, like all Arasaka products, a very good reliability.

Beretta 1010 Machine Pistol.name: Beretta 1010 Machine Pistol
Beretta 1010 Machine Pistol.description: Concealment can be reduced to jacket with a 15 bullets clip and withdrawing the barrel, designed for a quick assembling. Quite inaccurate in its basic version, the 1010 can be equiped with a "quality barrel kit" (200 eb) built by Australian Ammo, wich increases its accuracy to 0, and can also be fitted with a laser sight or a smarlink interface.

Beretta Cricket PDW.name: Beretta Cricket PDW
Beretta Cricket PDW.description: Very common sub machine gun in police and security circles.

Beretta Mosquito PDW.name: Beretta Mosquito PDW
Beretta Mosquito PDW.description: SMG similar to the Cricket in its characteristics but quite different in its design. As shown in the illustration, its stock can be used as a foregrip when folded.

Beretta PM 36.name: Beretta PM 36
Beretta PM 36.description: A very modern design for the italian firm's last creation. The 36 is a prety good SMG, both accurate, because of its scope for long range shot, and deadly with its 11mm bullets inserted in its short and wide clip. As a conclusion, the PM 36 is an expensive but reliable weapon. Federated Arms and Beretta are still arguing about its design, accusing each other of corporate espionnage.

Calico KA-23.name: Calico KA-23
Calico KA-23.description: Using the old concept of submachine gun with helicoidal cartridges clip, Calico makes a noticeable come-back with this weapon modern and adapted to its time. The butt must be fold up to reload.

CCMMC Tuzi-7.name: CCMMC Tuzi-7
CCMMC Tuzi-7.description: A weapon mainly made with plastic polymers, cheap and with a poor accuracy. rarely sold in western countries, it's nethertheless made in huge quantities and sold in all Asia.

Colt Cobra.name: Colt Cobra
Colt Cobra.description: Popular for its size, fair price and heavy load.

Dai Lung C22Z.name: Dai Lung C22Z
Dai Lung C22Z.description: When Dai Lung decides to copy a competitor, he doesn't do things halfway ! In addition to strongly resembling the Seburo C-X, it practically takes the name of one of the other products of the Japanese firm. Nevertheless in spite of a successful design, one can hardly expect much from a weapon at such a price...

Eagletech Jammer.name: Eagletech Jammer
Eagletech Jammer.description: EagleTech company, specialized in bows and crossbows manufacturing, build this quality polymer weapon under licence of Federated Arms. The weapon itself hasn't yet attracted many buyers even if it deserves it.

Espinoza Shark.name: Espinoza Shark
Espinoza Shark.description: A polymer SMG far below western standards, which, nethertheless, has a great success in South America, thanks to its small price. Thus, in Peruvia or Bolivia, it is the standard weapon of police forces.

Federated Arms Mini 10.name: Federated Arms Mini 10
Federated Arms Mini 10.description: Federated Arms sell this SMG since 2013. It's known as a good weapon, equivalent to japanese standards.

Federated Arms NT-LEP1.name: Federated Arms NT-LEP1
Federated Arms NT-LEP1.description: Stepping even further up the foodchain, the P-27 retains the same action, yet upgrades again into 10 mm.

Federated Arms P-27.name: Federated Arms P-27
Federated Arms P-27.description: Stepping even further up the foodchain, the P-27 retains the same action, yet upgrades again into 11 mm.

FN MPA-57.name: FN MPA-57
FN MPA-57.description: The MPA (Modular Pistol, Adaptive) is a personal defense weapon based on the M8 Ghosthawk, with which it can share not only ammunition but also magazines.

FN P94.name: FN P94
FN P94.description: The P94 is a modernized version of its illustrious predecessor, the P90. It has exactly the same features except for a design closer to the Seburo's own design.

IMI PM Gamdai.name: IMI PM Gamdai
IMI PM Gamdai.description: Optional 25 mm grenade launcher or 10 gauge shotgun (5D6/4D6/3D6) under barrel. Accuracy : 0, clip : 1, reliability : standard, range : 25 meters for shot cartridge, 100 meters for grenade, 300 eb. The concealment can be decreased to long coat when using a 2 x 20 magazines.

IMI Uzi 10M.name: IMI Uzi 10M
IMI Uzi 10M.description: A coming back to the source of the Uzi with this 10 mm version of the legendary SMG, which is very different from its cousin, the Miniauto 9 mm. this model has, a classical vertical clip, a folding stock, which provides to it a good accuracy at long range. It's one of the best weapons of 2020 years.

Ingram Smartgun Model 20T.name: Ingram Smartgun Model 20T
Ingram Smartgun Model 20T.description: The May issue of Street Fighting Man listed the Ingram Smartgun (Model 20T) as its readers' SMG of choice. One look and you'll see why more smart boys and girls carry the Ingram. Don't make the same mistake your enemy did. Carry the Model 20T.Weapon comes factory-equipped with a smartgun link (+2 WA not included) and folding stock (conceal N, +1 WA when extended).

Metacorp P9C.name: Metacorp P9C
Metacorp P9C.description: Metacorp doesn't hesitate to copy a good design. Nevertheless this submachine gun, using the old P90 cartridge clip, has no reason to blush compared to its elder thanks to its integrated laser sight.

Militech ASG-2.name: Militech ASG-2
Militech ASG-2.description: The Militech ASG-2 is a military-grade SMG, designed partially on the basis of an assault rifle. By removing the scope it is possible to hide it under a coat. In addition to this scope it is equipped with a tactical lamp or a laser sight of your choice (placed under the barrel).

Militech Bullfighter.name: Militech Bullfighter
Militech Bullfighter.description: This compact submachine pistol is a true favorite in the professional community. Light enough, and with enough of a controlled recoil to fire one handed, and compact enough to wear under a large jacket in a shoulder holster.

Militech PM-10.name: Militech PM-10
Militech PM-10.description: Optional grenade launcher : -1 L C 25 mm 4 2 ST 200 eb

Militech Ronin TommyGun 2020.name: Militech Ronin TommyGun 2020
Militech Ronin TommyGun 2020.description: The 21st Century answer to the famous Thompson submachine gun. Chambered in the mighty 11 mm caseless load, and firing at a controlled 600RPM, the TommyGun 2020 has the options of loading 35 round magazines or 100 round drums specifically designed for it. It is also occasionally available in 12 mm (rare, +1, 100eb, 30 rounds or 100 drum, ROF : 20)

Militech Viper.name: Militech Viper
Militech Viper.description: Sound suppressor for 80 eb. Remains efficient during hundred shots.

Mustang Arms ARS-5C.name: Mustang Arms ARS-5C
Mustang Arms ARS-5C.description: In option : camouflage version 650 eb, personalized camouflage 700 eb, aim scope 100 eb, laser sight 100 eb, suppressor 50 eb, smartlink 600 eb.

Nova Arms Hodges.name: Nova Arms Hodges
Nova Arms Hodges.description: An inexpensive and common submachin gun favored with street gangs and third world nations.

SCK Model 100 SMG.name: SCK Model 100 SMG
SCK Model 100 SMG.description: Manufactured by Shin Chou Kogyo, Tokyo, the SCK Model 100 is used by more Japanese Security Forces worldwide than any other submachine gun. Rumour tells that even the elite Red Samurai pack this weapon ! When it's time to pick the best, choose the one the best picked !Weapon comes factory-equipped with integral smargun link (+2 WA not included) and folding stock (conceal N, +1 WA when extended)

Seburo C-25.name: Seburo C-25
Seburo C-25.description: Another excellent SMG produced by Seburo. It is equipped with a brass-catcher and has been designed to fire HV ammunition without malfunctioning.

Seburo C-28.name: Seburo C-28
Seburo C-28.description: Seburo loves to surprise us and with the C-28 they didn't miss their stunt. This SMG is designed to be the opposite of the C-25 : the magazine is, like the P90, placed at the top of the weapon, and the brass-catcher at the bottom near the stock. Unfortunately, while it is surprising in its design, its characteristics are exactly the same as those of the C-25.

Seburo C-XT.name: Seburo C-XT
Seburo C-XT.description: Why search a better design when you already have the best ? Seburo has well understood that and reworked his famous C-X to change it into an excellent sub-machine gun equiped with an integrated silencer.

Seburo J9.name: Seburo J9
Seburo J9.description: Longer version of Seburo Para, this weapon is logically more accurate. Moreover, it has been strengthened to fire with HV ammunitions without dysfunction (damages : 2D6+3 AP) and is equipped with an effective silencer.

Seburo J10.name: Seburo J10
Seburo J10.description: The J10 is very similiar to the J9, with the magazine displaced to the rear to allow the mount of scopes and other accessories. It is also equiped with a silencer shorter but equally efficient.

Seburo MN-10.name: Seburo MN-10
Seburo MN-10.description: A prototype of the MN-23, the MN-10 was primarily intended for police forces as a SMG.

Stolvoboy SVH-10 Hurrican.name: Stolvoboy SVH-10 Hurrican
Stolvoboy SVH-10 Hurrican.description: This SMG is close to a machine gun thanks to a very high rate of fire and a large helical magazine located under a hood at the rear.

Tsunami Arms M-36.name: Tsunami Arms M-36
Tsunami Arms M-36.description: A rather unremarkable weapon, most used by tank and vehicle crews. The folding stock is a bit awkward, and has a tendency of becoming loose fairly quickly with use.

Walther Bi-Cannon DPK.name: Walther Bi-Cannon DPK
Walther Bi-Cannon DPK.description: A scary machinegun, with a double chamber system that provides a great rate of fire and optimized cooling which garantees its good reliability. The loading is made with an helicoidal clip placed in the rear part of the gun.

Arasaka MZ-045.name: Arasaka MZ-045
Arasaka MZ-045.description: Even the retracting stock doesn't do much for the acuracy of this heavy combat SMG. Still, it's better to be holding this weapon that having it pointed at you, the damage it can do is devastating.

Arasaka UR-42.name: Arasaka UR-42
Arasaka UR-42.description: Another high caliber submachine gun, this one from Arasaka. An excellent weapon firing 12 mm ammunition at 600 rounds per minute. And with caseless ammunition you leave no evidence behind.

Bushmaster M-17 SMG.name: Bushmaster M-17 SMG
Bushmaster M-17 SMG.description: Shortened version of the M-17S, closer to an assault rifle than a SMG.

Calico LWS-MP.name: Calico LWS-MP
Calico LWS-MP.description: A SMG sold with a case of accessories, to which can be mounted with three different appearances, depending of what use is needed. Each model comes with a laser sight (+1 accuracy when used, useful from 0 to 150 meters). Assembly and disassembly can be done without tools and will take 3 minutes maximum for a trained user.The assault rifle version, equiped with a grenade launcher (0 25mm 2 2 STD 150m) isn't available on the civilian market. In this case, the Calico Pack is limited to the two first versions, for 1300 eb.

Cybertronic P1000 SMG.name: Cybertronic P1000 SMG
Cybertronic P1000 SMG.description: As with all Cybertronic-designed weapons, the P1000 SMG is a masterpiece of craftmanship, reliability and "user friendliness". The action is solid orbital-alloy construction with a unique impact-resistant polymer casing.

Daewoo 11 mm Mitsumi.name: Daewoo 11 mm Mitsumi
Daewoo 11 mm Mitsumi.description: Realy a light machinegun with the size of a heavy SMG. Its belt feeding can provide it with an impressive amount of ammunition. The Daewoo can reasonably shoot for 10 seconds (3 rounds) after which it usually jams due to heating and expansion.

Federated Arms P6 Auto.name: Federated Arms P6 Auto
Federated Arms P6 Auto.description: Possibly the heaviest SMG type in the world ! The P6, technicaly very close to an assault rifle, uses the 6 mm caseless cartridge created for the H&K G6 gun. Unfortunatly, the American firm could not mimic the accuracy nor the revolutionary rotating clip of the german SMG. The result, even if one admits an originality in the shape, is a quite inaccurate and slow automatic weapon, which explains for its poor sales.

Heckler & Koch G6 ASA Pistol.name: Heckler & Koch G6 ASA Pistol
Heckler & Koch G6 ASA Pistol.description: Shortened version of the G-6 machinegun. The result is a SMG which "blows off". Not to be put into anyones hands.

Heckler & Koch HK 227-S.name: Heckler & Koch HK 227-S
Heckler & Koch HK 227-S.description: Available with a wide variety of options and configurations, the HK 227-S is currently being marketed to special forces and police agencies around the world, especially to anti-cyborg teams who are interested do to its large caliber chambering of the 12 mm round.

Heckler & Koch MP-11 L.name: Heckler & Koch MP-11 L
Heckler & Koch MP-11 L.description: Optional grenade launcher, -1 N C 25 mm 2 1 STD 200 eb.

Heckler & Koch MPK-11 Kurz.name: Heckler & Koch MPK-11 Kurz
Heckler & Koch MPK-11 Kurz.description: A model reduced to the minimum, designed to be easily hidden under a coat. With a 20 bullet clip and without the front grip, one can try to hide it under a jacket.

Heckler & Koch MPK-11 Standard.name: Heckler & Koch MPK-11 Standard
Heckler & Koch MPK-11 Standard.description: A classic model of the famous german SMG.

Heckler & Koch MPK-12.name: Heckler & Koch MPK-12
Heckler & Koch MPK-12.description: The favorite SMG for security militias, anti-riot cops throughout Europe and elsewhere. However, when used again crowds, it's generally loaded with rubber bullets.

Heckler & Koch MPK-20.name: Heckler & Koch MPK-20
Heckler & Koch MPK-20.cartridge: 12 mm RE (4D6+1 AP, dégâts à la chair doublés)

Militech MMP-80.name: Militech MMP-80
Militech MMP-80.description: A huge gun firing the enormously powerful 12 mm round. This weapon is capable of taking down almost anything, and if your enemy sees he will probably be so intimidated you won't have to fire a shot, which is good, because at the price of 12 mm ammo you don't want to waste money unnecessarily.

Paltik Pistol.name: Paltik Pistol
Paltik Pistol.description: A "small" SMG hard to control. Reserved to people who have a strong grip (CON >8).

Seburo Fire Splash.name: Seburo Fire Splash
Seburo Fire Splash.description: The Fire Splash is the logical evolution of the C-25. It is larger in size but still compact and accurate.

Seburo Para.name: Seburo Para
Seburo Para.description: The Para has two particular features : high capacity helical magazine and an impressive silencer that allows silent automatic fire.

Sowet Blackhand.name: Sowet Blackhand
Sowet Blackhand.description: A weapon which comes from Africa, well-made and very appreciated by african police for its high stopping power.

Sternmeyer DP11A.name: Sternmeyer DP11A
Sternmeyer DP11A.description: Special : this weapon is equiped with a selection system which allows to choose the rate of fire (10 to 30), and the firepower from 2D6 to 5D6. The total discharge of the battery (300 eb, allows 150 shots at middle firepower) depends obviously on the intended use.The DP11A is a rare weapon that needs to be cared for, and so, a luxury on these days, but it could well prefigure what SMGs of 2030s will be like.

Thompson M2020.name: Thompson M2020
Thompson M2020.description: Successor of the famous Thompson M1A1, this version benefits from a modern caliber and a revisited design.

6P41 Pecheneg.name: 6P41 Pecheneg
6P41 Pecheneg.description: A new advanced design, the Pecheneg features a new heavier barrel for improved accuracy. Special sights can be easily fitted, such as night sight scopes or infra-red scopes. Bipod comes in standard.

Beretta AS70-90.name: Beretta AS70-90
Beretta AS70-90.description: The AS70/90 is a derivitive of the AR70/90 assault rifle and uses a similar action, with this gun using an open bolt for sustained automatic fire. It is designed as a squad-level LMG.

Bren L4A4.name: Bren L4A4
Bren L4A4.description: Although it appeared during the Second World War, this weapon is regarded as one of the best light machine guns.

FN M249 SAW.name: FN M249 SAW
FN M249 SAW.description: This weapon can also be supplied with standard M16 magazines.

FN MAG.name: FN MAG
FN MAG.description: Mechanically the MAG is a very simple weapon. The action is gas-powered and uses a tipping breechblock. The bipod can be folded to form a simple forward handgrip, the barrel can be removed and replaced quickly, and the stock can be either plaztic or wooden. The gun itself may be mounted on a bipod, tripod, or a pinle mount.

Heckler & Koch HK 11E.name: Heckler & Koch HK 11E
Heckler & Koch HK 11E.description: The HK11E was a squad support weapon or light machine gun, feeding 7.62NATO ammunition from any of the HK 7.62 caliber box magazines or from it's own special 50 round drum magazine. The HK11 uses a quick change barrel and heavy bipod.

Heckler & Koch HK 13E.name: Heckler & Koch HK 13E
Heckler & Koch HK 13E.description: The HK13E is a modified HK23E, with a different bolt group and with a box magazine adapter. It can use standard HK33 series magazines or M16 magazines with an adapter.

Heckler & Koch HK 21E.name: Heckler & Koch HK 21E
Heckler & Koch HK 21E.description: The HK21E was a general purpose light machine gun used by some european armies. It came with a quick change barrel and heavy bipod, and used metallic non-disintegrating DM1 belts, or it could be ordered with a feed mechanism to allow it to use M60/DM6 standard disintegrating metallic link belts.

Heckler & Koch HK 23E.name: Heckler & Koch HK 23E
Heckler & Koch HK 23E.description: The HK23E was designed as a squad automatic weapon, firing 5.56N ammo from the same disintegrating metallic link belts used by the M249 system.

M60E4.name: M60E4
M60E4.description: Latest and improved version of the antic M60.

Norinco QBZ Type 95 LMG.name: Norinco QBZ Type 95 LMG
Norinco QBZ Type 95 LMG.description: This gun is the LMG variant of the QBZ family of weapons. Its bullpup design give it superior accuracy and range over similar LMGs. It features a heavier barrel and a folding bipod both designed for sustained automatic fire. There is no option for a belt-fed mechanism, however. Also accepts standard QBZ magazines.

Rheinmetall MG3.name: Rheinmetall MG3
Rheinmetall MG3.description: A direct decendant of the MG42 of WWII fame, the MG3 is designed to fire the lighter 7.62 round using the roller-lock action. Features a quick-change barrel.

Steyr Aug Hbar.name: Steyr Aug Hbar
Steyr Aug Hbar.description: The AUG HBAR takes the standard AUG action and adds a longer heavier barrel, a muzzle break, and a folding bipod. The weapon uses the closed bolt system common to is assault rifle origins, but this can be replaced with an open-bolt for automatic fire.

Sumitomo Type 62 GPMG.name: Sumitomo Type 62 GPMG
Sumitomo Type 62 GPMG.description: Type 62 General Purpose Machine Gun was developed during early 1960s and adopted by Japan Self-Defense Forces (JSDF) in 1962. It is still in use by JSDF, and it was never exported from Japan.

Browning M2HB.name: Browning M2HB
Browning M2HB.description: The M2HB features a heavy barrel and an improved .50 cal round, improving accuracy and power. The gun can only be fired from a tripod or pintle mount, because of its weight. It is a cumbersome weapon, but has tremendous firepower.

DShK.name: DShK
DShK.description: This weapon is so heavy it must be used on a heavy mount featuring two wheels to facilitate movement. Can be easily converted to an anti-aircrat weapon.

KPV.name: KPV
KPV.description: The KPV is one of the heaviest HMGs ever made. It comes close to being called a light autocannon it is so large. Is a very reliable anti-aircraft MG, but performs well on vehicular mounts or battlefield tri or bipods.

M134 Minigun.name: M134 Minigun
M134 Minigun.description: With such fire power, this weapon can only be controlled when mounted on a vehicle.

NSV-12.7 Utes.name: NSV-12.7 Utes
NSV-12.7 Utes.description: Altough it generally mounted on a tank, it can also be mounted on a tripod.

ST Kinetics .50 MG.name: ST Kinetics .50 MG
ST Kinetics .50 MG.description: This heavy MG was deigned by ST Kinetics of Singapore to replace old M2HB in service with Singapore military. The STK .50 features quick changeable barrel with fixed headspace and a dual feed system (left or right, selectable) for quick change of type ammunition fired. Currently in service in Singapore and offered for export.

XM214 Microgun.name: XM214 Microgun
XM214 Microgun.description: With such fire power, this weapon can only be controlled when mounted on a vehicle.

Ares MP LMG.name: Ares MP LMG
Ares MP LMG.description: The Ares Man Portable is the weapon of choice of more military and paramilitary organizations than any other Light Machine Gun. Capable of sustained automatic fire for hours on end, the Ares MP comes equipped with a hip-pad bracing system for use with a shoulder sling. This weapon is designed to be fired from the hip, and no provision has been made for shouldering it.

Armalite M60-D.name: Armalite M60-D
Armalite M60-D.description: Ammo 7,62N (5D6+2) and standard reliability for the old series.

CCMMC HAR-22 Helghast.name: CCMMC HAR-22 Helghast
CCMMC HAR-22 Helghast.description: Despite its massive, this gatling fire a pretty low efficient ammunition. It is still powerful enough to make porridge from any enemy, if you have enough strength to control it during the shooting.

CCMMC MGR-42.name: CCMMC MGR-42
CCMMC MGR-42.description: A chinese military machinegun, the folding foregrip is a nice touch. Able to accept an 80 round magazine or belt fed ammunition.

Colt M70 Minigun.name: Colt M70 Minigun
Colt M70 Minigun.description: Short ranged weapon with a pretty good rate of fire. An electric engine allows the four barrels to rotate before starting to fire. A round of "heating" is necessary before the barrel can rotate fast enough to reach the entire rate of fire for the weapon. If the gunner shoots immediately, apply half the rate of fire during the first round (20). There is no need to mention that one must be well muscled to hold the M70 minigun efficiently while it is being fired.

Colt MG-678.name: Colt MG-678
Colt MG-678.description: A very nicely designed, easy to maintain machine guun from colt, the MG-678 accepts either a 30 round box magazine, a 100 round drum, or belted ammunition.

Constitutional Arms Cyclone.name: Constitutional Arms Cyclone
Constitutional Arms Cyclone.description: Bipod included in the standard version.

Cyberdyn M19.name: Cyberdyn M19
Cyberdyn M19.description: US Army's command, this machine gun is derived from the assault rifle Cyberdyn M3. It's equiped with integrated laser sight and a scope.

Cyberdyn M330B.name: Cyberdyn M330B
Cyberdyn M330B.description: US Army's command, Cyberdyn brought out an unsatisfying version of this light machine gun before pull herself together and deliver this jewel equiped with a scope, a tactical light and a laser sight.

FN Mag 5.name: FN Mag 5
FN Mag 5.description: More military and security agencies world-wide choose the FN-MAG 5 medium machine gun as their light vehicle weapon or general purpose machine gun.

Heckler & Koch G6 Advanced Squad Automat.name: Heckler & Koch G6 Advanced Squad Automatic

Hughes 5.56 Minigun.name: Hughes 5.56 Minigun
Hughes 5.56 Minigun.description: Mostly used on vehicles or on tripods. Plan to use a lineair frame if you wish to use this gadget while carrying it.

Kalashnikov RPK-18.name: Kalashnikov RPK-18
Kalashnikov RPK-18.description: A machine gun variant of the AK-19 with a heavier barrel and bipod, it has served successfully in many countries as a support weapon.

Militech High Power 15.name: Militech High Power 15
Militech High Power 15.description: A three chambered, tri barrelled, high speed autocannon for personal use.

Militech M-77.name: Militech M-77
Militech M-77.description: A very standard squad support weapon from Militech, belt fed and very durable.

Rostovic MR-68.name: Rostovic MR-68
Rostovic MR-68.description: A standard machinegun, able to accept 100 round drums or belted ammo. A high rate of fire and above average accuracy makes this one of Rostovic's top military products.

Royal Enfield Tigershark LMG.name: Royal Enfield Tigershark LMG
Royal Enfield Tigershark LMG.description: This light machine gun has a secondary magazine located just behind the primary which allows it to increase its ammo capacity considerably.

Stein & Wasserman Model HM.name: Stein & Wasserman Model HM
Stein & Wasserman Model HM.description: A light machinegun which fires explosive bullets and grenades at a high rate of fire. Grenade launcher : 0 12 2 40 mm VR 200 m.

StreetTech Colombia.name: StreetTech Colombia
StreetTech Colombia.description: This support infantry weapon which appeared during the wars in South America. It's a light machinegun with two barrels and with a 40 mm long range grenade launcher. It doesn't have any overheating problem, due to its double explosion chamber system. Only its weight (over 10 kilos loaded) can disturb an infantryman. It is easier to use on a tripod or a vehicule. Grenade launcher : 0 7 1 40 mm VR 200 m.

Towa Type 20 Advanced Infantry Combat We.name: Towa Type 20 Advanced Infantry Combat Weapon
Towa Type 20 Advanced Infantry Combat We.description: Bipod, smartlink and mini-grenade launcher (0 4 2 25 mm 100m) on the standard model.

Tsunami Arms OZ06.name: Tsunami Arms OZ06
Tsunami Arms OZ06.description: A very simple MG, with a huge drum magazine. For less snag, and ease of carrying the shoulder stock unfolds.

Arasaka HAM-17.name: Arasaka HAM-17
Arasaka HAM-17.description: This belt fed "big 50" can be either tripod mounted, or placed in an open mount on a vehicle. A true support weapon, this will cover an area large enough for your men to advance, or sweep a field of fire to surely cut down any attacking force. The HAM-17 can be either belt or magazine fed, and smartchipping is available.

Browning M2A5HB.name: Browning M2A5HB
Browning M2A5HB.description: Maybe the oldest design still in service, moderm technology slightly reduced it's weight.

Dover GA-1112 Autogun.name: Dover GA-1112 Autogun
Dover GA-1112 Autogun.description: Sold as a "man-portable system", his high rate of fire make vehicular mount a wise choice.

Goncz-Taurus 7.62 mm Minigun.name: Goncz-Taurus 7.62 mm Minigun
Goncz-Taurus 7.62 mm Minigun.description: Weight and volume of ammo supply usually limit this weapon to stationnary or vehicular mounts.

Heckler & Koch G20 10 mm Machine Gun.name: Heckler & Koch G20 10 mm Machine Gun
Heckler & Koch G20 10 mm Machine Gun.description: The 10 mm MG is commonly used with AP rounds (half damage behind armor).

Heckler & Koch MGAC-06.name: Heckler & Koch MGAC-06
Heckler & Koch MGAC-06.description: This European heavy assault cannon is a scaled down version of the same sort of cannon usually mounted to the nose of helicopters. Yet it is fully man portable, and fireable. Accuracy drops by 3 if not using a gyrostabilizer mount or tripod however.

Militech BART-4.name: Militech BART-4
Militech BART-4.description: Damn thats a big gun, 30 mm belt fed, the BART-4 is the bane of armor. Must be either mounted on a vehicle, or on a reinforced tripod to be fired.

Militech HMG 9000.name: Militech HMG 9000
Militech HMG 9000.description: Do you really need to lay down a field of fire that will absolutely destroy anything in its path, then you need the HMG 9000. This electrically fired heavy machine gun is man portable but only by a full borg, and with the aid of a gyro stabilizer you can even fire it on the run. For more accurate fire you can mount it on a vehicle or tripod. It accepts belt fed ammunition only and for an extra 200 eb you can get it smartchipped. -3 to accuracy if firing the weapon without gyro stabilizer or tripod.

Militech L-37.name: Militech L-37
Militech L-37.description: This heavy machine gun is perfect for defending your perimeter. Used extensively by many militaries around the world, including the US.

Militech M22HB.name: Militech M22HB
Militech M22HB.description: This is Militech's version of the updated M2HB, mechanically the weapon remains similar, however Militech has upgraded the weapon with standard smartlink that incorporates a range finder that allows the shooter to know the exact elevation to raise the gun for shooting at distance. The weapon also features an advanced cooling system built in, so it can maintain sustained fire without having to change out the barrel as often. It can be either tripod mounted, or placed in an open mount on a vehicle.

Royal Enfield BAR-45.name: Royal Enfield BAR-45
Royal Enfield BAR-45.description: This bullpup machine gun packs one hell of a wallop.

Royal Enfield Viceroy.name: Royal Enfield Viceroy
Royal Enfield Viceroy.description: This extremely impressive anti-tank gun fires the enormous 20 mm round at an incredible 2400 rounds per minute. It must be mounted on a tripod, gyrostabilizer, or vehicle to be fired. Smartchipping is available. Very common sight on EDF vehicles.

Tohiatsu Minivulcan.name: Tohiatsu Minivulcan
Tohiatsu Minivulcan.description: This six-barreled gatling machinegun is marketed as "the firepower of a jet fighter in the hand of mechanized infantry". Well, sort of ! It fires a subcaliber, discarding sabot round less powerful than a true 20 mm shell. It is still mostly a vehicular weapon because of it's weight (50 kg, unloaded, and 20 kg for a 100-round belt). In game terms, you need top of the line linear frame or an ACPA to fire this thing without a mount.

Colt-Mauser LLR 25 mm.name: Colt-Mauser LLR 25 mm
Colt-Mauser LLR 25 mm.description: * 25 mm explosive rocket "search & destroy". They track the designated target at the time of firing. Damage : 5D6 AP beyond 50 meters, otherwise 3D6. Then 3D6 by explosion, if the armor is penetrated. 80 eb apiece.

Hughes Rocket Rifle.name: Hughes Rocket Rifle
Hughes Rocket Rifle.description: * 18 mm jacketed incendiary rocket (3D10 AP + 1D6 points of damage for the next 2 rounds). 40 eb each.

Malorian Arms Elite.name: Malorian Arms Elite
Malorian Arms Elite.description: * Damages : 5D6 at close range, 6D6+3 at medium range, 7D6 at long range and 7D6+1 at extreme range. Each rocket costs 30 eb. Malorian designed this weapon for the USAF space program. It uses specially designed armor-piercing Ramjet rounds. The guns sole purpose is to tear through the armor and outer hulls of spacecraft, and Lunar/Martian stations. To date this weapon has never been used in combat.

Militech BSW-10.name: Militech BSW-10
Militech BSW-10.description: A very large, very ugly sniper system from Militech. Still it's hard to beat the accuracy, and it comes smart chipped standard. Made to compete with Remingtons system.

Remington Gyro-Sniper.name: Remington Gyro-Sniper
Remington Gyro-Sniper.description: * 18mm jacketed gyroscope-stabilized incendiary rocket. Damages : 3D6+2 within 75 meters, 7D6+1D6 for two rounds beyond 100 meters. 60 eb each.

Texas Arms 351 Gyrojet.name: Texas Arms 351 Gyrojet
Texas Arms 351 Gyrojet.description: Half damage within five meters. Common and range 150 meters in space.

Tsunami Arms Raimei Ramjet Pistol.name: Tsunami Arms Raimei Ramjet Pistol
Tsunami Arms Raimei Ramjet Pistol.description: * Damages : 5D6 at close range, 6D6+3 at medium range, 7D6 at long range and 7D6+1 at extreme range. Each rocket costs 30 eb.

Tsunami Arms Ramjet Rifle.name: Tsunami Arms Ramjet Rifle
Tsunami Arms Ramjet Rifle.description: * Damages : 5D6+3 at close range, 6D6+1 at medium range, 7D6 at long range, 7D6+3 at extreme range. Armor tripled, but damage to flesh doubled.

CCMMC MSH-85.name: CCMMC MSH-85
CCMMC MSH-85.description: The MSH-85 does have a tendency to misfire. For ease of carry, its tube retracts.
CCMMC MSH-85.cartridge: 70 mm rocket (4D10 AP, 3D6 dans un rayon de 3m)

CCMMC RPG-B16.name: CCMMC RPG-B16
CCMMC RPG-B16.description: A Chinese bazooka styled rocket launcher, featuring a weighted rear lug for better counter balance, which vastly improves aim and makes it easier to keep the weapon steady. The rocket itself is noteworthy due to the fact that all the weapons propellant is stored in the stem, which falls away activating 4 pop out fins on the explosive head which keep the rocket flying straight onto its target.

CCMMC SAT-30.name: CCMMC SAT-30
CCMMC SAT-30.cartridge: 70 mm rocket (4D10 AP, 3D6 dans un rayon de 3m)

Dai Lung Buster.name: Dai Lung Buster
Dai Lung Buster.description: If you need a cheap rocket launcher this weapon is for you.
Dai Lung Buster.cartridge: 105 mm rocket (11D10 AP, 4D6 dans un rayon de 3m)

Hughes HLAW.name: Hughes HLAW
Hughes HLAW.cartridge: 105 mm rocket (11D10 AP, 4D6 dans un rayon de 3m)

Hughes LAW.name: Hughes LAW
Hughes LAW.cartridge: 70 mm rocket (4D10 AP, 3D6 dans un rayon de 3m)

Militech AM-3 Anti-Matter Rifle.name: Militech AM-3 Anti-Matter Rifle
Militech AM-3 Anti-Matter Rifle.description: A difficulty 15 Body check is required to avoid suffering 1D3 damage to the firing arm.
Militech AM-3 Anti-Matter Rifle.accuracy: +1 (0 à moins de 160m et à plus de 800m)
Militech AM-3 Anti-Matter Rifle.cartridge: 30 mm uranium rocket (6D10+12 AP, dégâts divisés par trois à moins de 160m)

Militech BAZ-12.name: Militech BAZ-12
Militech BAZ-12.description: The designers at Militech are really a bunch of creepy devils aren't they. The BAZ-12 was supposed designed to make it possible for vehicle crews to carry heavy firepower, without taking up too much space, as well as a more portable RPG for U.S. military personnel. However, the BAZ-12 folds up into such a small package that it can easily fit inside most large suitcases or duffel bags. Due to this the weapon has become extremely popular with black ops teams, and unfortnately terrorists.

Militech X-00 Damocles.name: Militech X-00 Damocles
Militech X-00 Damocles.description: This low-yield nuclear device was developed by Militech as a way to destroy hardened bunkers and caves. The Damocles can be set to detonate on impact or by range. After detonation there will be an initial radioactive contamination of twice the area of the blast. The radiation will be considerably high for the first 24 hours but drop quickly after that, contaminating the soil and other materials in the area with low, but still dangerous if exposure is prolonged, levels of radiation. The Damocles is the final result of the re-opening of the W54 program, put forth by General Quartermain in preparation for a third South American Conflict, where caves, underground bunkers, dense jungles, and hardened facilities caused so many problems the last time around. The Damocles is US military use only and the Militech facility that manufactures them is itself on a military base, so even Militech does not have legal access to them.
Militech X-00 Damocles.cartridge: tactical nuclear rocket (150D10, 50D10 dans un rayon de 50m)

Royal Enfield Ordnance 25 mm Cockerill A.name: Royal Enfield Ordnance 25 mm Cockerill Assault Cannon
Royal Enfield Ordnance 25 mm Cockerill A.description: * Available ammunitions : AP (5D10+10 AP), HEP (6D10 half stun, armor divided by 4), APF (darts shell, range 100 meters, width 4 meters. 1D6+3 hits to each target in the area, inflicting 1D6+1 AP damage per hit). A Body of at least 8 required to fire from the shoulder. Bipod comes standard.

Royal Enfield Ordnance RL111.name: Royal Enfield Ordnance RL111
Royal Enfield Ordnance RL111.description: A standard RPG used by most European militaries including the EDF.

Tsunami Arms HR-280.name: Tsunami Arms HR-280
Tsunami Arms HR-280.description: Although it fires the same ammunition as the Hughes HLAW, the HR-280 doesn't really play in the same category. In particular, it is equipped with a system to propel the rocket much further than its rival, if there is one.
Tsunami Arms HR-280.cartridge: 105 mm rocket (11D10 AP, 4D6 dans un rayon de 3m)

Arasaka 3-Shot.name: Arasaka 3-Shot
Arasaka 3-Shot.description: This three shot anti-tank missile launcher fires wire guided armor-piercing HEAT missiles at the target.
Arasaka 3-Shot.cartridge: 70 mm homing missile (12D10 AP, 5D6 dans un rayon de 3m)

Arasaka G-1141.name: Arasaka G-1141
Arasaka G-1141.description: A very rare micro-missile benifitting from a small turning circle and fast reaction to target movements. Ideal for use against armored vehicles or helicopters.
Arasaka G-1141.cartridge: 40 mm radar guided missile (4D10 AP, 3D6 dans un rayon de 2m)

Arasaka M-78.name: Arasaka M-78
Arasaka M-78.description: A dual purpose missile launcher from Arasaka. For anti-tank purposes the fired missile is wire guided to target, but for anti-aircraft purposes the weapon introduces an entirely new device. Its called the VITA system, the missile itself has a small camera mounted to it, which transmits the video back to the weapon's eyepiece. The weapon controls the missile by remote though controls added to the weapons grips. What it all boils down to is that if you can play a simple video game you can hit your target. The computer, receiver, and other electronics for this system are stored in a small box about the size of a gas can, and are jacked into the weapon prior to it being fired.

Arasaka Trimis-A.name: Arasaka Trimis-A
Arasaka Trimis-A.description: Firing a laser guided rocket just a tad larger than the 40 mm micromissile, this weapon is the lastest innovation in both anti cyborg and anti-vehicle armaments. The rockets run about 80 eb apiece.

Dai Lung Horde.name: Dai Lung Horde
Dai Lung Horde.description: Dai Lung is again moving into a dangerous area with its Horde micro-missile launcher. The weapon is quickly losing favor among the Chinese troops it is issued to for its extreme inaccuracy and tendency to malfunction. Unfortunately, the weapons only real innovation, its rotating 4 barrel system, designed to prevent overheating from the missile exhaust, is the primary source of the weapons malfunctions. Most commonly the barrel will under, or over rotate and lock up, preventing the weapon from firing. When this happens the weapon must be disassembled, as due to a flaw in design the electrical system has a tendency to short out easily.

Hughes M-99 EVAW.name: Hughes M-99 EVAW
Hughes M-99 EVAW.description: Equipped with a CO2-powered 25 mm grenade launcher (accuracy : -1, magazine : 10, ROF : 1), range 200 meters.

Hughes M3-Zartan.name: Hughes M3-Zartan
Hughes M3-Zartan.description: The "pocket" version of the M-99, practical for those who can't aim. It is possible to fire all three barrels at the same time. Smoke is expelled through the two flaps at the front of the weapon.

Milan-C Missile Launcher.name: Milan-C Missile Launcher
Milan-C Missile Launcher.description: The Milan missiles are infrared guided (heat emission required). In the absence of a hot target, they launch in a straight line (accuracy : 0, range : 500 meters).
Milan-C Missile Launcher.cartridge: 70 mm homing missile (12D10 AP, 5D6 dans un rayon de 3m)

Militech Anvil III.name: Militech Anvil III
Militech Anvil III.description: This laser guided missile is tube fired like a mortar round, where the after achieving sufficient altitude to arm (20 meters), the weapon will alter course drastically, to home in on the laser designated target. It is recommended a 3 man team operate this weapon, however if one shot is all that's needed, a single individual can transport and operate the weapon.
Militech Anvil III.cartridge: thermal tracking HEAT missile (12D10 AP, 5D6 dans un rayon de 4m)

Militech GA-72.name: Militech GA-72
Militech GA-72.description: The GA-72 is a bit heavy and unwieldy, making it hard to carry in the field, but its effectiveness more than makes up for that. One man is all that's needed to fire this behemoth, and properly trained he is more than capable of defending against any airborne attackers. The most remarkable thing about the weapon is that is also useful against ground targets, and for this purpose there is a switch on the weapon, allowing it to convert to an anti-tank weapon with enormous effectiveness.

Militech Hotshot.name: Militech Hotshot
Militech Hotshot.description: The IR-sensing missile can also track a target illuminated by a laser beam. It exists in rocket version without guidance (accuracy : +2, 800 eb). The initial propulsion system is compressed air, to avoid the release of heat.
Militech Hotshot.cartridge: thermal tracking HEAT missile (12D10 AP, 5D6 dans un rayon de 4m)

Militech Medusa.name: Militech Medusa
Militech Medusa.description: Tired of wasting shots with your micro missiles due to their lack of tracking ability ? Militech has the answer, they have developed a weapon that fires wire guided micro missiles. Just keep the target in site and you will hit. To further sweeten the deal, Militech has developed wire guided versions of all the standard micro missiles currently on the market, and are available for only 60 eb apiece.
Militech Medusa.cartridge: high-explosive homing micro-missile (4D6 dans un rayon de 2m)

Militech ROC-4.name: Militech ROC-4
Militech ROC-4.description: A fourshot heat seeking missile anti-aircraft missile.

Militech Tyson.name: Militech Tyson
Militech Tyson.description: The latest in surface to air weapons, the Tyson fires a heat seeking fire and forget missile with state of the art tracking technology. The most remarkable thing about the weapon is that is also useful against ground targets, and for this purpose there is a switch on the weapon, allowing it to convert to an anti-tank weapon with enormous effectiveness.

Militech Urban Missile Launcher.name: Militech Urban Missile Launcher
Militech Urban Missile Launcher.description: Special : AP missiles (armor divided by 2) for 75 eb and HEP (4D6+2, semi-real damage, armor divided by 4).With each failed attack, the missile has 3 chances out of 10 to lose its target. In another case, it returns to attack.
Militech Urban Missile Launcher.cartridge: high-explosive homing micro-missile (4D6 dans un rayon de 2m)

Rostovic Gorba.name: Rostovic Gorba
Rostovic Gorba.description: A russian mini-missile launcher, popular to eastern europe, african, chinese and south american militaries.

Royal Enfield CB-79.name: Royal Enfield CB-79
Royal Enfield CB-79.description: Easy to operate and very effective. The CB-79 is one of Europe's favorite anti-armor weapons.

Towa GU-12.name: Towa GU-12
Towa GU-12.description: A Towa made micro-missile launcher firing the new 40 mm size missiles. Perfect for those who don't want to waste time eliminating a target.

Tsunami Arms Type 62.name: Tsunami Arms Type 62
Tsunami Arms Type 62.description: A mini-missile launcher capable of being either man portable or easily mountable on ACPA or vehicles and fired electrically. Special targeting sensors and heat dispersion vents make the weapon more accurate and safer to fire in crowded situations.

UrbanTech Lance Mini-Missile.name: UrbanTech Lance Mini-Missile
UrbanTech Lance Mini-Missile.description: * 4D6 AP (HEAT : armor divided by 2, full damage) and 2D6 burn damage within a radius of one meter. It is a miniature homing missile, housed in a disposable case. To use it, activate it, point it towards the target and launch it. If the missile misses its target, it has a 50% chance of retaining the acquisition and making another attack.

AI Arctic Warfare Super Magnum.name: AI Arctic Warfare Super Magnum
AI Arctic Warfare Super Magnum.description: Designed to fire its heavy ammunition from the ground up, it uses a powerful muzzle break compensates for the increased recoil and it uses a special scope calibrated fro use with the heavy ammunition. Also available in the .300 Winchester round. Includes an optional folding stock.

Barrett M82A1 Light Fifty.name: Barrett M82A1 Light Fifty
Barrett M82A1 Light Fifty.description: The M82 was the first modern antimaterial rifle, and enjoys widespread popularity. The action employs heavy return springs to help dampen recoil, and the heavy barrel is fluted to aid in the cooling. Includes a standard scope and iron sights, can be mounted on a bipod, tripod, or a vehicle pintle.

Barrett M82A2.name: Barrett M82A2
Barrett M82A2.description: Further development led to the M82A2 bull-pup rifle (1987), which was designed to be fired from the shoulder, but did not succeed, and was soon dropped from production.

Barrett M107.name: Barrett M107
Barrett M107.description: Slightly modernized version of the M82, in particular with the addition of a rail system for mounting all kinds of accessories.

Dakota T-76 Longbow.name: Dakota T-76 Longbow
Dakota T-76 Longbow.description: Rifle extremely precise for military and police forces.

LAR Grizzly 50 BMG.name: LAR Grizzly 50 BMG
LAR Grizzly 50 BMG.description: Surely one of the cheapest sniper rifle calibrated in .50

Mauser SR93.name: Mauser SR93
Mauser SR93.description: Mounted in an alluminum alloy frame the gun uses a free-floating barrel system to increace accuracy. Barrel is fluted to cool it after heavy use. Has an adjustable cheekpeice and a back plate. Extra long foreward grip holds a folding bipod. A larger trigger guard is available for use with gloves of mittens.

Mechem NTW-20.name: Mechem NTW-20
Mechem NTW-20.description: An extremely heavy anti-material rifle, this gun uses a recoil system similar to that seen on light artillery where the entire barrel will slide backwards into the rifle body. Because of this, the shooter will feel no more kick that if they were using a large-bore hunting rifle. Designed to break into two sections for transport. Extra barrel systems included allowing the weapons to use .50 and 14.5 mm S calibers, making this weapon one of the most flexible sniping systems on the market today.

OSV-96.name: OSV-96
OSV-96.description: The russian OSV-96 uses a gas-powered semiautomatic action. For transport the gun can be folded in half. A large carrying handle is located at the center of gravity. The OSV comes with a standard scope and bipod.

Arasaka Daemon.name: Arasaka Daemon
Arasaka Daemon.description: Sold with thermodynamic lasersight, 30 x zoom, silencer. Totally concealable, it can be disassembled in five parts (5 turns to re-assemble). It needs two turns to take aim, during wich the target is constantly under control, even if tries to move suddenly. At the beginning of the third turn, you can shoot first, without throwing the dices, and the target is hit where the player decided in the first turn.It uses piercing 13 mm bullets (200 eb for 20), if the bullett pass through any material, the damage is halved. These piercing bullets can pass through 15 structural-points materials.

Arasaka MAD-8.name: Arasaka MAD-8
Arasaka MAD-8.description: Highly accurate, this weapon is not available for sale on any market and Arasaka has announced it has no intentions of making it available. This weapon will reach x10 price to collectors and professionals. Issued only to elite Arasaka marksmen.

Armalite-Barrett CSR-50.name: Armalite-Barrett CSR-50
Armalite-Barrett CSR-50.description: CSR-50 is the bullpup version of the M90, more precise, more advanced but also more expensive.

Armalite-Barrett M90.name: Armalite-Barrett M90
Armalite-Barrett M90.description: The M-90 is the successor of the M-82, a weapon that has been around since the 80's. It can be found on the black market or in old military stockpiles. Smartgun version : 2500 eb (range : 300 mètres).

CCMMC SRI-17.name: CCMMC SRI-17
CCMMC SRI-17.description: This bullpup sniper weapon from China is one of the most acurate rifles in the world, and thats just straight out of the box. Built in folding bipod, standard scope, and small but powerful ammuntion makes this a true winner. Many professional snipers purchase this weapon, then have it electrothermally enhanced.

Colt-Mauser M2X Cannon.name: Colt-Mauser M2X Cannon
Colt-Mauser M2X Cannon.description: * Armor reduced to 1/4, penetrating damage is not reduced. If damages are absorbed but greater than half the target's SP, the target still take 1/4 of the impact's damage.

Constitutional Arms S51.name: Constitutional Arms S51
Constitutional Arms S51.description: The S51 utilizes a bullpup revolver configuration for maximum accuracy and removable cylinders for faster reloading. The cylinders on this weapon are long, allowing for specialized loads, and because it's a revolver you can mix and match rounds for any situation that might arise. Each re-usable cylinder can be programmed with the precise type of round loaded, which will display in the scope, or via smartlink, allowing you to select the round you need quickly.

Cybertronic SR3500 Sniper System.name: Cybertronic SR3500 Sniper System
Cybertronic SR3500 Sniper System.description: Electrothermically enhanced, the SR3500 looks large and bulky but is extremely light weight and stable. The SR3500 has been produced in few examples and is very rare on the street. Comes equipped with a detacheable 8x nightvision scope.

Fabrica de Armas SGS-7.name: Fabrica de Armas SGS-7
Fabrica de Armas SGS-7.description: This weapons is fed from two sources, the 10 round magazine and the 5 round choke. In most cases the choke is used for specialty rounds, while the magazine is reserved for slugs or fin stabilized sabbotted rounds. This is yet another example of a shotgun being used as a sniper platform.

Federated Arms RSR-2.name: Federated Arms RSR-2
Federated Arms RSR-2.description: Starting from an original and seductive idea on paper, equip a precision rifle with a cylinder, this weapon proved to be a disaster in practice. And even at that price, Federated Arms had a hard time selling it and quickly stopped production, hence its rarity.

Franchi SPAS-97.name: Franchi SPAS-97
Franchi SPAS-97.description: Taking its cues from the RSG Sniper, Franchi developed their own version of a sniping shotgun. Faring the same round, this weapon operates either by pump or semiautomatic. When loaded with normal ammunition this weapon becomes a formidable combat shotgun. Franchi has bested the RSG with this design, and it will be interesting to see how things progress from here.

Heckler & Koch DRS-4.name: Heckler & Koch DRS-4
Heckler & Koch DRS-4.description: The impact of the 15 mm round is unbelievable, and is usually enough to destroy whatever it hits. With the bullpup DRS-4 sniper rifle you have all the cover your team needs. The only drawback is the weapon could have bit a bit larger for stability sake, but it is still an excellent weapon. Of course the ammo is a bit hard to find, but you are resourceful aren't you ?

Mauser SEK 41.name: Mauser SEK 41
Mauser SEK 41.description: A large caliber sniper/hunting rifle, originally intended to bring down big game, but often used by anti-cyborg police sharpshooters.

Metacorp ChronoPhase.name: Metacorp ChronoPhase
Metacorp ChronoPhase.description: In spite of a name which sounds resolutely futuristic, it is a rather standard precision rifle that Metacorp delivers us.

Militech ATR-97.name: Militech ATR-97
Militech ATR-97.description: While not really the anti-tank rifle it claims to be, it is an excellent choice for putting down the rampaging borg or the even the stray light ACPA you might come across. Police agencies and military forces all over the globe have determined this weapon to be a valuable deterrent to the war on Cyborg crime.

Militech Mephisto.name: Militech Mephisto
Militech Mephisto.description: The Mephisto Sniper Rifle is a rather ordinary high-caliber rifle design with few gadgets and high reliability. It is unusually stable and robust, giving excellent accuracy and range. The detachable nightvision telescopic sight has x3 to x15 magnification and includes a red-point laser sight for short ranges.

Militech TSATW Grizzly.name: Militech TSATW Grizzly
Militech TSATW Grizzly.description: Militech completes its range of 30 mm caliber weapons with this huge rifle that has only one purpose, to give death for certain. It is closer to a light cannon than a portable weapon.

Militech USS-10.name: Militech USS-10
Militech USS-10.description: 10 gauge APFSDS is definitely in fashion at the moment and Militech is releasing its own version. The firm has made a strange design choice for its weapon because instead of the traditional magazine, a cylinder is used.

Mossberg RSG Sniper.name: Mossberg RSG Sniper
Mossberg RSG Sniper.description: Here is a novel approach to sniper rifles, use a shotgun. Seriously, this weapon is a bolt action rifle designed to fire APFSDS (Armor-Piercing Fin Stabilized Discarding Sabot) in 10 ga. The weapon is very accurate due to the stabilized round and the ammunition is considerably cheaper than the .50 BMG. Perfect for taking out vehicles and other lightly armored targets. The weapon accepts all standard 10 ga. ammunition but is only an effective sniper rifle when loaded with either the recommended FSAPDS ammo or simple 10 ga slugs.

PGM Ultima Ratio S9.name: PGM Ultima Ratio S9
PGM Ultima Ratio S9.description: This weapon fires 7.62 mm Armor-Piercing Fin-Stabilized Discarding Sabot ammo, which consists of a depleted uranium sub-caliber round that easily punches through armor. It also features a recoil absorbing stock and a gyrostabilized mount. However, the real beauty of this weapon is its targeting system.The "Full Sensing" version (the standard version with a 12x Zeiss is pictured) is equipped with a full spectrum, computer controlled targeting system which offers unparalleled accuracy. This system can see through walls as well as detect thermo-optic camouflage. The "Full Sensing" scope must be interfaced with the sniper.

Remington Haley.name: Remington Haley
Remington Haley.description: Drop a full conversion without breaking a sweat. With the Haley chambered in .300 magnum you can drop pretty much anything you have too, and with 25 shots you can keep it up all day long.

Rostovic AVR-13.name: Rostovic AVR-13
Rostovic AVR-13.description: The Rostovic AVR-13 is a heavy anti-armor sniper rifle, they recently replaced this weapon as the Russian militaries standard heavy sniper rifle, but surplus has seen excellent foreign sales, particularly to Africa and South America.

Royal Enfield LO-20.name: Royal Enfield LO-20
Royal Enfield LO-20.description: Single shot bolt action, this compact sniper rifle is ideal for making the statement "1 shot, 1 kill". A longer barrel would increase accuracy, but MI-6 was adamant that it be kept to a minimum for ease of concealment.

Seburo PAS-R2.name: Seburo PAS-R2
Seburo PAS-R2.description: Seburo's version of the RSG, a very long, extremely acurate weapon. With Seburo's always beautiful styling and excellent quality. The weapon is semi-automatic and tube fed to keep the over all profile low.

Seburo Yari.name: Seburo Yari
Seburo Yari.description: The most powerful sniper rifle available. Use of at least a bipod is strongly recommended, as is never attempting to fire the weapon from anything but a prone position. The immense recoil of this weapon is easily capable of dislocating a shoulder, or worse. Standard load for the weapon are teflon coated armor pierceing shells, able to penetrate tank armor. Using this on a human target is like shooting a bazooka at a spider, though the weapon is extremely effective against powered armor and full conversions, even military models.

Stein & Wasserman HSR 10 mm.name: Stein & Wasserman HSR 10 mm
Stein & Wasserman HSR 10 mm.description: A very large long-range rifle. Light amplification scope comes standard, optional bipod for 80 eb. Popular among borg hunters and borgs themselves.

Stolvoboy BRZ-76.name: Stolvoboy BRZ-76
Stolvoboy BRZ-76.description: The premiere russian anti-armor sniper weapon. the top mounted helical magazine is a nice touch, and the seburo style firing assembly and grip configuration insure ease and comfort when firing.

Tambu No.15 Archer.name: Tambu No.15 Archer
Tambu No.15 Archer.description: A popular assassin's weapon, the Archer's bullpup design allows for a shorter barrel length than most high-caliber sniper rifles and comes equipped with a nightvision scope that can be set to 4 and 8 times magnification.

Tsunami Arms Horizon.name: Tsunami Arms Horizon
Tsunami Arms Horizon.description: A very large rifle, with enormous stopping power and dead on acuracy. Often used against light armor and full conversions, this weapon is a favorite among snipers.

Tsunami Arms Mandolin.name: Tsunami Arms Mandolin
Tsunami Arms Mandolin.description: Tsunami took a look at the Constitutional Arms S51 and decided they could do it better. The weapon features the same cylinder design though it lacks the onboard computer to display the ammo information on the scope, but it will still display that information to the integral smartlink.

Tsunami Arms Raijin Type 17.name: Tsunami Arms Raijin Type 17
Tsunami Arms Raijin Type 17.description: Equipped with a bipod, smartgun link and computer-assisted sight. Difficulty 15 Body check required to avoid suffering 1D6/2 points of damage on firing.

Walther WA-2100.name: Walther WA-2100
Walther WA-2100.description: This weapon is the sniping rifle that just won the rigorous CAS sniper rifle competition ! Designed to military specifications (instead of being a military adaptation of a civilian rifle model), the Walther is reliable and free of the design instabilities common to other weapons of the type. The professional's choice !

6G-30.name: 6G-30
6G-30.cartridge: 40 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

GM-94.name: GM-94
GM-94.cartridge: 40 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

GP-25.name: GP-25
GP-25.description: Ancestor of the GP-30, more expensive, heavier, less easy to maintain, so less good. Only take his place under the barrel of a weapon, like a AK74.

GP-30.name: GP-30
GP-30.description: Only take his place under the barrel of a weapon, like a AK74.

Heckler & Koch AG36.name: Heckler & Koch AG36
Heckler & Koch AG36.description: Only take his place under the barrel of a weapon, preferably a H&K brand weapon.
Heckler & Koch AG36.cartridge: 40 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Heckler & Koch HK 69.name: Heckler & Koch HK 69
Heckler & Koch HK 69.cartridge: 40 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Heckler & Koch HK 79.name: Heckler & Koch HK 79
Heckler & Koch HK 79.description: Only take his place under the barrel of a weapon, preferably a H&K brand weapon.
Heckler & Koch HK 79.cartridge: 40 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

M79.name: M79
M79.cartridge: 40 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

M203.name: M203
M203.description: Only take his place under the barrel of a weapon, like a M16 or a M4.
M203.cartridge: 40 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Milkor MGL Mk.1.name: Milkor MGL Mk.1
Milkor MGL Mk.1.cartridge: 40 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Sig Sauer GL 5040.name: Sig Sauer GL 5040
Sig Sauer GL 5040.description: The 40 mm Grenade Launcher 5040 can be attached to all SG 550/551 models and is operated in single-shot mode.
Sig Sauer GL 5040.cartridge: 40 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Arasaka Fang.name: Arasaka Fang
Arasaka Fang.description: A semi-automatic grenade launcher from Arasaka. Telescopic sight and rangefinder equipped standard. It has a built in underbarrel shotgun for emergencies.
Arasaka Fang.cartridge: 40 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Arasaka MMW-52.name: Arasaka MMW-52
Arasaka MMW-52.cartridge: 40 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Arasaka Tsunami Pocket Grenade Launcher.name: Arasaka Tsunami Pocket Grenade Launcher
Arasaka Tsunami Pocket Grenade Launcher.description: Exists in version for cyborg, without foregrip and with a shortened barrel : length : 49 cm, accuracy : -2. Takes two places in a cyberlimb, if implanted as a cyberweapon.
Arasaka Tsunami Pocket Grenade Launcher.cartridge: 25 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Colt M223.name: Colt M223
Colt M223.description: The M223, successor of the famous M203, is semi-automatic. It fits on many assault rifles as long as they have a long enough barrel. This version has a long barrel hence its good accuracy but there are shorter versions (accuracy : 0, range : 200 meters, length : 36 cm) for smaller rifles.
Colt M223.cartridge: 40 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Federated Arms LSGL-38.name: Federated Arms LSGL-38
Federated Arms LSGL-38.description: A lightweight, cheap, single shot grenade launcher specifically designed for fire rifle launched grenades. All standard loads are available.
Federated Arms LSGL-38.cartridge: 40 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Federated Arms Revo-Max.name: Federated Arms Revo-Max
Federated Arms Revo-Max.cartridge: 40 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Heckler & Koch MGL-4.name: Heckler & Koch MGL-4
Heckler & Koch MGL-4.description: Based on the firm's standard design, this grenade launcher fulfills its role perfectly.
Heckler & Koch MGL-4.cartridge: 40 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Malorian Arms Frag Cannon.name: Malorian Arms Frag Cannon
Malorian Arms Frag Cannon.description: With this weapon of unrivalled power sold in 2019, Malorian gives a new breath of life to heavy shotguns. Ammunitions available :- Thermal (45 eb piece) : molten jet (3000° at the exit of the barrel). Damage : CR 8D6, MR 6D6, LR 4D6. Any non-metallic armor is reduced by half. Beware of fires when using it.- 25 mm HEP (30 eb piece) : an explosive charge is propelled against the target. Damage : 6D6 AP to target and 3D6 within a radius of 3m. Can easily be adapted to standard 25 mm grenades.

Metacorp LRG-4 Braam.name: Metacorp LRG-4 Braam
Metacorp LRG-4 Braam.description: Innovating more than its habits, Metacorp releases this grenade launcher that one may considered precise. Its also equiped with an increasing range device.
Metacorp LRG-4 Braam.cartridge: 40 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Militech Cowboy U-55.name: Militech Cowboy U-55
Militech Cowboy U-55.cartridge: 25 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Militech Mini-Grenade Launcher.name: Militech Mini-Grenade Launcher
Militech Mini-Grenade Launcher.description: Magazines of 8 grenades exist but are quite bulky.
Militech Mini-Grenade Launcher.cartridge: 25 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Mustang Arms Bigshot.name: Mustang Arms Bigshot
Mustang Arms Bigshot.description: This pump action grenade launcher is a heavy, unwiedly but remarkably effective weapon. It also accepts 4 gauge shotgun shells, which have a tendency to leave a very messy target.
Mustang Arms Bigshot.cartridge: 40 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Panther Assault Cannon.name: Panther Assault Cannon
Panther Assault Cannon.description: The Panther Assault Cannon, designed and produced by Panther Industries, is your only choice for heavy assault weapon. Firing a stable superplast explosive warhead, the Panther has proven effective against both hard and soft targets. Comes with shoulder-strap and hip-bracing gear for stable hip-fire.The Panther fires specialized 25 mm HV grenades with a double-sized propellant charge. Impact from one of these grenades deals 2D6 damage beyond the normal damage for such a round. Rounds also cost 2.5x the normal cost for 25 mm grenades.
Panther Assault Cannon.cartridge: 25 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Remington M-212 Grenade Launcher.name: Remington M-212 Grenade Launcher
Remington M-212 Grenade Launcher.cartridge: 40 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Remington Sauce Shooter.name: Remington Sauce Shooter
Remington Sauce Shooter.cartridge: FEN Dz 22 grenade (2D6+3 dans un rayon de 15m)

Royal Enfield HSGL-32.name: Royal Enfield HSGL-32
Royal Enfield HSGL-32.description: This man portable belt fed grenade launcher is perfect for your support needs. A long time favorite of many european militaries, the HSGL-32 is now available to you. While usually mounted in the turret of a tank, or on back of a jeep, the HSGL-32 is perfectly capable of being fired without assistance by an individual, providing he is fairly strong.
Royal Enfield HSGL-32.cartridge: 40 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Seburo GL-25.name: Seburo GL-25
Seburo GL-25.description: A pocket grenade-launcher, perfect for criticals situations.
Seburo GL-25.cartridge: 25 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Towa Type 9 Grenade Launcher.name: Towa Type 9 Grenade Launcher
Towa Type 9 Grenade Launcher.cartridge: 40 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Towa Type P-01.name: Towa Type P-01
Towa Type P-01.description: Used by both Japanese military and police, the Type P-01 is a single shot grenade launcher. Extremely simple to use.
Towa Type P-01.cartridge: 40 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Tsunami Arms AGL Type 18.name: Tsunami Arms AGL Type 18
Tsunami Arms AGL Type 18.cartridge: 25 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

United Armaments MK19.name: United Armaments MK19
United Armaments MK19.description: Probably one of the most destructive weapons an infantryman can carry. You'll need a large Body Type (10) to handle the machine without leaning it on the ground.
United Armaments MK19.cartridge: 40 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

UrbanTech EMP Grenadier.name: UrbanTech EMP Grenadier
UrbanTech EMP Grenadier.description: * in a 10m zone, the fusion of this grenade causes short circuits in electronic components. Internal cybernetic equipment stops working for 1D6 minutes and cyberlimbs for 2D6 minutes. Memory chips are erased and electronic systems, depending on their complexity, fail permanently or for a few minutes. A non-cybernetized person loses his sense of orientation for about ten seconds (stun save at -1).

Arasaka Animal.name: Arasaka Animal
Arasaka Animal.description: This weapon from Arsaka is a monster 14 mm capable of single shot or 3-round burst. In single shot mode the weapon is fairly accurate, however in burst mode the accuracy drops significantly (-2 WA) due to the incredible recoil of the round being fired and the short barrel design.

Arasaka Armitage.name: Arasaka Armitage
Arasaka Armitage.description: Smaller than the "Misa", and more powerful, this seemed to be exactly what the women of Arasaka were asking for. This is a really nice weapon, very comfortable to shoot, and fairly easily concealable, it almost fits in your pocket.

Arasaka Briareos.name: Arasaka Briareos
Arasaka Briareos.description: Now this is a handgun, quite possibly one of the largest revolvers available, this fires the full sized 7.62 round. It was designed for use by full conversions and ACPA, but some brave souls have taken it upon themselves to try and fire this thing without augmentation (usually resulting in a broken wrist). A Body minimum of 14 is needed to fire this extremely large weapon.

Arasaka Muramasa.name: Arasaka Muramasa
Arasaka Muramasa.description: Arasaka's semi-auto answer to the "Mjolnir". Unlike its brethren this weapon fires full sized 10 mm caseless rounds and offers a superior ammo capacity, unfortunately it also suffers from the heavy construction and even heavier recoil. Still it is very popular in C-SWAT circles as the sidearm of choice.

Arasaka Rage 15 mm.name: Arasaka Rage 15 mm
Arasaka Rage 15 mm.description: For full borgs and powered armor.

Arasaka Shenk.name: Arasaka Shenk
Arasaka Shenk.description: Another anti-cyborg handgun from Arasaka. The smooth styling and ergonomic design truly stand out in a crowd. Also features an integral laser sight and smartgun link.

Ares Predator IV.name: Ares Predator IV
Ares Predator IV.description: This anti-cyborg weapon, chambered in 14 mm, is the latest in a famous line of handguns. For an extra 50 eb you can have it equipped with a single shot 25 mm/12 ga underbarrel launcher.

Budget Arms BTS-44.name: Budget Arms BTS-44
Budget Arms BTS-44.description: Budget Arms is trying to compete with Seburo, but failing miserably. For one thing the weapon is ugly as shit, for another the action is known to break easily.

Budget Arms Primo.name: Budget Arms Primo
Budget Arms Primo.description: This pocket sized 14 mm is possibly the most dangerous handgun ever made, to the user as well as the target. The materials it is constructed out of aren't strong enough for the round fired, and there is no slide mechanism to reduce recoil. Instead the barrel is heavily vented. This weapon has a 1-in-8 chance of blowing up everytime it is fired.

Budget Arms Scout.name: Budget Arms Scout
Budget Arms Scout.description: Another example of too much gun. This weapon comes in three forms, firstly consisting of a large 14 mm as the main weapon, then you can choose either the single shot 10 gauge shotgun, single shot 25 mm grenade launcher, or 20 round 9 mm submachine gun with a ROF of 6. All 3 weapons also come with integral laser sight and vary slightly in outward appearance. The name is rumored to be derived from the Boy Scout motto of "always be prepared".

Colt Cobra 525 Magnum.name: Colt Cobra 525 Magnum
Colt Cobra 525 Magnum.description: This massive double-action revolver has regained popularity in the last year because of it's massive caliber and because of the cased munitions advantage for use with ElectroThermic enhancement.The Cobra is also available in variants chambered in .44 Special, .45 Colt, .44 Magnum, .50 Action Express and the heavy .454, but no one seems to care. Custom grips are available for an additional $175.

Colt Kenyan.name: Colt Kenyan
Colt Kenyan.description: A huge revolver with a short stock, the extra trigger is to activate the integral laser sight.

Colt Piranha.name: Colt Piranha
Colt Piranha.description: With the Piranha, Colt wants to compete with Malorian on its own turf. It's cheaper, more accurate and will make happy people among "the bigger the better" enthusiasts. Its only big flaw comes from its very long barrel which does not help its handling.

Dai Lung Chango.name: Dai Lung Chango
Dai Lung Chango.description: Since it's introduction, this weapon has become the polices worst nightmare. It's reached almost epic popularity among gangs due to its "relative" low price and extremely high caliber. This weapon has given even the cheapest thugs a way to fight back against the most heavily armored police. It's 3-round burst capability make it even more lethal. Of course you get what you pay for, this weapon has a tendency to blow up (every fumble rolled using this weapon has a 50% chance of causing it to explode in your hands). This tendency increases when on 3-round burst (anytime the weapon fumbles, it explodes). The high lethality of this gun, both to enemy and user, have not stopped it from being imported.

Farsian HG-02B.name: Farsian HG-02B
Farsian HG-02B.description: Coming out of nowhere, this manufacturer has decided to make everyone agree about how made the most powerful gun in the market. But is it really smart to introduce this kind of ammo in a so "small" weapon ?

Farsian RS-15.name: Farsian RS-15
Farsian RS-15.description: This monster, with a deliberately aggressive look, is capable of obliterating any borg.

Luigi Franchi AMOD-8.name: Luigi Franchi AMOD-8
Luigi Franchi AMOD-8.description: A single shot pistol made by Italy's finest for hunting big game in style.

Magnum Opus Big Governement.name: Magnum Opus Big Governement
Magnum Opus Big Governement.description: Usable only by full borgs and linear frames. With only a cyberarm, its characteristics change : accuracy -1, ROF 1. A normally sized human (Body< 11) could only hide this weapon under a long coat.

Malorian Arms 3600 Super-SMG.name: Malorian Arms 3600 Super-SMG
Malorian Arms 3600 Super-SMG.description: This sub-machine gun is so powerful it requires a cyberarm or linear frame. Without one, 1D6+2 points of damage are inflicted on the shooter's arm.

Malorian Arms MXP.name: Malorian Arms MXP
Malorian Arms MXP.description: Malorian made headlines with the 3516, but apparently the lack of aesthetic appeal was a black stain that Malorian felt they had to correct. Now with the release of the MXP all questions about the artistry that is Malorian have been answered. Now Malorian has a proper weapon to fire the 14 mm round that made them famous.

Militech PRED-6.name: Militech PRED-6
Militech PRED-6.description: Yet another large bore sidearm from Militech. The leather padded grips for extra comfort are a nice touch, as is the flip down laser sight on the front of the trigger guard.

Nomad Scrapper.name: Nomad Scrapper
Nomad Scrapper.description: As full conversion cyborgs and other cybernetically enhanced or armored individuals are becoming slowly more prevalent in the nomad community, so is the necessity for weapons that will stop them. This hand made handgun fires the 5.56mm rifle round, which will not only take out even full conversions, but also makes a pretty good vehicle stopper. Unfortunately it's not very reliable and prone to jamming.

Norse Technologies Asgard.name: Norse Technologies Asgard
Norse Technologies Asgard.description: Another anti-cyborg handgun from the team at Norse Tech. One begins to think they really hate full conversions.

Norse Technologies Decker.name: Norse Technologies Decker
Norse Technologies Decker.description: For distance the competition in the business of "bigger is better", Norse Technologies made this monster who will find buyers for sure.

Norse Technologies Decon-14.name: Norse Technologies Decon-14
Norse Technologies Decon-14.description: This anti-cyborg weapon, chambered in 14 mm, is the latest in a promising line of weapons from one of the bright rising stars in handgun manufacturing.

Norse Technologies Odin.name: Norse Technologies Odin
Norse Technologies Odin.description: The Odin, another ridiculously high powered handgun, designed for C-SWAT to act as a sidearm, and while it is as uselessfor the larger borgs as the standard firearms but for the lighter borgs it is more than effective. It fires cut down 7.62 rifle shells and while the ammo capacity is low, its break-apart design and full moon style speed loaders make reloading a snap.

Panther .74 M-13.name: Panther .74 M-13
Panther .74 M-13.description: The Sherman Model 13 sells primarily because of it's massive caliber, larger in girth even than the .666 Magnum Opus rounds. The odd design of the gun is for two handed use, and one handed shooting reduces WA by 2.

Panther .74 M-15.name: Panther .74 M-15
Panther .74 M-15.description: With the M-15, Panther Industries has succeeded in stabilizing their work. And to celebrate that they added a 25 mm grenade launcher (accuracy : -2, magazine : 1, rate : 1) !

Remington Stormbreaker.name: Remington Stormbreaker
Remington Stormbreaker.description: After the release of Smith & Wesson's Earth Sheaker, Remington decided to react by releasing its own model to avoid having to pay license fee to Norse Technologies. The result is an even bigger and better designed revolver.

Ruger RP-107.name: Ruger RP-107
Ruger RP-107.description: Drop that full borg, or stop that mack truck in its tracks. This gun fires the same 10 mm rifle shell used in the Arasaka Morita and packs one hell of a wallop. Its short barrel design and heavy load make for an extremely well felt recoil, so accuracy is a little troublesome, but the power of this gun, combined with its concealability make it extremely popular with borg hunters and C-SWAT officers.

Seburo 25 mm Handcannon.name: Seburo 25 mm Handcannon
Seburo 25 mm Handcannon.description: Seburo has designed this grenade launcher "gun" in order to be used by a borg or an ACPA. It retakes the same cartridge that the Malorian Arms's Fragmentation Canon :- Thermal (45 eb each) : melting spray (3000°C at the barrel exit). Damage : Short Range 8D6, Middle Range 6D6, Long Range 4D6. All non metallic armor is reduce to half. Beware to blaze during using.- 25 mm HEP (30 eb each) : an explosive charge is launched against the target. Damage : 6D6 AP to the target and 3D6 in a 3 meter radius. Can be easily adapted for 25 mm grenades.

Seburo C-H14.name: Seburo C-H14
Seburo C-H14.description: This "gun" is equiped with an impressive recoilless device who, despite of its efficiency, doesn't allow its using by a normal human. It can be hidden behind a long coat by taking off the handle.

Seburo HSG-50.name: Seburo HSG-50
Seburo HSG-50.description: This impressive sub-machine gun is for full borgs and other ACPA only.

Smith & Wesson Earth Shaker.name: Smith & Wesson Earth Shaker
Smith & Wesson Earth Shaker.description: Smith & Wesson purchased a license to manufacture Norse Technologies for its ;Odin". This is his exact copy, except that they took this opportunity to extend the canon, and therefore the accuracy.

StreetTech 12-Gauge Pistol.name: StreetTech 12-Gauge Pistol
StreetTech 12-Gauge Pistol.description: For use with a linear frame. Without one, ROF : 1, accuracy : -3, concealable : long coat

United Armaments 5.56 mm SMG.name: United Armaments 5.56 mm SMG
United Armaments 5.56 mm SMG.description: Can be used by a normal person by adding a foregrip.

Wichita Target.name: Wichita Target
Wichita Target.description: A very large pistol made to never have to hit more than once. A cyberhand is needed for its use. Recoil compensator and scope come standard.

Arasaka-Malorian Assault .50.name: Arasaka-Malorian Assault .50
