Arasaka-Malorian Assault .50.description: The Assault .50 is the joint venture product of Malorian and Arasaka. It is basically a less expensive and more combat engineered version of the Malorian "Aspen". It uses standard steel and ceramic construction and does not come smartchipped as standard.

Arasaka Devastator.name: Arasaka Devastator
Arasaka Devastator.description: This is truly the biggest of the big man portable guns you are likely to ever find. This weapon is impossible to fire without a gyrostabilizer mount and at least a body of 10, at least if you want to survive the experience. Most commonly this weapon is used by full conversions or mounted to an ACPA or linear frame, however recently the weapon has been issued to special forces teams (along with an improved version of the same powered gyrostabilizer mount used on the EMG-85 railgun). Anything short of a battleship hit with this weapon will most likely be destroyed.Any human attemtping to fire this weapon without a gyro stabilization mount will take 1d6+2 points of bruise damage regardless of body type, any human with a bod of 10 or lower (15 without the powered gyro-stabilization mount) firing this weapon must also roll a ten sided die, on a 5 or lower his shoulder is shattered. Also without a stabilization mount, any human firing the weapon, regardless of BOD will be flung back wards 2D6 feet unless thouroughly braced.

Arasaka Firelance.name: Arasaka Firelance
Arasaka Firelance.description: This strange weapon is a state of art railgun. It features a removable ammo/power pack that requires 3 rounds to change.

Arasaka Oni Autoshotgun.name: Arasaka Oni Autoshotgun
Arasaka Oni Autoshotgun.description: The particularity of this truly monstrous weapon is to fire 10 gauge shotgun cartridges (much more powerful than 12 gauge) in bursts. Used indoors, it can literally "erase" inhabitants, furniture and walls.

Arasaka RM-375.name: Arasaka RM-375
Arasaka RM-375.description: A popular machine gun for use against flesh targets. Even light full conversions and hardsuits can use it. For that matter, fleshies can use it with the aid of a gyrostabilizer mount.

Arasaka Roccer.name: Arasaka Roccer
Arasaka Roccer.description: The light weight of the Roccer allows hardsuits and medium full conversions to carry it into battle. The Roccer also becoming popular as a light vehicle mounted weapon.
Arasaka Roccer.cartridge: 40 mm radar guided missile (4D10 AP, 3D6 dans un rayon de 2m)

Dai Lung AGL-74.name: Dai Lung AGL-74
Dai Lung AGL-74.description: A standard Auto-GL manufactured in China.
Dai Lung AGL-74.cartridge: 25 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Dai Lung G-89.name: Dai Lung G-89
Dai Lung G-89.description: * Damages : 5D6 at close range, 6D6+3 at medium range, 7D6 at long range and 7D6+1 at extreme range. Each rocket costs 30 eb. A simple rifle firing micromissiles from a butt loading magazine made in China for the Chinese military.

Dai Lung ZRR-17.name: Dai Lung ZRR-17
Dai Lung ZRR-17.description: Not as accurate or as reliable as its western counterpart, the Militech AM-3, but it is less expensive and holds more ammunition.
Dai Lung ZRR-17.cartridge: 30 mm uranium rocket (6D10+12 AP, dégâts divisés par trois à moins de 160m)

Dutch Arms Vandalizer.name: Dutch Arms Vandalizer
Dutch Arms Vandalizer.description: An effective anti-armor rifle, common to earopean troops, especially mounted on vehicles.

Meta Armson Photon-2.name: Meta Armson Photon-2
Meta Armson Photon-2.description: Damages : 1D10-10D10 AP. A fairly new weapon, and still in the experimental stages is the Photon-2 heavy laser rifle from Meta Armson. This is one of the largest laser weapon to be seen dirt side currently in production. Since the weapon is produced by a neutral arms company it is probable that this weapon might be seen serving both sides of a battle.

Militech AAR-49.name: Militech AAR-49
Militech AAR-49.description: Smartlinked and man portable only with a powered gyro stabilization harness, this anti-armor cannon is the bane of ACPA and even tanks. It loads like a revolver, though not even Norse Technologies biggest boomer buster has anything on this monster.

Militech ABR-78.name: Militech ABR-78
Militech ABR-78.description: Militech formidable anti-tank rifle, comes standard with a bipod. Non augmented persons need to brace this weapon to fire it, either with the bipod, or in some other way (BODY min 14).

Militech PASAW-506.name: Militech PASAW-506
Militech PASAW-506.description: This heavy assault machinegun was designed to fill a support role for ACPA squads and can alternatively be belt fed from an ammo hopper.

Militech PASMG-39.name: Militech PASMG-39
Militech PASMG-39.description: Utilizing the famous 14 mm round developed by Malorian to its utmost potential, this is the light weapon of choice among most US military PA troopers and full conversions.

Militech TS-10.name: Militech TS-10
Militech TS-10.description: This weapon, which is generally carried by perimeter defense and guard units, must be dual fed from a large ammo hopper containing 4000 rounds of ammunition which requires at least a strength of 40 to haul. It is possible for a chassis of a strength of at least 20 to fire the weapon, but without the mobile hopper strapped to his back it would be a stationary weapon. Once the ammo is expended, the weapon and the hopper are meant to be dropped. However due to the high cost of both weapon and hopper, disposal on a battlefield is not conducive, and therefore the weapon has limited versatility.

Raven Microcybernetics Gordon-12.name: Raven Microcybernetics Gordon-12
Raven Microcybernetics Gordon-12.description: Damages : 1D10-10D10 AP. Raven's version of the Photon-2, a slightly better version supplied exclusively to EDF forces.

Rheinmetall EMG-83.name: Rheinmetall EMG-83
Rheinmetall EMG-83.description: Automatic variant of the EMG-85. Widely used aboard anti-tank vehicles and combat helicopters, as well as with powered armor.

Rheinmetall EMG-84.name: Rheinmetall EMG-84
Rheinmetall EMG-84.description: Automatic variant of the EMG-85. Widely used aboard anti-tank vehicles and combat helicopters, as well as with powered armor.

Rheinmetall EMG-85.name: Rheinmetall EMG-85
Rheinmetall EMG-85.description: Requires a Body of 11, a linear frame or assisted armor to be used. One magazine with battery : 1200 eb.

Rheinmetall GSF-89.name: Rheinmetall GSF-89
Rheinmetall GSF-89.description: Assault rifle derived from the EMG-83, the GSF-89 is a deadly weapon in every respect.

Royal Enfield BSG-32.name: Royal Enfield BSG-32
Royal Enfield BSG-32.description: A commonly seen ACPA SMG style 25 mm grenade launcher used by the EEC and allied forces, the handle is a bit too large for most full conversions, and is really meant strictly for ACPA. A light weapon most commonly issued in anti-personnel roles.
Royal Enfield BSG-32.cartridge: 25 mm grenade (depends on the grenade used)

Royal Enfield Ordnance Orberus.name: Royal Enfield Ordnance Orberus
Royal Enfield Ordnance Orberus.description: Useable only by the heaviest borgs and ACPA the REO Orberus is a four shot reloadable anti-armor missile launcher capable of taking out other ACPA and light armored vehicles quickly and messily.
Royal Enfield Ordnance Orberus.cartridge: 70 mm homing missile (12D10 AP, 5D6 dans un rayon de 3m)

Royal Enfield Ordnance XTS-12.name: Royal Enfield Ordnance XTS-12
Royal Enfield Ordnance XTS-12.description: The XTS is the EDF ACPA/borg portable rocket delivery system.

Russian Arms Karminoff Railgun.name: Russian Arms Karminoff Railgun
Russian Arms Karminoff Railgun.description: Russias own advanced kinetic weapons project led to this. Interesting to not, when carried on the ACPA back, the Karminoff is often mistaken for the wings of a flight unit, a deadly mistake. The weapon features a removable ammo/power pack that requires 3 rounds to change.

Russian Arms MG-442.name: Russian Arms MG-442
Russian Arms MG-442.description: A huge 30 mm MG used mainly by Russia, although it has been sold in great numbers to EEC and Chinese forces.

Seburo AA-30.name: Seburo AA-30
Seburo AA-30.description: Requiring a body rating of at least 22 to fire, the Armor Assassin is a full conversion/ACPA rifle of enormous power. It can take out even the largest combat ACPA and is combat effective even against tanks.

Seburo Assault Vulcan.name: Seburo Assault Vulcan
Seburo Assault Vulcan.description: One more time, Seburo has decided to hit hard by releasing this awesome gatling that we can say "pocket gatling". Such power in such a small volume can only be handled by a properly equiped person. Unfortunately, the helicoidal magazine is quickly empty, and can be loaded with a 200 bullets band. Moreover, we can fire one by one without start the gatling rotation.

Seburo HAR-50.name: Seburo HAR-50
Seburo HAR-50.description: This monster power is used by full borgs and ACPA.

SPIW Mini 14 Penetrator.name: SPIW Mini 14 Penetrator
SPIW Mini 14 Penetrator.description: Basically, this weapon is an armor buster, for taking out even the toughest of opponents. This semiautomatic fires 14.5 mm HEAT shells from an over-the-shoulder position. It uses an advanced long-travel recoil absorption system, but even still, the recoil for this weapon is tremendous, and only the toughest troops can manage it.A BODY roll of 15+ is required to avoid taking 3 points of bruise damage to the firing arm. Armor is at 1/2, but any damage goes through at full value.

Towa ATR-16.name: Towa ATR-16
Towa ATR-16.description: A very large, and effective anti-tank rifle.

Tsunami Arms SS-56.name: Tsunami Arms SS-56
Tsunami Arms SS-56.description: The Silent Storm is a suppressed 5.56 mm assault rifle. Underpowered against most full conversion cyborgs and ACPA, it is however very effective against flesh targets and operates at barely a whisper. Removing the carrying handle and suppressor of this weapon turns it into an effective sidearm for larger combat ACPA.

United Armaments Claw.name: United Armaments Claw
United Armaments Claw.description: Standard smartgun link (range : 100 meters). A secondary weapon can be installed under the cannon.

Dai Lung Flashfire.name: Dai Lung Flashfire
Dai Lung Flashfire.description: If someone is stupid enough to use a flamethrower made by Dai Lung, the world would be a better place without him. This weapon has two fuel tanks with mix the chemicals to create the flame, unfortunately the control nozzle doesn't work quite right and the mixture keeps pouring after the trigger has been released.

FN LF-304.name: FN LF-304
FN LF-304.description: The EDF flamethrower, the fuel supply is worn on a harness and connected to the gun by an armored (SP 8) flexible hose. This weapon is heavy, and most EDF troops aren't too sure about carrying the fuel supply (8L) directly on their body when bullets are whizzing around. However the weapon is sturdy and reliable. Bulky device (-2 EV).

Kenshiri Adachi F-253.name: Kenshiri Adachi F-253
Kenshiri Adachi F-253.description: 8 liter tank for this bulky device (-2 EV).

Rostovic F-24.name: Rostovic F-24
Rostovic F-24.description: A simple Russian flamethrower, easy to operate and self igniting. 8 liter tank for this bulky device (-2 EV).

Cyberdyn AMR-20.name: Cyberdyn AMR-20
Cyberdyn AMR-20.description: This weapon, made only on special order by Cyberdyn, is the pinnacle in the art of precision shooting. It is capable of destroying any target, tank, assisted combat armor, infantryman behind heavy cover, with unparalleled accuracy. Closer to a cannon than a rifle, it can only be handled on its bipod, even if the shooter is a borg, given its high bulk. It is equipped with an oversized 36 cm long magazine as well as an impressive sighting system :- Aiming computer (+2 at medium range, +3 at long and extreme range) including low light vision and heat detection (infrared).- Cyber-optical triangulation system (requires a smartgun link) : allows you to visualize where the weapon is pointing and to zoom in for long-distance shooting. The accuracy bonus is +3 at all distances and the malus due for moving targets is reduced by 2.It is necessary to change the battery after each empty charger.

Cyberdyn Assault Rifle.name: Cyberdyn Assault Rifle
Cyberdyn Assault Rifle.description: This assault rifle is also equipped with a 25 mm mini-grenade launcher (magazine : 8, rate : 2, range : 200 m).

Cyberdyn Assault SMG.name: Cyberdyn Assault SMG
Cyberdyn Assault SMG.description: This astonishing SMG fires, not conventional ammunition for its category, but rifle ammunition like its big brother.

Cyberdyn Auto Shotgun.name: Cyberdyn Auto Shotgun
Cyberdyn Auto Shotgun.description: This monstrous automatic shotgun is capable of shredding any poorly protected target. Its long barrel ensures a good accuracy for a weapon of this category.

Cyberdyn Helios Autocannon.name: Cyberdyn Helios Autocannon
Cyberdyn Helios Autocannon.description: Only an infantryman in power-assisted combat armor or with a heavy linear frame can handle such a weapon of mass destruction. Its main disadvantage, a low capacity drum magazine, can be replaced by a 500 belt. A whole system of gyrostabilizers makes the weapon much more precise and controllable during firing. Moreover, if necessary, it is possible to fire in single shots without starting the rotation.

M2019 Blaster.name: M2019 Blaster
M2019 Blaster.description: This work of art is the result of the combination of a Steyr-Mannlicher Model SL .222 rifle and a Charter Arms Bulldog revolver. Both guns have been rechambered with very similar ammunition, .44 Magnum instead of .44 Special and 5.56 mm instead of .222, for convenience, as these old calibers are not available. The handling of the bolt action rifle part is not easy and it is advised to use it only as a last resort.

Poseidon-Norinco Gong.name: Poseidon-Norinco Gong
Poseidon-Norinco Gong.description: The Norinco Gong, or the art of making shotgun cartriges fit in a "pistol". It has several standard accessories available :- Pistol grenade adapter- Smartgun link- Personalized grip : +1 to rapid fire. 4 round can be spent aiming for a +4 bonus- Laser sightA Body of 8 is required to fire one-handed.

Seburo MN-Perfect.name: Seburo MN-Perfect
Seburo MN-Perfect.description: For as long as you have enough money to pay, Seburo will custom made the weapon you need. From the short version for commando to the longest for precision shooting, you have a wide range of choices. The calibers offered are : 5.7 mm (3D6), 5.56C (5D6) and 7.62C (6D6+2). Accuracy and range are +2 and 400 meters for the short versions and +3 and 600 meters for the long ones. The magazines range from 25 to 35 ammo and the rate of fire is adjustable from 2/3/10 to 2/3/30. It is possible to conceal in a coat only the short versions. A wide range of accessories is of course available.

Arasaka BG-Tranq.name: Arasaka BG-Tranq
Arasaka BG-Tranq.description: This weapon was originally designed to tranq big game so they could be electronically tagged, however other have found new uses for it. It uses highly compressed gas to fire a large dart filled with any liquid drug you desire to a range of 200 meters. Extra darts are 10eb apeice, but can be reused provided they don't break (any miss results in a break, succesful hits only break about 10% of the time).

Arasaka Restraint Caster.name: Arasaka Restraint Caster
Arasaka Restraint Caster.description: * * Very difficult BODY test to successfully break polymer tendrils.

Militech Electronics Taser.name: Militech Electronics Taser
Militech Electronics Taser.description: * Penetrates 4 SP. The victim must make a stun save at -2 if the dart touches the skin or a conductor or falls unconscious 2D6 minutes. In all cases, REF and CL are halved for 1D6+1 minutes.

Militech Long Range Taser.name: Militech Long Range Taser
Militech Long Range Taser.description: * The projectiles of this weapon are rubber bullets with an instant discharge battery. Endurance test of difficulty 20 (or 15, if protected by thick clothing) to prevent fainting.

Mitsubishi Taser.name: Mitsubishi Taser
Mitsubishi Taser.description: * Penetrates 4 SP. The victim must make a stun save at -2 if the dart touches the skin or a conductor or falls unconscious 2D6 minutes. In all cases, REF and CL are halved for 1D6+1 minutes.

Pursuit Security Beanbag Gun.name: Pursuit Security Beanbag Gun
Pursuit Security Beanbag Gun.description: * If the affected part of the body has no armor, the victim must pass an Endurance test of 25 to avoid fainting. Semi-real damage : 1D6-1.

Pursuit Security Stundart Pistol.name: Pursuit Security Stundart Pistol
Pursuit Security Stundart Pistol.description: * Damage : 1D3+1 in contusion. BODY + Endurance roll (difficulty : 18) to avoid fainting.

Pursuit Security Webgun.name: Pursuit Security Webgun
Pursuit Security Webgun.description: * If the target is "slightly" missed it may be hit by one of the masses (1D6+2), semi-real damage.

Arasaka AG-15.name: Arasaka AG-15
Arasaka AG-15.description: Rising in popularity, this is Arasaka's answer to the Hammer M-11.

Australian Ammo Trigger.name: Australian Ammo Trigger
Australian Ammo Trigger.description: An Australian dart launcher that is recognized as one of the best on the market. Gas refill for 100 shots.

Daewoo DP 10.name: Daewoo DP 10
Daewoo DP 10.description: Handgun firing a 6 mm dart propelled by a powder cartridge.
Daewoo DP 10.cartridge: 6 mm AP dart (2D6 AP, dégâts à la chair divisé par 2)

Heckler & Koch P11M.name: Heckler & Koch P11M
Heckler & Koch P11M.description: This handgun is a modernized version of an old gun who was designed from scratch expressly for the purpose of underwater combat. It uses 5-shot disposable barrel clusters and electrically fires 8 mm caseless, smokeless finned flechettes. Completely waterproof, this weapon has an effective range of 15 meters underwater.

Malorian Arms Sub-Flechette Gun.name: Malorian Arms Sub-Flechette Gun
Malorian Arms Sub-Flechette Gun.description: * Damage : 1D6 AP per needle. A close range target is reached by 1D3+3 projectiles, medium range by 1D3 projectiles and long range by 1D3/2. Sold with two magazines, according to the desired discretion (concealability : long coat, magazine : 30).

Militech Black Widow.name: Militech Black Widow
Militech Black Widow.description: * Damage : 1D3 AP per needle. A close range target is reached by 1D6+4 projectiles, medium range by 1D8 projectiles and long range by 1D6.

Militech Silver Shadow.name: Militech Silver Shadow
Militech Silver Shadow.description: * Damage : 1D3 AP per needle. A close range target is reached by 1D6+4 projectiles, medium range by 1D8 projectiles and long range by 1D6.

Mystic Technologies Arrow Gun.name: Mystic Technologies Arrow Gun
Mystic Technologies Arrow Gun.description: Gas refill for 30 shots. Can shoot underwater. Mount for laser sight or scope. Exists in compact model, magazine : 1, concealability : jacket.

Nomad Pneumatic Bolt Gun.name: Nomad Pneumatic Bolt Gun
Nomad Pneumatic Bolt Gun.description: Gas refill for 8 shots, $30. Can be refilled with a compressor. Damage : 2D6 beyond 25 meters.

Sun Knight Stalker.name: Sun Knight Stalker
Sun Knight Stalker.description: A sect of nutcases manufactures and circulates this stun gun that pulls heavy needles made of wood, silver or steel. They claim it is the best weapon to hunt vampires.

Tsunami Arms Airhammer.name: Tsunami Arms Airhammer
Tsunami Arms Airhammer.description: Common in space. Special : the Mark I has a ten pose camera and a laser sight. The Mark II is equipped with a smartgun link and costs 400 eb. Fragmentation needle : 1D6+2. Classic dart : 1D6+2, armor and damage halved. JellSlug (rubber) : 2D6+2 in stun. Gas : a 2m radius gas cloud around the impact. Exercise ball : 1D6-1 stun damage.
Tsunami Arms Airhammer.cartridge: miscellaneous dart (dépend de la munition utilisée)

Arasaka-Tsunami Laser-Pulse Rifle.name: Arasaka-Tsunami Laser-Pulse Rifle
Arasaka-Tsunami Laser-Pulse Rifle.description: Battery for 30 shots, damage : 3D6 AP, six hours charge. Experimental weapon commercialized in 2022.

Arasaka X-LR-62 Laser Rifle.name: Arasaka X-LR-62 Laser Rifle
Arasaka X-LR-62 Laser Rifle.description: A new man-portable laser rifle has emerged on the battlefield. What makes this model different is its limited power selector which only includes 3 settings. The first is light and it does 3d6 damage and has can achieve up to one hundred shots with the standard battery belt, or a virtually unlimited amount if plugged into a wall socket or sufficient generator, this is made possible by the electric recherging and amplifying cylider attached to the gun which acts much like a car's alternator. On the second setting, medium, you get a total of 30 seconds before the power is drained from the weapon. The last setting is heavy, and it gives one 3 second burst of 10D6 damage and then the gun is completely drained. However, due to the special "alternator" built into the weapon, recharging from a wall socket takes half the time as a normal laser although until the weapon is fully charged again it cannot be used, even on the light setting. Due to the rarity and extreme cost of the weapon, supplies are very limited, (no more than 5 to a customer) and orders must be paid in advance.

Meta Armson Assault Laser.name: Meta Armson Assault Laser
Meta Armson Assault Laser.description: Adjustable damage from 1D6 to 8D6, rechargeable battery in 2 hours. Having only a low capacity internal battery, this rifle can be connected to an external source.

Meta Armson LD-AX1.name: Meta Armson LD-AX1
Meta Armson LD-AX1.description: Rechargeable battery in six hours, damage adjustable from 1 to 10D6 AP. Successor of the Photon Assault Cannon, it is better on all points and therefore more expensive ... Although a little lighter (45 kg), it also requires an assisted armor.

Meta Armson Photon Assault Cannon.name: Meta Armson Photon Assault Cannon
Meta Armson Photon Assault Cannon.description: Rechargeable battery in six hours, damage adjustable from 1 to 10D6 AP. Experimental model mountable on assisted armor (50 kg).

Meta Armson Vulcan NE-700 Plasma.name: Meta Armson Vulcan NE-700 Plasma
Meta Armson Vulcan NE-700 Plasma.description: Rechargeable battery in six hours, damage adjustable from 1 to 10D6 AP. In spite of a lurid name, the NE-700 is by no means a plasma rifle. "Portable version" of the Photon Assault Cannon, it must nevertheless be connected to an external battery (38 kg) but can be handled by a man of good constitution as long as he does not carry the battery. The large size of the cannon is due to the cooling system.

Militech Electronics Laser Cannon.name: Militech Electronics Laser Cannon
Militech Electronics Laser Cannon.description: Battery 10 charges (1 charge = 1D6), power adjustable from 1 to 5D6 per shot.

Mitsubishi Stunner.name: Mitsubishi Stunner
Mitsubishi Stunner.description: Battery 12 charges. Works on the principle of Techtronica's lightning weapons, but at a reduced intensity. A 5-meter arc spurts from the Stunner's electrode in the direction of the nearest conductive target. 1 point of real damage per burn, stun save at -1 to not fall unconscious.

Techtronica HB-64CL.name: Techtronica HB-64CL
Techtronica HB-64CL.description: Damage : 12D10, shot duration : 3 seconds. Unlike other combat lasers, this weapon has not alternate setting, it is always on full power. The dual beam does incredible damage. It's a good thing this weapon is so expensive, and the power supply is so limited.

Techtronica M40 Pulse Rifle.name: Techtronica M40 Pulse Rifle
Techtronica M40 Pulse Rifle.description: Effect according to the range. Living beings : death save at -3 at point blank, stun save at -5 at short range, stun save at -3 at medium range, stun save at -1 at long range, simple stun save at extreme range. Risks of failure for electronic and cybernetic equipment : PB : 50% (destruction) / SR : 100% (failure) / MR : 100% (failure for 1D3 hours) / LR : 70% (failure for 2D6 minutes) / ER : 30% (failure for 1D10 rounds). A refill costs 30 eb.

Techtronica Model 009 Volt Pistol.name: Techtronica Model 009 Volt Pistol
Techtronica Model 009 Volt Pistol.description: Damage : 3D6 (semi-real). Affected cybermembers crash for 1D6+3 turns. The armor does not protect against this type of damage.

Valmet Hand Laser.name: Valmet Hand Laser
Valmet Hand Laser.description: Commercialized from 2023, this small-sized laser is the result of a long research on the miniaturization of these devices and their energy sources.

Arasaka Cross-Dart.name: Arasaka Cross-Dart
Arasaka Cross-Dart.description: * Damage : 1D6+3 AP. Crossbow strapped on the forearm shooting a bolt at high speed. The device can be folded up and ready to shoot at the touch of a button. Version for cyberarm with automatic reloading (rate of fire : 1, magazine : 8) for 300 eb. A standard quiver can hold 15 bolts.

Arasaka Half-Bow.name: Arasaka Half-Bow
Arasaka Half-Bow.description: * Damage : 3D6 AP. Can be disassembled in two parts, concealability long coat if folded. A standard quiver can hold 12 arrows.

Eagletech Arbalest.name: Eagletech Arbalest
Eagletech Arbalest.description: * Damage : 5D6 AP. Loaded by hand with a linear frame in one round. Otherwise, with a crank in two rounds. A standard quiver can hold 12 bolts.

Eagletech Bearcat.name: Eagletech Bearcat
Eagletech Bearcat.description: * Damage : 6D6 AP. Can be disassembled in two parts, concealability long coat if folded. A standard quiver can hold 12 arrows.

Eagletech Fletcher.name: Eagletech Fletcher
Eagletech Fletcher.description: An astonishing combination of a shotgun and a crossbow (damage : 4D6 AP, range : 100m, 12 bolts per quiver). A button located at the diagonal of the trigger allows to release the bolt. Thanks to a pulley system, reloading takes only one round for a normal person.

Eagletech Handbow.name: Eagletech Handbow
Eagletech Handbow.description: * Damage : 1D6+2 AP. The arms are foldable for a minimum volume. A standard quiver can hold 15 bolts.

Eagletech Scorpion.name: Eagletech Scorpion
Eagletech Scorpion.description: * Damage : 7D6 AP. Loaded by hand with a linear frame in one round. Otherwise, with a crank in two rounds. A target must pass a Athletics test at +20 or fall backwards on impact. Minimum BODY : 8, A standard quiver can hold 6 bolts.

Eagletech Stalker.name: Eagletech Stalker
Eagletech Stalker.description: * Damage : 4D6 AP. A particularly elegant crossbow equipped with a magazine. The reloading is automatic thanks to a clever force feedback system. There are also 5-, 8- and 10-shot magazines available.

Eagletech Stryker.name: Eagletech Stryker
Eagletech Stryker.description: * Damage : 3D6+3. A standard quiver can hold 12 bolts.

Eagletech Tigercat.name: Eagletech Tigercat
Eagletech Tigercat.description: * Damage : 3D6. A standard quiver can hold 12 arrows.

Eagletech Tomcat.name: Eagletech Tomcat
Eagletech Tomcat.description: * Damage : 4D6. A standard quiver can hold 12 arrows.

Eagletech Wildcat.name: Eagletech Wildcat
Eagletech Wildcat.description: * Damage : 3D6. A standard quiver can hold 12 arrows.

Fetcher Crossbow.name: Fetcher Crossbow
Fetcher Crossbow.description: Damages : 3D6+2. Another fine crossbow, this one is fitted with a winch and comes with 5 barbed grapple arrows (+1D6). It also features a swing out knife blade on the buttstock as sort of a reverse bayonet. Weapon requiring a character with a min BODY of 7 to arm it.

Nomad Hand Crossbow.name: Nomad Hand Crossbow
Nomad Hand Crossbow.description: Damage : 1D6+1 AP. Usually hand held in its pistol version, this weapon also exists without handle strapped on the forearm, or integrated on a cybermember. It can then be triggered with a rod passed around the finger. A standard quiver can hold 15 bolts.

Enertex AKM Power Squirt.name: Enertex AKM Power Squirt
Enertex AKM Power Squirt.description: * Depends on the liquid used. CO2 reserve for 30 shots.

Knife Pistol Type 89.name: Knife Pistol Type 89
Knife Pistol Type 89.description: Unlike its predecessor the Type 86, the Type 89 can fire all four barrels simultaneously. A favorite trick is to stab someone then fire the gun while it is still inside the enemy body.

Malorian Arms Sliver Gun.name: Malorian Arms Sliver Gun
Malorian Arms Sliver Gun.description: The target is hit by 2D6 fragments at short range, 1D6 at medium range and 1D3 at long range. Version for cyberarm : 550 eb.

Nomad Boomerang.name: Nomad Boomerang
Nomad Boomerang.description: This weighted boomerang does not return if it misses its target.

Techtronica 15 Microwaver.name: Techtronica 15 Microwaver
Techtronica 15 Microwaver.description: Battery 10 charges, damage 1D6 + special. Model 20 : magazine : 15, range : 25 meters, price : 500 eb.
